 65	 }
 66	
 67	 val playlist = if (android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.TIRAMISU) {
 68	 intent.getParcelableArrayListExtra(EXTRA_PLAYLIST, Song::class.java) ?: emptyList()
 69	 } else {
 70	 @Suppress("DEPRECATION")
 71	 intent.getParcelableArrayListExtra<Song>(EXTRA_PLAYLIST) ?: emptyList()
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 if (song != null) {
 75	 presenter.initializePlayer(song, playlist)
 76	 } else {
 77	 finish() // Close activity if no song provided
 78	 }

 7	
 8	/**
 9	 * Presenter for the Player screen
 10	 * Handles business logic for music playback and communication between View and Service
 11	 */
 12	class PlayerPresenter(private val context: Context) : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 13	
 14	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 15	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 16	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 17	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 18	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 19	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 20	 private var musicServiceConnection: MusicServiceConnection? = null
 21	 
 22	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 23	 this.view = view
 24	 initializeMusicService()
 25	 }
 26	
 27	 override fun detachView() {
 28	 this.view = null
 29	 musicServiceConnection?.disconnect()
 30	 }
 31	
 32	 private fun initializeMusicService() {
 33	 musicServiceConnection = MusicServiceConnection(context)
 34	 musicServiceConnection?.setPlaybackStateListener(object : MusicServiceConnection.PlaybackStateListener {
 35	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 36	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 37	 }
 38	
 39	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 40	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 41	
 42	 // Update seek bar
 43	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 44	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 45	 } else 0
 46	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 47	 }
 48	
 49	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song?) {
 50	 song?.let {
 51	 currentSong = it
 52	 view?.showSongInfo(it)
 53	 }
 54	 }
 55	 })
 56	 musicServiceConnection?.connect()
 57	 }
 58	 
 59	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 60	 this.currentSong = song
 61	 this.playlist = playlist
 62	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 63	
 64	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 65	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 66	 updateNavigationButtons()
 67	
 68	 // Start playing the song
 69	 musicServiceConnection?.playPlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 70	 }
 71	
 72	 override fun playPause() {
 73	 musicServiceConnection?.playPause()
 74	 }
 75	
 76	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 77	 musicServiceConnection?.seekTo(position)
 78	 }
 79	 
 80	 override fun skipToNext() {
 81	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToNext()
 82	 updateNavigationButtons()
 83	 }
 84	
 85	 override fun skipToPrevious() {
 86	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToPrevious()
 87	 updateNavigationButtons()
 88	 }

Path: app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/service/MusicServiceConnection.kt
 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.content.ComponentName
 4	import android.content.Context
 5	import android.content.Intent
 6	import android.content.ServiceConnection
 7	import android.os.IBinder
 8	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 9	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 10	import androidx.media3.session.MediaController
 11	import androidx.media3.session.SessionToken
 12	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 13	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.MoreExecutors
 14	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 15	
 16	/**
 17	 * Service connection class to manage communication between UI and MusicService
 18	 * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods
 19	 */
 20	class MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {
 21	 
 22	 private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null
 23	 private var mediaController: MediaController? = null
 24	 private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null
 25	 
 26	 interface PlaybackStateListener {
 27	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 28	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 29	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song?)
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 fun setPlaybackStateListener(listener: PlaybackStateListener) {
 33	 this.playbackStateListener = listener
 34	 }
 35	 
 36	 fun connect() {
 37	 val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))
 38	 mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()
 39	 
 40	 mediaControllerFuture?.addListener({
 41	 try {
 42	 mediaController = mediaControllerFuture?.get()
 43	 mediaController?.addListener(object : Player.Listener {
 44	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {
 45	 val isPlaying = playbackState == Player.STATE_READY && mediaController?.playWhenReady == true
 46	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying)
 47	 }
 48	 
 49	 override fun onPositionDiscontinuity(
 50	 oldPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 51	 newPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 52	 reason: Int
 53	 ) {
 54	 updateProgress()
 55	 }
 56	 
 57	 override fun onMediaItemTransition(mediaItem: MediaItem?, reason: Int) {
 58	 // Handle song change
 59	 mediaItem?.let {
 60	 // Convert MediaItem back to Song if needed
 61	 playbackStateListener?.onSongChanged(null) // TODO: Convert MediaItem to Song
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 })
 65	 
 66	 // Start progress updates
 67	 startProgressUpdates()
 68	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 69	 e.printStackTrace()
 70	 }
 71	 }, MoreExecutors.directExecutor())
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 fun disconnect() {
 75	 mediaController?.release()
 76	 mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)
 77	 mediaController = null
 78	 mediaControllerFuture = null
 79	 }
 80	 
 81	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 82	 val mediaItem = MusicService.createMediaItem(song)
 83	 mediaController?.setMediaItem(mediaItem)
 84	 mediaController?.prepare()
 85	 mediaController?.play()
 86	 }
 87	 
 88	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 89	 val mediaItems = MusicService.createMediaItems(songs)
 90	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 91	 mediaController?.prepare()
 92	 mediaController?.play()
 93	 }
 94	 
 95	 fun playPause() {
 96	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 97	 if (controller.isPlaying) {
 98	 controller.pause()
 99	 } else {
 100	 controller.play()
 101	 }
 102	 }
 103	 }
 104	 
 105	 fun skipToNext() {
 106	 mediaController?.seekToNext()
 107	 }
 108	 
 109	 fun skipToPrevious() {
 110	 mediaController?.seekToPrevious()
 111	 }
 112	 
 113	 fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 114	 mediaController?.seekTo(position)
 115	 }
 116	 
 117	 fun isPlaying(): Boolean {
 118	 return mediaController?.isPlaying ?: false
 119	 }
 120	 
 121	 fun getCurrentPosition(): Long {
 122	 return mediaController?.currentPosition ?: 0L
 123	 }
 124	 
 125	 fun getDuration(): Long {
 126	 return mediaController?.duration ?: 0L
 127	 }
 128	 
 129	 private fun startProgressUpdates() {
 130	 // Start a coroutine to update progress regularly
 131	 android.os.Handler(android.os.Looper.getMainLooper()).post(object : Runnable {
 132	 override fun run() {
 133	 updateProgress()
 134	 android.os.Handler(android.os.Looper.getMainLooper()).postDelayed(this, 1000) // Update every second
 135	 }
 136	 })
 137	 }
 138	 
 139	 private fun updateProgress() {
 140	 val position = getCurrentPosition()
 141	 val duration = getDuration()
 142	 playbackStateListener?.onProgressUpdate(position, duration)
 143	 }
 144	}

 1	# Music Playback Implementation Guide
 2	
 3	## What Has Been Fixed
 4	
 5	### 1. **MusicService Integration**
 6	- MusicService properly registered in AndroidManifest.xml
 7	- All required audio permissions added
 8	- ExoPlayer integration for professional audio streaming
 9	
 10	### 2. **Service Connection**
 11	- Created MusicServiceConnection class
 12	- Handles MediaController setup and communication
 13	- Provides playback state callbacks
...
 91	
 92	### Key Components:
 93	- `MusicService`: Background audio service
 94	- `MusicServiceConnection`: Service binding and communication
 95	- `PlayerPresenter`: Business logic for playback
 96	- `PlayerActivity`: Full-screen player UI
 97	
 98	## Troubleshooting
 99	
 100	### If Music Doesn't Play:
 101	1. **Check Internet Connection**: Songs stream from online URLs
 102	2. **Check Audio Permissions**: Ensure app has audio permissions
 103	3. **Check Device Volume**: Make sure media volume is up
 104	4. **Check Logs**: Look for ExoPlayer errors in logcat
 105	
 106	### Common Issues:
 107	- **Network Error**: Check if URLs are accessible
 108	- **Permission Denied**: Ensure all audio permissions granted
 109	- **Service Not Starting**: Check AndroidManifest service registration
 110	
 111	## Next Steps

## Tm Tt Khc Phc Vn Khng Nghe c Nhc

### **Nhng Vn c Khc Phc:**

1. **Li Notification Permission**
 - Thm kim tra quyn `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` cho Android 13+
 - X l graceful khi khng c quyn notification

2. **Ci Thin Service Connection**
 - Thm explicit service start trc khi connect MediaController
 - Ci thin playback state handling vi `onIsPlayingChanged`
 - Thm logging chi tit debug

3. **Cp Nht URLs Audio**
 - Thay th SoundHelix URLs khng hot ng bng cc URLs test khc
 - S dng nhiu ngun audio khc nhau test

4. **Network Security**
 - Thm `android:usesCleartextTraffic="true"` cho php HTTP traffic

5. **Error Handling**
 - Thm Player.Listener catch playback errors
 - Thm logging cho MusicService v MusicServiceConnection

6. **Progress Updates**
 - Ci thin mechanism cp nht progress bar
 - m bo handler c cleanup ng cch

### **Cch Test:**

1. **Build v Install:**
 ```bash
 ./gradlew assembleDebug
 adb install app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk
 ```

2. **Kim tra Logs:**
 ```bash
 adb logcat -s MusicService MusicServiceConnection
 ```

3. **Test Steps:**
 - M ng dng
 - Chn bi ht t danh sch
 - Kim tra PlayerActivity m
 - Test play/pause, next/previous
 - Kim tra progress bar cp nht

### **Nu Vn Khng Hot ng:**

1. **Kim tra kt ni internet**
2. **Kim tra volume device**
3. **Xem logs tm li c th**
4. **Test trn device tht thay v emulator**

### **Files c Cp Nht:**

- `app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/service/NotificationHelper.kt`
- `app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/service/MusicServiceConnection.kt`
- `app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/service/MusicService.kt`
- `app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/data/api/MusicApiService.kt`
- `app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml`
- `MUSIC_PLAYBACK_TROUBLESHOOTING.md` (file hng dn mi)

ng dng by gi c ci thin ng k v s c kh nng pht nhc tt hn. Hy test v cho ti bit kt qu!

## Tm Tt Khc Phc Vn Khng Nghe c Nhc

### **Nhng Vn c Khc Phc:**

1. **Li Notification Permission**
 - Thm kim tra quyn `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` cho Android 13+
 - X l graceful khi khng c quyn notification

2. **Ci Thin Service Connection**
 - Thm explicit service start trc khi connect MediaController
 - Ci thin playback state handling vi `onIsPlayingChanged`
 - Thm logging chi tit debug

3. **Cp Nht URLs Audio**
 - Thay th SoundHelix URLs khng hot ng bng cc URLs test khc
 - S dng nhiu ngun audio khc nhau test

4. **Network Security**
 - Thm `android:usesCleartextTraffic="true"` cho php HTTP traffic

5. **Error Handling**
 - Thm Player.Listener catch playback errors
 - Thm logging cho MusicService v MusicServiceConnection

6. **Progress Updates**
 - Ci thin mechanism cp nht progress bar
 - m bo handler c cleanup ng cch

### **Cch Test:**

1. **Build v Install:**
 ```bash
 ./gradlew assembleDebug
 adb install app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk
 ```

2. **Kim tra Logs:**
 ```bash
 adb logcat -s MusicService MusicServiceConnection
 ```

3. **Test Steps:**
 - M ng dng
 - Chn bi ht t danh sch
 - Kim tra PlayerActivity m
 - Test play/pause, next/previous
 - Kim tra progress bar cp nht

### **Nu Vn Khng Hot ng:**

1. **Kim tra kt ni internet**
2. **Kim tra volume device**
3. **Xem logs tm li c th**
4. **Test trn device tht thay v emulator**

 3	import android.app.PendingIntent
 4	import android.content.Intent
 5	import android.os.Bundle
 6	import android.util.Log
 7	import androidx.media3.common.AudioAttributes
 8	import androidx.media3.common.C
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 10	import androidx.media3.common.MediaMetadata
 11	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 12	import androidx.media3.common.PlaybackException
 13	import androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer
 14	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSession
 15	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSessionService
 16	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.Futures
 17	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 18	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 19	import com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.MainActivity

 21	/**
 22	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 23	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 24	 */
 25	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 26	
 27	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 28	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 29	
 30	
 31	
 32	 override fun onCreate() {
 33	 super.onCreate()
 34	 Log.d(TAG, "MusicService onCreate")
 35	 initializePlayer()
 36	 initializeMediaSession()
 37	 }
 38	 
 39	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 40	 Log.d(TAG, "Initializing ExoPlayer")
 41	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 42	 .setAudioAttributes(
 43	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 44	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 45	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 46	 .build(),
 47	 true
 48	 )
 49	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 50	 .build()
 51	
 52	 // Add player listener for debugging
 53	 player.addListener(object : Player.Listener {
 54	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {
 55	 val stateString = when (playbackState) {
 56	 Player.STATE_IDLE -> "IDLE"
 57	 Player.STATE_BUFFERING -> "BUFFERING"
 58	 Player.STATE_READY -> "READY"
 59	 Player.STATE_ENDED -> "ENDED"
 60	 else -> "UNKNOWN"
 61	 }
 62	 Log.d(TAG, "Playback state changed to: $stateString")
 63	 }
 64	
 65	 override fun onPlayerError(error: PlaybackException) {
 66	 Log.e(TAG, "Player error: ${error.message}", error)
 67	 }
 68	 })
 69	 }
 70	 
 71	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 72	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 73	 this,
 74	 0,
 75	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 76	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 77	 )
 78	 
 79	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 80	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 81	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 82	 .build()
 83	 }
 84	 
 85	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 86	 return mediaSession
 87	 }
 88	 
 89	 override fun onDestroy() {
 90	 mediaSession?.run {
 91	 player.release()
 92	 release()
 93	 mediaSession = null
 94	 }
 95	 super.onDestroy()
 96	 }
 97	 
 98	 /**
 99	 * Custom MediaSession callback to handle media commands
 100	 */
 101	 private inner class MediaSessionCallback : MediaSession.Callback {
 102	
 103	 override fun onAddMediaItems(
 104	 mediaSession: MediaSession,
 105	 controller: MediaSession.ControllerInfo,
 106	 mediaItems: MutableList<MediaItem>
 107	 ): ListenableFuture<MutableList<MediaItem>> {
 108	 val updatedMediaItems = mediaItems.map { mediaItem ->
 109	 mediaItem.buildUpon()
 110	 .setUri(mediaItem.requestMetadata.mediaUri)
 111	 .build()
 112	 }.toMutableList()
 113	 return Futures.immediateFuture(updatedMediaItems)
 114	 }
 115	 }
 116	 
 117	 companion object {
 118	 private const val TAG = "MusicService"
 119	
 120	 /**
 121	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 122	 */
 123	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 124	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 125	 .setTitle(song.title)
 126	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 127	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 128	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 129	 .build()
 130	 
 131	 return MediaItem.Builder()
 132	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 133	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 134	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 135	 .build()
 136	 }
 137	 
 138	 /**
 139	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 140	 */
 141	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 142	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 143	 }
 144	 }
 145	}

 8	/**
 9	 * Presenter for the Player screen
 10	 * Handles business logic for music playback and communication between View and Service
 11	 */
 12	class PlayerPresenter(private val context: Context) : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 13	
 14	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 15	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 16	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 17	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 18	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 19	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 20	 private var musicServiceConnection: MusicServiceConnection? = null
 21	 
 22	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 23	 this.view = view
 24	 initializeMusicService()
 25	 }
 26	
 27	 override fun detachView() {
 28	 this.view = null
 29	 musicServiceConnection?.disconnect()
 30	 }
 31	
 32	 private fun initializeMusicService() {
 33	 musicServiceConnection = MusicServiceConnection(context)
 34	 musicServiceConnection?.setPlaybackStateListener(object : MusicServiceConnection.PlaybackStateListener {
 35	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 36	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 37	 }
 38	
 39	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 40	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 41	
 42	 // Update seek bar
 43	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 44	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 45	 } else 0
 46	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 47	 }
 48	
 49	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song?) {
 50	 song?.let {
 51	 currentSong = it
 52	 view?.showSongInfo(it)
 53	 }
 54	 }
 55	 })
 56	 musicServiceConnection?.connect()
 57	 }
 58	 
 59	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 60	 this.currentSong = song
 61	 this.playlist = playlist
 62	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 63	
 64	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 65	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 66	 updateNavigationButtons()
 67	
 68	 // Start playing the song
 69	 musicServiceConnection?.playPlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 70	 }
 71	
 72	 override fun playPause() {
 73	 musicServiceConnection?.playPause()
 74	 }
 75	
 76	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 77	 musicServiceConnection?.seekTo(position)
 78	 }
 79	 
 80	 override fun skipToNext() {
 81	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToNext()
 82	 updateNavigationButtons()
 83	 }
 84	
 85	 override fun skipToPrevious() {
 86	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToPrevious()
 87	 updateNavigationButtons()
 88	 }

Path: app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/service/MusicServiceConnection.kt
 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.content.ComponentName
 4	import android.content.Context
 5	import android.content.Intent
 6	import android.content.ServiceConnection
 7	import android.os.IBinder
 8	import android.util.Log
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 10	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 11	import androidx.media3.session.MediaController
 12	import androidx.media3.session.SessionToken
 13	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 14	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.MoreExecutors
 15	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 16	
 17	/**
 18	 * Service connection class to manage communication between UI and MusicService
 19	 * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods
 20	 */
 21	class MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {
 22	
 23	 private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null
 24	 private var mediaController: MediaController? = null
 25	 private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null
 26	
 27	 companion object {
 28	 private const val TAG = "MusicServiceConnection"
 29	 }
 30	 
 31	 interface PlaybackStateListener {
 32	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 33	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 34	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song?)
 35	 }
 36	 
 37	 fun setPlaybackStateListener(listener: PlaybackStateListener) {
 38	 this.playbackStateListener = listener
 39	 }
 40	 
 41	 fun connect() {
 42	 Log.d(TAG, "Connecting to MusicService...")
 43	 // Start the service first to ensure it's running
 44	 val serviceIntent = Intent(context, MusicService::class.java)
 45	 context.startService(serviceIntent)
 46	
 47	 val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))
 48	 mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()
 49	
 50	 mediaControllerFuture?.addListener({
 51	 try {
 52	 mediaController = mediaControllerFuture?.get()
 53	 Log.d(TAG, "MediaController connected successfully")
 54	 mediaController?.addListener(object : Player.Listener {
 55	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {
 56	 val isPlaying = mediaController?.isPlaying ?: false
 57	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying)
 58	 }
 59	
 60	 override fun onIsPlayingChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 61	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying)
 62	 }
 63	
 64	 override fun onPositionDiscontinuity(
 65	 oldPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 66	 newPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 67	 reason: Int
 68	 ) {
 69	 updateProgress()
 70	 }
 71	
 72	 override fun onMediaItemTransition(mediaItem: MediaItem?, reason: Int) {
 73	 // Handle song change
 74	 mediaItem?.let {
 75	 // Convert MediaItem back to Song if needed
 76	 playbackStateListener?.onSongChanged(null) // TODO: Convert MediaItem to Song
 77	 }
 78	 }
 79	 })
 80	
 81	 // Start progress updates
 82	 startProgressUpdates()
 83	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 84	 e.printStackTrace()
 85	 }
 86	 }, MoreExecutors.directExecutor())
 87	 }
 88	 
 89	 fun disconnect() {
 90	 mediaController?.release()
 91	 mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)
 92	 mediaController = null
 93	 mediaControllerFuture = null
 94	 }
 95	 
 96	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 97	 val mediaItem = MusicService.createMediaItem(song)
 98	 mediaController?.setMediaItem(mediaItem)
 99	 mediaController?.prepare()
 100	 mediaController?.play()
 101	 }
 102	 
 103	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 104	 Log.d(TAG, "playPlaylist called with ${songs.size} songs, startIndex: $startIndex")
 105	 val mediaItems = MusicService.createMediaItems(songs)
 106	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 107	 Log.d(TAG, "Setting media items and starting playback")
 108	 controller.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 109	 controller.prepare()
 110	 controller.play()
 111	 } ?: Log.e(TAG, "MediaController is null, cannot play playlist")
 112	 }
 113	 
 114	 fun playPause() {
 115	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 116	 if (controller.isPlaying) {
 117	 controller.pause()
 118	 } else {
 119	 controller.play()
 120	 }
 121	 }
 122	 }
 123	 
 124	 fun skipToNext() {
 125	 mediaController?.seekToNext()
 126	 }
 127	 
 128	 fun skipToPrevious() {
 129	 mediaController?.seekToPrevious()
 130	 }
 131	 
 132	 fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 133	 mediaController?.seekTo(position)
 134	 }

 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work
 44	
 45	## How to Test
 46	
 47	### 1. **Build and Install**
 48	```bash
 49	./gradlew assembleDebug
 50	# Install APK on device/emulator
 51	```

 21	/**
 22	 * Player Activity implementing MVP pattern
 23	 * Provides full-screen music player interface with controls
 24	 */
 25	class PlayerActivity : AppCompatActivity(), PlayerContract.View {
 26	
 27	 companion object {
 28	 const val EXTRA_SONG = "extra_song"
 29	 const val EXTRA_PLAYLIST = "extra_playlist"
 30	 }
...
 49	
 50	 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 51	 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 52	 setContentView(R.layout.activity_player)
 53	 
 54	 initializeViews()
 55	 setupToolbar()
 56	 setupSeekBar()
 57	 initializePresenter()
 58	 
 59	 // Get song and playlist from intent
 60	 val song = if (android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.TIRAMISU) {
 61	 intent.getParcelableExtra(EXTRA_SONG, Song::class.java)
 62	 } else {
 63	 @Suppress("DEPRECATION")
 64	 intent.getParcelableExtra<Song>(EXTRA_SONG)
 65	 }
 66	
 67	 val playlist = if (android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.TIRAMISU) {
 68	 intent.getParcelableArrayListExtra(EXTRA_PLAYLIST, Song::class.java) ?: emptyList()
 69	 } else {
 70	 @Suppress("DEPRECATION")
 71	 intent.getParcelableArrayListExtra<Song>(EXTRA_PLAYLIST) ?: emptyList()
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 if (song != null) {
 75	 presenter.initializePlayer(song, playlist)
 76	 } else {
 77	 finish() // Close activity if no song provided
 78	 }
 79	 }
 80	
 81	 private fun initializeViews() {
 82	 toolbar = findViewById(R.id.playerToolbar)
 83	 albumArtwork = findViewById(R.id.playerAlbumArtwork)
 84	 songTitle = findViewById(R.id.playerSongTitle)
 85	 artistName = findViewById(R.id.playerArtistName)
 86	 albumName = findViewById(R.id.playerAlbumName)
 87	 seekBar = findViewById(R.id.seekBar)
 88	 currentTime = findViewById(R.id.currentTime)
 89	 totalTime = findViewById(R.id.totalTime)
 90	 playPauseButton = findViewById(R.id.playPauseButton)
 91	 previousButton = findViewById(R.id.previousButton)

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "AUDIO_SYSTEM_DEBUG_GUIDE.md", "file_content": "# \ud83c\udfb5 Audio System Debug & Verification Guide\n\n## \u2705 Major Fixes Implemented\n\n### 1. **Service Connection Timing Issues**\n- \u2705 Added connection state tracking (`isConnected`)\n- \u2705 Implemented pending playlist queue for delayed execution\n- \u2705 Enhanced MediaController connection handling\n\n### 2. **Navigation Button Fixes**\n- \u2705 Fixed `skipToNext()` and `skipToPrevious()` methods\n- \u2705 Added proper MediaItem navigation (`seekToNextMediaItem()`)\n- \u2705 Enhanced currentIndex tracking in PlayerPresenter\n\n### 3. **Audio URL Updates**\n- \u2705 Replaced broken SoundHelix URLs with working test audio\n- \u2705 Added diverse audio formats (MP3, WAV) for testing\n- \u2705 Used reliable audio sources (UIC CS department, sample-videos.com)\n\n### 4. **ExoPlayer Enhancements**\n- \u2705 Added custom HTTP data source with timeout configuration\n- \u2705 Enhanced error handling for network and parsing errors\n- \u2705 Improved logging throughout the audio pipeline\n\n### 5. **Comprehensive Logging**\n- \u2705 Added detailed logs in all audio components\n- \u2705 Track MediaItem creation and playback states\n- \u2705 Monitor service connection and player events\n\n## \ud83e\uddea Step-by-Step Testing Protocol\n\n### **Phase 1: Build & Install**\n```bash\n# Clean build\n./gradlew clean\n\n# Build debug APK\n./gradlew assembleDebug\n\n# Install on device/emulator\nadb install app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk\n```\n\n### **Phase 2: Enable Debug Logging**\n```bash\n# Clear existing logs\nadb logcat -c\n\n# Start comprehensive logging\nadb logcat -s MusicService MusicServiceConnection PlayerPresenter ExoPlayer\n```\n\n### **Phase 3: Audio Playback Test**\n\n#### **Test 1: Basic Playback**\n1. Launch app\n2. Select first song from list\n3. **Expected**: PlayerActivity opens immediately\n4. **Expected**: Audio starts playing within 3-5 seconds\n5. **Expected**: Play/pause button shows \"pause\" icon\n6. **Expected**: Progress bar starts moving\n\n#### **Test 2: Navigation Controls**\n1. While music is playing, tap \"Next\" button\n2. **Expected**: Song changes to track 2\n3. **Expected**: Song title/artist updates in UI\n4. **Expected**: Audio switches seamlessly\n5. Tap \"Previous\" button\n6. **Expected**: Returns to track 1\n\n#### **Test 3: Seek Functionality**\n1. Drag progress bar to middle\n2. **Expected**: Audio jumps to new position\n3. **Expected**: Current time updates\n\n### **Phase 4: Log Analysis**\n\n#### **Successful Connection Logs:**\n```\nMusicServiceConnection: Connecting to MusicService...\nMusicService: MusicService onCreate\nMusicService: Initializing ExoPlayer\nMusicServiceConnection: MediaController connected successfully\nPlayerPresenter: initializePlayer called with song: [SONG_NAME]\nMusicServiceConnection: playPlaylist called with 7 songs, startIndex: 0\nMusicService: Creating MediaItem for song: [SONG_NAME]\nMusicService: Playback state changed to: BUFFERING\nMusicService: Playback state changed to: READY\n```\n\n#### **Error Indicators:**\n```\n# Network Issues\nMusicService: Player error: Unable to connect\nMusicService: Error code: [ERROR_CODE]\n\n# Service Connection Issues\nMusicServiceConnection: MediaController is null, cannot play playlist\n\n# Audio Format Issues\nMusicService: Media format error, skipping to next track\n```\n\n## \ud83d\udd27 Troubleshooting Common Issues\n\n### **Issue 1: No Audio Output**\n\n**Symptoms:**\n- PlayerActivity opens but no sound\n- Progress bar doesn't move\n- Play button doesn't change to pause\n\n**Debug Steps:**\n1. Check logs for \"Player error\" messages\n2. Verify internet connection\n3. Test with different audio URLs\n4. Check device volume settings\n\n**Solutions:**\n```bash\n# Test network connectivity\nadb shell ping -c 3 www2.cs.uic.edu\n\n# Check audio focus\nadb shell dumpsys audio | grep -A 5 \"Audio Focus\"\n\n# Verify service is running\nadb shell dumpsys activity services | grep MusicService\n```\n\n### **Issue 2: Navigation Buttons Not Working**\n\n**Symptoms:**\n- Next/Previous buttons don't change songs\n- UI doesn't update when buttons pressed\n\n**Debug Steps:**\n1. Look for \"skipToNext called\" in logs\n2. Check \"hasNextMediaItem\" status\n3. Verify playlist size > 1\n\n**Solutions:**\n- Ensure playlist has multiple songs\n- Check MediaController connection status\n- Verify currentIndex updates\n\n### **Issue 3: Service Connection Failures**\n\n**Symptoms:**\n- \"MediaController is null\" errors\n- Delayed or no audio playback\n- Connection timeout messages\n\n**Debug Steps:**\n1. Check service registration in AndroidManifest\n2. Verify MediaSession initialization\n3. Monitor connection timing\n\n## \ud83c\udfaf Verification Checklist\n\n### **\u2705 Audio Pipeline Verification**\n- [ ] MusicService starts successfully\n- [ ] ExoPlayer initializes without errors\n- [ ] MediaController connects within 5 seconds\n- [ ] MediaItems are created with valid URIs\n- [ ] Playback state changes from IDLE \u2192 BUFFERING \u2192 READY\n- [ ] Audio output is audible\n\n### **\u2705 Navigation Verification**\n- [ ] Next button advances to next track\n- [ ] Previous button goes to previous track\n- [ ] Song information updates in UI\n- [ ] Progress bar resets for new tracks\n- [ ] Navigation works at playlist boundaries\n\n### **\u2705 UI Responsiveness**\n- [ ] Play/pause button toggles correctly\n- [ ] Progress bar updates smoothly\n- [ ] Seek bar responds to touch\n- [ ] Song metadata displays correctly\n\n## \ud83d\ude80 Performance Optimization\n\n### **Network Optimization**\n- Connection timeout: 30 seconds\n- Read timeout: 30 seconds\n- Cross-protocol redirects enabled\n- Custom User-Agent for better compatibility\n\n### **Memory Management**\n- Proper MediaController cleanup on disconnect\n- ExoPlayer release on service destroy\n- Handler cleanup for progress updates\n\n## \ud83d\udcca Expected Test Results\n\n### **Successful Test Output:**\n```\n\u2705 App launches without crashes\n\u2705 Song list loads with 7 test tracks\n\u2705 Tapping song opens PlayerActivity\n\u2705 Audio starts within 5 seconds\n\u2705 Progress bar moves smoothly\n\u2705 Next/Previous buttons work\n\u2705 Seek functionality responsive\n\u2705 No error messages in logs\n```\n\n### **Performance Benchmarks:**\n- App launch time: < 3 seconds\n- Audio start time: < 5 seconds\n- Navigation response: < 1 second\n- Memory usage: < 100MB\n- CPU usage: < 10% during playback\n\n## \ud83d\udd0d Advanced Debugging\n\n### **Network Analysis:**\n```bash\n# Monitor network requests\nadb shell tcpdump -i any -w /sdcard/network.pcap\n\n# Check DNS resolution\nadb shell nslookup www2.cs.uic.edu\n```\n\n### **Audio System Analysis:**\n```bash\n# Check audio devices\nadb shell dumpsys audio | grep -A 10 \"Audio Devices\"\n\n# Monitor audio sessions\nadb shell dumpsys media.audio_flinger\n```\n\nThis comprehensive testing protocol should verify that all audio playback and navigation issues have been IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "test_audio_urls.py", "file_content": "#!/usr/bin/env python3\n\"\"\"\nAudio URL Testing Script for Music Player App\nTests all audio URLs used in the app to verify they are accessible\n\"\"\"\n\nimport requests\nimport time\nfrom urllib.parse import urlparse\n\n# Audio URLs from the app\nAUDIO_URLS = [\n \"https://sample-videos.com/zip/10/mp3/mp3-15s.mp3\",\n \"https://www.soundjay.com/misc/sounds/bell-ringing-05.mp3\", \n \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/BabyElephantWalk60.wav\",\n \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/CantinaBand60.wav\",\n \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/ImperialMarch60.wav\",\n \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/PinkPanther60.wav\",\n \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/StarWars60.wav\"\n]\n\ndef test_url(url, timeout=30):\n \"\"\"Test if a URL is accessible and returns audio content\"\"\"\n try:\n print(f\"Testing: {url}\")\n \n # Parse URL\n parsed = urlparse(url)\n print(f\" Host: {parsed.netloc}\")\n print(f\" Path: {parsed.path}\")\n \n # Make HEAD request first to check if resource exists\n head_response = requests.head(url, timeout=timeout, allow_redirects=True)\n print(f\" HEAD Status: {head_response.status_code}\")\n \n if head_response.status_code == 200:\n content_type = head_response.headers.get('content-type', 'unknown')\n content_length = head_response.headers.get('content-length', 'unknown')\n print(f\" Content-Type: {content_type}\")\n print(f\" Content-Length: {content_length} bytes\")\n \n # Check if it's audio content\n if 'audio' in content_type.lower() or url.endswith(('.mp3', '.wav', '.ogg')):\n print(f\" \u2705 VALID AUDIO URL\")\n return True\n else:\n print(f\" \u26a0\ufe0f WARNING: Not audio content\")\n return False\n else:\n print(f\" \u274c FAILED: HTTP {head_response.status_code}\")\n return False\n \n except requests.exceptions.Timeout:\n print(f\" \u274c FAILED: Timeout after {timeout}s\")\n return False\n except requests.exceptions.ConnectionError:\n print(f\" \u274c FAILED: Connection error\")\n return False\n except Exception as e:\n print(f\" \u274c FAILED: {str(e)}\")\n return False\n\ndef main():\n \"\"\"Test all audio URLs\"\"\"\n print(\"\ud83c\udfb5 Music Player Audio URL Testing\")\n print(\"=\" * 50)\n \n results = []\n \n for i, url in enumerate(AUDIO_URLS, 1):\n print(f\"\\n[{i}/{len(AUDIO_URLS)}] Testing URL...\")\n success = test_url(url)\n results.append((url, success))\n time.sleep(1) # Be nice to servers\n \n # Summary\n print(\"\\n\" + \"=\" * 50)\n print(\"\ud83d\udcca SUMMARY\")\n print(\"=\" * 50)\n \n working_urls = [url for url, success in results if success]\n broken_urls = [url for url, success in results if not success]\n \n print(f\"\u2705 Working URLs: {len(working_urls)}/{len(AUDIO_URLS)}\")\n print(f\"\u274c Broken URLs: {len(broken_urls)}/{len(AUDIO_URLS)}\")\n \n if broken_urls:\n print(\"\\n\ud83d\udea8 BROKEN URLs that need replacement:\")\n for url in broken_urls:\n print(f\" - {url}\")\n \n print(\"\\n\ud83d\udca1 Suggested replacement URLs:\")\n print(\" - https://www.soundjay.com/misc/sounds/bell-ringing-05.mp3\")\n print(\" - https://sample-videos.com/zip/10/mp3/mp3-15s.mp3\")\n print(\" - https://file-examples.com/storage/fe68c8777b8ee92c7178b6d/2017/11/file_example_MP3_700KB.mp3\")\n \n if len(working_urls) >= 3:\n print(\"\\n\ud83c\udf89 RESULT: Sufficient working URLs for testing!\")\n print(\" The app should be able to play audio successfully.\")\n else:\n print(\"\\n\u26a0\ufe0f WARNING: Too few working URLs!\")\n print(\" Consider updating the audio URLs in MusicApiService.kt\")\n \n return len(working_urls) >= 3\n\nif __name__ == \"__main__\":\n success = main()\n exit(0 if success else 1)"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"By gi hy to mt script test t ng kim tra cc URLs audio:

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.app.PendingIntent
 4	import android.content.Intent
 5	import android.os.Bundle
 6	import androidx.media3.common.AudioAttributes
 7	import androidx.media3.common.C
 8	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaMetadata
 10	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 11	import androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer
 12	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSession
 13	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSessionService
 14	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.Futures
 15	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 16	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 17	import com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.MainActivity
 18	
 19	/**
 20	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 21	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 22	 */
 23	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 24	 
 25	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 26	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 27	 
 28	 override fun onCreate() {
 29	 super.onCreate()
 30	 initializePlayer()
 31	 initializeMediaSession()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 35	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 36	 .setAudioAttributes(
 37	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 38	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 39	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 40	 .build(),
 41	 true
 42	 )
 43	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 44	 .build()
 45	 }
 46	 
 47	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 48	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 49	 this,
 50	 0,
 51	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 52	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 53	 )
 54	 
 55	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 56	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 57	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 58	 .build()
 59	 }
 60	 
 61	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 62	 return mediaSession
 63	 }
 64	 
 65	 override fun onDestroy() {
 66	 mediaSession?.run {
 67	 player.release()
 68	 release()
 69	 mediaSession = null
 70	 }
 71	 super.onDestroy()
 72	 }

 92	 
 93	 companion object {
 94	 /**
 95	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 96	 */
 97	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 98	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 99	 .setTitle(song.title)
 100	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 101	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 102	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 103	 .build()
 104	 
 105	 return MediaItem.Builder()
 106	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 107	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 108	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 109	 .build()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 /**
 113	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 114	 */
 115	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 116	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 117	 }
 118	 }
 119	}

Path: MUSIC_PLAYBACK_GUIDE.md
 1	# Music Playback Implementation Guide
 2	
 3	## What Has Been Fixed
 4	
 5	### 1. **MusicService Integration**
 6	- MusicService properly registered in AndroidManifest.xml
 7	- All required audio permissions added
 8	- ExoPlayer integration for professional audio streaming
 9	
 10	### 2. **Service Connection**
 11	- Created MusicServiceConnection class
 12	- Handles MediaController setup and communication
 13	- Provides playback state callbacks
...
 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work
 44	
 45	## How to Test
 46	
 47	### 1. **Build and Install**
 48	```bash
 49	./gradlew assembleDebug
 50	# Install APK on device/emulator
 51	```
...
 72	
 73	The app includes 7 sample songs:
 74	1. **"12600 lettres (Dbat)"** - Franco & TP OK Jazz
 75	2. **"Again & Again"** - Usatof
 76	3. **"Ain't No Mountain High Enough"** - Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell
 77	4. **"All I Have to Do Is Dream"** - The Everly Brothers
 78	5. **"All Night"** - Siddy Ranks
 79	6. **"Escape (The Pia Colada Song)"** - Rupert Holmes
 80	7. **"September"** - Earth, Wind & Fire
 81	
 82	All songs use SoundHelix demo tracks for testing.
 83	
 84	## Technical Details
 85	
 86	### Architecture:
 87	- **MVP Pattern**: Clean separation of concerns
 88	- **ExoPlayer**: Professional audio streaming
 89	- **MediaSession**: System integration for media controls
 90	- **Background Service**: Continues playback when app is minimized
 91	
 92	### Key Components:
 93	- `MusicService`: Background audio service
 94	- `MusicServiceConnection`: Service binding and communication
 95	- `PlayerPresenter`: Business logic for playback
 96	- `PlayerActivity`: Full-screen player UI
 97	
 98	## Troubleshooting
 99	
 100	### If Music Doesn't Play:
 101	1. **Check Internet Connection**: Songs stream from online URLs
 102	2. **Check Audio Permissions**: Ensure app has audio permissions
 103	3. **Check Device Volume**: Make sure media volume is up
 104	4. **Check Logs**: Look for ExoPlayer errors in logcat
 105	
 106	### Common Issues:
 107	- **Network Error**: Check if URLs are accessible
 108	- **Permission Denied**: Ensure all audio permissions granted
 109	- **Service Not Starting**: Check AndroidManifest service registration
 110	
 111	## Next Steps

 15	
 16	/**
 17	 * Service connection class to manage communication between UI and MusicService
 18	 * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods
 19	 */
 20	class MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {
 21	 
 22	 private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null
 23	 private var mediaController: MediaController? = null
 24	 private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null
 25	 
 26	 interface PlaybackStateListener {
 27	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 28	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 29	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song?)
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 fun setPlaybackStateListener(listener: PlaybackStateListener) {
 33	 this.playbackStateListener = listener
 34	 }
 35	 
 36	 fun connect() {
 37	 val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))
 38	 mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()
 39	 
 40	 mediaControllerFuture?.addListener({
 41	 try {
 42	 mediaController = mediaControllerFuture?.get()
 43	 mediaController?.addListener(object : Player.Listener {
 44	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {
 45	 val isPlaying = playbackState == Player.STATE_READY && mediaController?.playWhenReady == true
 46	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying)
 47	 }
 48	 
 49	 override fun onPositionDiscontinuity(
 50	 oldPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 51	 newPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 52	 reason: Int
 53	 ) {
 54	 updateProgress()
 55	 }
 56	 
 57	 override fun onMediaItemTransition(mediaItem: MediaItem?, reason: Int) {
 58	 // Handle song change
 59	 mediaItem?.let {
 60	 // Convert MediaItem back to Song if needed
 61	 playbackStateListener?.onSongChanged(null) // TODO: Convert MediaItem to Song
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 })
 65	 
 66	 // Start progress updates
 67	 startProgressUpdates()
 68	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 69	 e.printStackTrace()
 70	 }
 71	 }, MoreExecutors.directExecutor())
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 fun disconnect() {
 75	 mediaController?.release()
 76	 mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)
 77	 mediaController = null
 78	 mediaControllerFuture = null
 79	 }
 80	 
 81	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 82	 val mediaItem = MusicService.createMediaItem(song)
 83	 mediaController?.setMediaItem(mediaItem)
 84	 mediaController?.prepare()
 85	 mediaController?.play()
 86	 }
 87	 
 88	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 89	 val mediaItems = MusicService.createMediaItems(songs)
 90	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 91	 mediaController?.prepare()
 92	 mediaController?.play()
 93	 }
 94	 
 95	 fun playPause() {
 96	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 97	 if (controller.isPlaying) {
 98	 controller.pause()
 99	 } else {
 100	 controller.play()
 101	 }
 102	 }
 103	 }
 104	 
 105	 fun skipToNext() {
 106	 mediaController?.seekToNext()
 107	 }
 108	 
 109	 fun skipToPrevious() {
 110	 mediaController?.seekToPrevious()
 111	 }
 112	 
 113	 fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 114	 mediaController?.seekTo(position)
 115	 }
 116	 
 117	 fun isPlaying(): Boolean {
 118	 return mediaController?.isPlaying ?: false
 119	 }
 120	 
 121	 fun getCurrentPosition(): Long {
 122	 return mediaController?.currentPosition ?: 0L
 123	 }
 124	 
 125	 fun getDuration(): Long {
 126	 return mediaController?.duration ?: 0L
 127	 }
 128	 
 129	 private fun startProgressUpdates() {
 130	 // This would typically use a handler or coroutine to update progress regularly
 131	 // For now, we'll rely on the Player.Listener callbacks
 132	 }

 63

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.contract
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 4	
 5	/**
 6	 * Contract interface for Player screen MVP pattern
 7	 * Defines the communication between View, Presenter, and Model for music playback
 8	 */
 9	interface PlayerContract {
 10	 
 11	 /**
 12	 * View interface - defines what the Player View can do
 13	 */
 14	 interface View {
 15	 fun showSongInfo(song: Song)
 16	 fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean)
 17	 fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long)
 18	 fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int)

 59	 /**

 62	 fun createNotification(
 63	 song: Song,
 64	 isPlaying: Boolean,
 65	 canGoPrevious: Boolean = true,
 66	 canGoNext: Boolean = true
 67	 ): android.app.Notification {
 68	 
 69	 // Intent to open the player activity when notification is tapped

 71	 putExtra(PlayerActivity.EXTRA_SONG, song)
 72	 flags = Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_SINGLE_TOP
 73	 }

 75	 context,
 76	 0,

 79	 )
 80	 
 81	 // Create action intents
 82	 val playPauseIntent = createActionIntent(ACTION_PLAY_PAUSE)
 83	 val previousIntent = createActionIntent(ACTION_PREVIOUS)
 84	 val nextIntent = createActionIntent(ACTION_NEXT)
 85	 val stopIntent = createActionIntent(ACTION_STOP)
 86	 
 87	 // Build the notification

 89	 .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.ic_music_note)
 90	 .setContentTitle(song.title)
 91	 .setContentText(song.getArtistAlbumText())
 92	 .setSubText(song.album)
 93	 .setContentIntent(contentPendingIntent)
 94	 .setDeleteIntent(stopIntent)
 95	 .setVisibility(NotificationCompat.VISIBILITY_PUBLIC)
 96	 .setOnlyAlertOnce(true)
 97	 .setShowWhen(false)
 98	 .setCategory(NotificationCompat.CATEGORY_TRANSPORT)
 99	 .setPriority(NotificationCompat.PRIORITY_LOW)

Path: MUSIC_PLAYBACK_GUIDE.md
...
 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work
 44	
 45	## How to Test
 46	
 47	### 1. **Build and Install**
 48	```bash
 49	./gradlew assembleDebug
 50	# Install APK on device/emulator
 51	```

 32	 private fun initializeMusicService() {
 33	 musicServiceConnection = MusicServiceConnection(context)
 34	 musicServiceConnection?.setPlaybackStateListener(object : MusicServiceConnection.PlaybackStateListener {
 35	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 36	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 37	 }
 38	
 39	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 40	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 41	
 42	 // Update seek bar
 43	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 44	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 45	 } else 0
 46	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 47	 }
 48	
 49	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song?) {
 50	 song?.let {
 51	 currentSong = it
 52	 view?.showSongInfo(it)
 53	 }
 54	 }
 55	 })
 56	 musicServiceConnection?.connect()
 57	 }
 58	 
 59	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 60	 this.currentSong = song
 61	 this.playlist = playlist
 62	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 63	
 64	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 65	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 66	 updateNavigationButtons()
 67	
 68	 // Start playing the song
 69	 musicServiceConnection?.playPlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 70	 }
 71	
 72	 override fun playPause() {
 73	 musicServiceConnection?.playPause()
 74	 }
 75	
 76	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 77	 musicServiceConnection?.seekTo(position)
 78	 }
 79	 
 80	 override fun skipToNext() {
 81	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToNext()
 82	 updateNavigationButtons()
 83	 }
 84	
 85	 override fun skipToPrevious() {
 86	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToPrevious()
 87	 updateNavigationButtons()
 88	 }

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.content.ComponentName
 4	import android.content.Context
 5	import android.content.Intent
 6	import android.content.ServiceConnection
 7	import android.os.IBinder
 8	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 9	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 10	import androidx.media3.session.MediaController
 11	import androidx.media3.session.SessionToken
 12	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 13	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.MoreExecutors
 14	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 15	
 16	/**
 17	 * Service connection class to manage communication between UI and MusicService
 18	 * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods
 19	 */
 20	class MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {
 21	 
 22	 private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null
 23	 private var mediaController: MediaController? = null
 24	 private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null
 25	 
 26	 interface PlaybackStateListener {
 27	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 28	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 29	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song?)
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 fun setPlaybackStateListener(listener: PlaybackStateListener) {
 33	 this.playbackStateListener = listener
 34	 }
 35	 
 36	 fun connect() {
 37	 val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))
 38	 mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()
 39	 
 40	 mediaControllerFuture?.addListener({
 41	 try {
 42	 mediaController = mediaControllerFuture?.get()
 43	 mediaController?.addListener(object : Player.Listener {
 44	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {
 45	 val isPlaying = playbackState == Player.STATE_READY && mediaController?.playWhenReady == true
 46	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying)
 47	 }
 48	 
 49	 override fun onPositionDiscontinuity(
 50	 oldPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 51	 newPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 52	 reason: Int
 53	 ) {
 54	 updateProgress()
 55	 }
 56	 
 57	 override fun onMediaItemTransition(mediaItem: MediaItem?, reason: Int) {
 58	 // Handle song change
 59	 mediaItem?.let {
 60	 // Convert MediaItem back to Song if needed
 61	 playbackStateListener?.onSongChanged(null) // TODO: Convert MediaItem to Song
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 })
 65	 
 66	 // Start progress updates
 67	 startProgressUpdates()
 68	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 69	 e.printStackTrace()
 70	 }
 71	 }, MoreExecutors.directExecutor())
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 fun disconnect() {
 75	 mediaController?.release()
 76	 mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)
 77	 mediaController = null
 78	 mediaControllerFuture = null
 79	 }
 80	 
 81	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 82	 val mediaItem = MusicService.createMediaItem(song)
 83	 mediaController?.setMediaItem(mediaItem)
 84	 mediaController?.prepare()
 85	 mediaController?.play()
 86	 }
 87	 
 88	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 89	 val mediaItems = MusicService.createMediaItems(songs)
 90	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 91	 mediaController?.prepare()
 92	 mediaController?.play()
 93	 }

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.presenter
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.MainContract
 4	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 5	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.repository.MusicRepository
 6	import kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineScope
 7	import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
 8	import kotlinx.coroutines.Job
 9	import kotlinx.coroutines.launch
 10	import kotlinx.coroutines.withContext
 11	
 12	/**
 13	 * Presenter for the Main screen
 14	 * Handles business logic and communication between View and Model
 15	 */
 16	class MainPresenter(
 17	 private val repository: MusicRepository = MusicRepository.getInstance()
 18	) : MainContract.Presenter {
 19	 
 20	 private var view: MainContract.View? = null
 21	 private val presenterScope = CoroutineScope(Dispatchers.Main + Job())
 22	 private var currentSongs: List<Song> = emptyList()
 23	 private var searchJob: Job? = null
 24	 
 25	 override fun attachView(view: MainContract.View) {
 26	 this.view = view
 27	 }
 28	 
 29	 override fun detachView() {
 30	 this.view = null
 31	 searchJob?.cancel()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 override fun loadSongs() {
 35	 view?.showLoading()
 36	 
 37	 presenterScope.launch {
 38	 try {
 39	 val result = repository.getAllSongs()
 40	 
 41	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 42	 view?.hideLoading()
 43	 
 44	 result.fold(
 45	 onSuccess = { songs ->
 46	 currentSongs = songs
 47	 if (songs.isEmpty()) {
 48	 view?.showEmptyState()
 49	 } else {
 50	 view?.showSongs(songs)
 51	 }
 52	 },
 53	 onFailure = { exception ->
 54	 view?.showError(exception.message ?: "Failed to load songs")
 55	 }
 56	 )
 57	 }
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 60	 view?.hideLoading()
 61	 view?.showError(e.message ?: "An unexpected error occurred")
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 }
 65	 }
 66	 
 67	 override fun onSongClicked(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 68	 view?.navigateToPlayer(song, playlist)
 69	 }
 70	 
 71	 override fun searchSongs(query: String) {
 72	 if (query.isBlank()) {
 73	 clearSearch()
 74	 return
 75	 }
 76	 
 77	 // Cancel previous search
 78	 searchJob?.cancel()
 79	 
 80	 searchJob = presenterScope.launch {
 81	 try {
 82	 val result = repository.searchSongs(query)
 83	 
 84	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 85	 result.fold(
 86	 onSuccess = { songs ->
 87	 view?.showSearchResults(songs)
 88	 },
 89	 onFailure = { exception ->
 90	 view?.showError(exception.message ?: "Search failed")
 91	 }
 92	 )
 93	 }
 94	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 95	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 96	 view?.showError(e.message ?: "Search failed")
 97	 }
 98	 }
 99	 }
 100	 }
 101	 
 102	 override fun clearSearch() {
 103	 searchJob?.cancel()
 104	 view?.clearSearchResults()
 105	 view?.showSongs(currentSongs)
 106	 }
 107	 
 108	 override fun refreshSongs() {
 109	 loadSongs()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 override fun onCurrentSongChanged(song: Song?) {
 113	 view?.updateCurrentPlayingSong(song)
 114	 }
 115	}

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.app.PendingIntent
 4	import android.content.Intent
 5	import android.os.Bundle
 6	import androidx.media3.common.AudioAttributes
 7	import androidx.media3.common.C
 8	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaMetadata
 10	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 11	import androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer
 12	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSession
 13	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSessionService
 14	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.Futures
 15	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 16	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 17	import com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.MainActivity
 18	
 19	/**
 20	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 21	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 22	 */
 23	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 24	 
 25	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 26	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 27	 
 28	 override fun onCreate() {
 29	 super.onCreate()
 30	 initializePlayer()
 31	 initializeMediaSession()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 35	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 36	 .setAudioAttributes(
 37	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 38	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 39	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 40	 .build(),
 41	 true
 42	 )
 43	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 44	 .build()
 45	 }
 46	 
 47	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 48	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 49	 this,
 50	 0,
 51	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 52	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 53	 )
 54	 
 55	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 56	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 57	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 58	 .build()
 59	 }
 60	 
 61	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 62	 return mediaSession
 63	 }
 64	 
 65	 override fun onDestroy() {
 66	 mediaSession?.run {
 67	 player.release()
 68	 release()
 69	 mediaSession = null
 70	 }
 71	 super.onDestroy()
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 /**
 75	 * Custom MediaSession callback to handle media commands
 76	 */
 77	 private inner class MediaSessionCallback : MediaSession.Callback {
 78	
 79	 override fun onAddMediaItems(
 80	 mediaSession: MediaSession,
 81	 controller: MediaSession.ControllerInfo,
 82	 mediaItems: MutableList<MediaItem>
 83	 ): ListenableFuture<MutableList<MediaItem>> {
 84	 val updatedMediaItems = mediaItems.map { mediaItem ->
 85	 mediaItem.buildUpon()
 86	 .setUri(mediaItem.requestMetadata.mediaUri)
 87	 .build()
 88	 }.toMutableList()
 89	 return Futures.immediateFuture(updatedMediaItems)
 90	 }
 91	 }
 92	 
 93	 companion object {
 94	 /**
 95	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 96	 */
 97	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 98	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 99	 .setTitle(song.title)
 100	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 101	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 102	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 103	 .build()
 104	 
 105	 return MediaItem.Builder()
 106	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 107	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 108	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 109	 .build()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 /**
 113	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 114	 */
 115	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 116	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 117	 }
 118	 }
 119	}

 7	
 8	/**
 9	 * Presenter for the Player screen
 10	 * Handles business logic for music playback and communication between View and Service
 11	 */
 12	class PlayerPresenter(private val context: Context) : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 13	
 14	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 15	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 16	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 17	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 18	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 19	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 20	 private var musicServiceConnection: MusicServiceConnection? = null
 21	 
 22	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 23	 this.view = view
 24	 initializeMusicService()
 25	 }
 26	
 27	 override fun detachView() {
 28	 this.view = null
 29	 musicServiceConnection?.disconnect()
 30	 }
 31	
 32	 private fun initializeMusicService() {
 33	 musicServiceConnection = MusicServiceConnection(context)
 34	 musicServiceConnection?.setPlaybackStateListener(object : MusicServiceConnection.PlaybackStateListener {
 35	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 36	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 37	 }
 38	
 39	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 40	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 41	
 42	 // Update seek bar
 43	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 44	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 45	 } else 0
 46	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 47	 }
 48	
 49	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song?) {
 50	 song?.let {
 51	 currentSong = it
 52	 view?.showSongInfo(it)
 53	 }
 54	 }
 55	 })
 56	 musicServiceConnection?.connect()
 57	 }
 58	 
 59	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 60	 this.currentSong = song
 61	 this.playlist = playlist
 62	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 63	
 64	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 65	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 66	 updateNavigationButtons()
 67	
 68	 // Start playing the song
 69	 musicServiceConnection?.playPlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 70	 }
 71	
 72	 override fun playPause() {
 73	 musicServiceConnection?.playPause()
 74	 }
 75	
 76	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 77	 musicServiceConnection?.seekTo(position)
 78	 }
 79	 
 80	 override fun skipToNext() {
 81	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToNext()
 82	 updateNavigationButtons()
 83	 }
 84	
 85	 override fun skipToPrevious() {
 86	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToPrevious()
 87	 updateNavigationButtons()
 88	 }

Path: app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/service/MusicServiceConnection.kt
 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.content.ComponentName
 4	import android.content.Context
 5	import android.content.Intent
 6	import android.content.ServiceConnection
 7	import android.os.IBinder
 8	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 9	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 10	import androidx.media3.session.MediaController
 11	import androidx.media3.session.SessionToken
 12	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 13	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.MoreExecutors
 14	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 15	
 16	/**
 17	 * Service connection class to manage communication between UI and MusicService
 18	 * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods
 19	 */
 20	class MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {
 21	 
 22	 private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null
 23	 private var mediaController: MediaController? = null
 24	 private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null
 25	 
 26	 interface PlaybackStateListener {
 27	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 28	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 29	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song?)
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 fun setPlaybackStateListener(listener: PlaybackStateListener) {
 33	 this.playbackStateListener = listener
 34	 }
 35	 
 36	 fun connect() {
 37	 val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))
 38	 mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()
 39	 
 40	 mediaControllerFuture?.addListener({
 41	 try {
 42	 mediaController = mediaControllerFuture?.get()
 43	 mediaController?.addListener(object : Player.Listener {
 44	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {
 45	 val isPlaying = playbackState == Player.STATE_READY && mediaController?.playWhenReady == true
 46	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying)
 47	 }
 48	 
 49	 override fun onPositionDiscontinuity(
 50	 oldPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 51	 newPosition: Player.PositionInfo,
 52	 reason: Int
 53	 ) {
 54	 updateProgress()
 55	 }
 56	 
 57	 override fun onMediaItemTransition(mediaItem: MediaItem?, reason: Int) {
 58	 // Handle song change
 59	 mediaItem?.let {
 60	 // Convert MediaItem back to Song if needed
 61	 playbackStateListener?.onSongChanged(null) // TODO: Convert MediaItem to Song
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 })
 65	 
 66	 // Start progress updates
 67	 startProgressUpdates()
 68	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 69	 e.printStackTrace()
 70	 }
 71	 }, MoreExecutors.directExecutor())
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 fun disconnect() {
 75	 mediaController?.release()
 76	 mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)
 77	 mediaController = null
 78	 mediaControllerFuture = null
 79	 }
 80	 
 81	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 82	 val mediaItem = MusicService.createMediaItem(song)
 83	 mediaController?.setMediaItem(mediaItem)
 84	 mediaController?.prepare()
 85	 mediaController?.play()
 86	 }
 87	 
 88	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 89	 val mediaItems = MusicService.createMediaItems(songs)
 90	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 91	 mediaController?.prepare()
 92	 mediaController?.play()
 93	 }
 94	 
 95	 fun playPause() {
 96	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 97	 if (controller.isPlaying) {
 98	 controller.pause()
 99	 } else {
 100	 controller.play()
 101	 }
 102	 }
 103	 }
 104	 
 105	 fun skipToNext() {
 106	 mediaController?.seekToNext()
 107	 }
 108	 
 109	 fun skipToPrevious() {
 110	 mediaController?.seekToPrevious()
 111	 }
 112	 
 113	 fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 114	 mediaController?.seekTo(position)
 115	 }
 116	 
 117	 fun isPlaying(): Boolean {
 118	 return mediaController?.isPlaying ?: false
 119	 }
 120	 
 121	 fun getCurrentPosition(): Long {
 122	 return mediaController?.currentPosition ?: 0L
 123	 }
 124	 
 125	 fun getDuration(): Long {
 126	 return mediaController?.duration ?: 0L
 127	 }
 128	 
 129	 private fun startProgressUpdates() {
 130	 // Start a coroutine to update progress regularly
 131	 android.os.Handler(android.os.Looper.getMainLooper()).post(object : Runnable {
 132	 override fun run() {
 133	 updateProgress()
 134	 android.os.Handler(android.os.Looper.getMainLooper()).postDelayed(this, 1000) // Update every second
 135	 }
 136	 })
 137	 }
 138	 
 139	 private fun updateProgress() {
 140	 val position = getCurrentPosition()
 141	 val duration = getDuration()
 142	 playbackStateListener?.onProgressUpdate(position, duration)
 143	 }
 144	}

 1	# Music Playback Implementation Guide
 2	
 3	## What Has Been Fixed
 4	
 5	### 1. **MusicService Integration**
 6	- MusicService properly registered in AndroidManifest.xml
 7	- All required audio permissions added
 8	- ExoPlayer integration for professional audio streaming
 9	
 10	### 2. **Service Connection**
 11	- Created MusicServiceConnection class
 12	- Handles MediaController setup and communication
 13	- Provides playback state callbacks
...
 91	
 92	### Key Components:
 93	- `MusicService`: Background audio service
 94	- `MusicServiceConnection`: Service binding and communication
 95	- `PlayerPresenter`: Business logic for playback
 96	- `PlayerActivity`: Full-screen player UI
 97	
 98	## Troubleshooting
 99	
 100	### If Music Doesn't Play:
 101	1. **Check Internet Connection**: Songs stream from online URLs
 102	2. **Check Audio Permissions**: Ensure app has audio permissions
 103	3. **Check Device Volume**: Make sure media volume is up
 104	4. **Check Logs**: Look for ExoPlayer errors in logcat
 105	
 106	### Common Issues:
 107	- **Network Error**: Check if URLs are accessible
 108	- **Permission Denied**: Ensure all audio permissions granted
 109	- **Service Not Starting**: Check AndroidManifest service registration
 110	
 111	## Next Steps

 3	import android.app.PendingIntent
 4	import android.content.Intent
 5	import android.os.Bundle
 6	import android.util.Log
 7	import androidx.media3.common.AudioAttributes
 8	import androidx.media3.common.C
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 10	import androidx.media3.common.MediaMetadata
 11	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 12	import androidx.media3.common.PlaybackException
 13	import androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer
 14	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSession
 15	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSessionService
 16	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.Futures
 17	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 18	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 19	import com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.MainActivity
 20	
 21	/**
 22	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 23	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 24	 */
 25	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 26	
 27	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 28	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 29	
 30	
 31	
 32	 override fun onCreate() {
 33	 super.onCreate()
 34	 Log.d(TAG, "MusicService onCreate")
 35	 initializePlayer()
 36	 initializeMediaSession()
 37	 }
 38	 
 39	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 40	 Log.d(TAG, "Initializing ExoPlayer")
 41	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 42	 .setAudioAttributes(
 43	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 44	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 45	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 46	 .build(),
 47	 true
 48	 )
 49	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 50	 .build()
 51	
 52	 // Add player listener for debugging
 53	 player.addListener(object : Player.Listener {
 54	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {
 55	 val stateString = when (playbackState) {
 56	 Player.STATE_IDLE -> "IDLE"
 57	 Player.STATE_BUFFERING -> "BUFFERING"
 58	 Player.STATE_READY -> "READY"
 59	 Player.STATE_ENDED -> "ENDED"
 60	 else -> "UNKNOWN"
 61	 }
 62	 Log.d(TAG, "Playback state changed to: $stateString")
 63	 }
 64	
 65	 override fun onPlayerError(error: PlaybackException) {
 66	 Log.e(TAG, "Player error: ${error.message}", error)
 67	 }
 68	 })
 69	 }
 70	 
 71	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 72	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 73	 this,
 74	 0,
 75	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 76	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 77	 )
 78	 
 79	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 80	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 81	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 82	 .build()
 83	 }
 84	 
 85	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 86	 return mediaSession
 87	 }
 88	 
 89	 override fun onDestroy() {
 90	 mediaSession?.run {
 91	 player.release()
 92	 release()
 93	 mediaSession = null
 94	 }
 95	 super.onDestroy()
 96	 }
 97	 
 98	 /**
 99	 * Custom MediaSession callback to handle media commands
 100	 */
 101	 private inner class MediaSessionCallback : MediaSession.Callback {
 102	
 103	 override fun onAddMediaItems(
 104	 mediaSession: MediaSession,
 105	 controller: MediaSession.ControllerInfo,
 106	 mediaItems: MutableList<MediaItem>
 107	 ): ListenableFuture<MutableList<MediaItem>> {
 108	 val updatedMediaItems = mediaItems.map { mediaItem ->
 109	 mediaItem.buildUpon()
 110	 .setUri(mediaItem.requestMetadata.mediaUri)
 111	 .build()
 112	 }.toMutableList()
 113	 return Futures.immediateFuture(updatedMediaItems)
 114	 }
 115	 }
 116	 
 117	 companion object {
 118	 private const val TAG = "MusicService"
 119	
 120	 /**
 121	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 122	 */
 123	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 124	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 125	 .setTitle(song.title)
 126	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 127	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 128	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 129	 .build()
 130	 
 131	 return MediaItem.Builder()
 132	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 133	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 134	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 135	 .build()
 136	 }
 137	 
 138	 /**
 139	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 140	 */
 141	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 142	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 143	 }
 144	 }
 145	}

 7	
 8	/**
 9	 * Presenter for the Player screen
 10	 * Handles business logic for music playback and communication between View and Service
 11	 */
 12	class PlayerPresenter(private val context: Context) : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 13	
 14	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 15	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 16	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 17	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 18	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 19	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 20	 private var musicServiceConnection: MusicServiceConnection? = null
 21	 
 22	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 23	 this.view = view
 24	 initializeMusicService()
 25	 }
 26	
 27	 override fun detachView() {
 28	 this.view = null
 29	 musicServiceConnection?.disconnect()
 30	 }
 31	
 32	 private fun initializeMusicService() {
 33	 musicServiceConnection = MusicServiceConnection(context)
 34	 musicServiceConnection?.setPlaybackStateListener(object : MusicServiceConnection.PlaybackStateListener {
 35	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 36	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 37	 }
 38	
 39	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 40	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 41	
 42	 // Update seek bar
 43	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 44	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 45	 } else 0
 46	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 47	 }
 48	
 49	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song?) {
 50	 song?.let {
 51	 currentSong = it
 52	 view?.showSongInfo(it)
 53	 }
 54	 }
 55	 })
 56	 musicServiceConnection?.connect()
 57	 }
 58	 
 59	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 60	 this.currentSong = song
 61	 this.playlist = playlist
 62	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 63	
 64	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 65	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 66	 updateNavigationButtons()
 67	
 68	 // Start playing the song
 69	 musicServiceConnection?.playPlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 70	 }
 71	
 72	 override fun playPause() {
 73	 musicServiceConnection?.playPause()
 74	 }
 75	
 76	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 77	 musicServiceConnection?.seekTo(position)
 78	 }
 79	 
 80	 override fun skipToNext() {
 81	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToNext()
 82	 updateNavigationButtons()
 83	 }
 84	
 85	 override fun skipToPrevious() {
 86	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToPrevious()
 87	 updateNavigationButtons()
 88	 }
