 139	 private fun playPlaylistInternal(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 140	 Log.d(TAG, "playPlaylistInternal called with ${songs.size} songs, startIndex: $startIndex")
 141	 val mediaItems = MusicService.createMediaItems(songs)
 142	
 143	 // Log each media item for debugging
 144	 mediaItems.forEachIndexed { index, mediaItem ->
 145	 Log.d(TAG, "MediaItem $index: ${mediaItem.mediaId} - ${mediaItem.requestMetadata.mediaUri}")
 146	 }
 147	
 148	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 149	 Log.d(TAG, "Setting media items and starting playback")
 150	 controller.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 151	 controller.prepare()
 152	 controller.play()
 153	 Log.d(TAG, "Playback started")
 154	 } ?: Log.e(TAG, "MediaController is null, cannot play playlist")
 155	 }
 156	 
 157	 fun playPause() {
 158	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 159	 if (controller.isPlaying) {
 160	 controller.pause()
 161	 } else {
 162	 controller.play()
 163	 }
 164	 }
 165	 }
 166	 
 167	 fun skipToNext() {
 168	 Log.d(TAG, "skipToNext called")
 169	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 170	 if (controller.hasNextMediaItem()) {
 171	 controller.seekToNextMediaItem()
 172	 Log.d(TAG, "Skipped to next track")
 173	 } else {
 174	 Log.d(TAG, "No next track available")
 175	 }
 176	 } ?: Log.e(TAG, "MediaController is null, cannot skip to next")
 177	 }
 178	
 179	 fun skipToPrevious() {
 180	 Log.d(TAG, "skipToPrevious called")
 181	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 182	 if (controller.hasPreviousMediaItem()) {
 183	 controller.seekToPreviousMediaItem()
 184	 Log.d(TAG, "Skipped to previous track")
 185	 } else {
 186	 Log.d(TAG, "No previous track available")
 187	 }
 188	 } ?: Log.e(TAG, "MediaController is null, cannot skip to previous")
 189	 }
 190	 
 191	 fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 192	 mediaController?.seekTo(position)
 193	 }
 194	 
 195	 fun isPlaying(): Boolean {
 196	 return mediaController?.isPlaying ?: false
 197	 }
 198	 
 199	 fun getCurrentPosition(): Long {
 200	 return mediaController?.currentPosition ?: 0L
 201	 }
 202	 
 203	 fun getDuration(): Long {

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.app.PendingIntent
 4	import android.content.Intent
 5	import android.os.Bundle
 6	import android.util.Log
 7	import androidx.media3.common.AudioAttributes
 8	import androidx.media3.common.C
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 10	import androidx.media3.common.MediaMetadata
 11	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 12	import androidx.media3.common.PlaybackException
 13	import androidx.media3.datasource.DefaultHttpDataSource
 14	import androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer
 15	import androidx.media3.exoplayer.source.DefaultMediaSourceFactory
 16	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSession
 17	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSessionService
 18	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.Futures
 19	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 20	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 21	import com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.MainActivity
 22	
 23	/**
 24	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 25	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 26	 */
 27	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 28	
 29	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 30	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 31	
 32	
 33	
 34	 override fun onCreate() {
 35	 super.onCreate()
 36	 Log.d(TAG, "MusicService onCreate")
 37	 initializePlayer()
 38	 initializeMediaSession()
 39	 }
 40	 
 41	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 42	 Log.d(TAG, "Initializing ExoPlayer")
 43	
 44	 // Create a custom HTTP data source factory with better error handling
 45	 val httpDataSourceFactory = DefaultHttpDataSource.Factory()
 46	 .setUserAgent("MusicPlayer/1.0")
 47	 .setConnectTimeoutMs(30000)
 48	 .setReadTimeoutMs(30000)
 49	 .setAllowCrossProtocolRedirects(true)
 50	
 51	 val mediaSourceFactory = DefaultMediaSourceFactory(this)
 52	 .setDataSourceFactory(httpDataSourceFactory)
 53	
 54	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 55	 .setMediaSourceFactory(mediaSourceFactory)
 56	 .setAudioAttributes(
 57	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 58	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 59	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 60	 .build(),
 61	 true
 62	 )
 63	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 64	 .build()
...
 78	
 79	 override fun onPlayerError(error: PlaybackException) {
 80	 Log.e(TAG, "Player error: ${error.message}", error)
 81	 Log.e(TAG, "Error code: ${error.errorCode}")
 82	 Log.e(TAG, "Error cause: ${error.cause?.message}")
 83	
 84	 // Try to recover from certain errors
 85	 when (error.errorCode) {
 86	 PlaybackException.ERROR_CODE_IO_NETWORK_CONNECTION_FAILED,
 87	 PlaybackException.ERROR_CODE_IO_NETWORK_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT -> {
 88	 Log.d(TAG, "Network error, attempting to retry...")
 89	 // Could implement retry logic here
 90	 }
 91	 PlaybackException.ERROR_CODE_PARSING_CONTAINER_MALFORMED,
 92	 PlaybackException.ERROR_CODE_PARSING_MANIFEST_MALFORMED -> {
 93	 Log.e(TAG, "Media format error, skipping to next track")
 94	 // Could skip to next track automatically
 95	 }
 96	 }
 97	 }
 98	 })
 99	 }
 100	 
 101	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 102	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 103	 this,
 104	 0,
 105	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 106	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 107	 )
 108	 
 109	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 110	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 111	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 112	 .build()
 113	 }
 114	 
 115	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 116	 return mediaSession
 117	 }
 118	 
 119	 override fun onDestroy() {
 120	 mediaSession?.run {
 121	 player.release()
 122	 release()
 123	 mediaSession = null
 124	 }
 125	 super.onDestroy()
 126	 }
 127	 
 128	 /**
 129	 * Custom MediaSession callback to handle media commands
 130	 */
 131	 private inner class MediaSessionCallback : MediaSession.Callback {
 132	
 133	 override fun onAddMediaItems(
 134	 mediaSession: MediaSession,
 135	 controller: MediaSession.ControllerInfo,
 136	 mediaItems: MutableList<MediaItem>
 137	 ): ListenableFuture<MutableList<MediaItem>> {
 138	 val updatedMediaItems = mediaItems.map { mediaItem ->
 139	 mediaItem.buildUpon()
 140	 .setUri(mediaItem.requestMetadata.mediaUri)
 141	 .build()
 142	 }.toMutableList()
 143	 return Futures.immediateFuture(updatedMediaItems)
 144	 }
 145	 }

 72	
 73	The app includes 7 sample songs:
 74	1. **"12600 lettres (Dbat)"** - Franco & TP OK Jazz
 75	2. **"Again & Again"** - Usatof
 76	3. **"Ain't No Mountain High Enough"** - Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell
 77	4. **"All I Have to Do Is Dream"** - The Everly Brothers
 78	5. **"All Night"** - Siddy Ranks
 79	6. **"Escape (The Pia Colada Song)"** - Rupert Holmes
 80	7. **"September"** - Earth, Wind & Fire
 81	
 82	All songs use SoundHelix demo tracks for testing.
 83	
 84	## Technical Details
 85	
 86	### Architecture:
 87	- **MVP Pattern**: Clean separation of concerns
 88	- **ExoPlayer**: Professional audio streaming
 89	- **MediaSession**: System integration for media controls
 90	- **Background Service**: Continues playback when app is minimized
 91	
 92	### Key Components:
 93	- `MusicService`: Background audio service
 94	- `MusicServiceConnection`: Service binding and communication
 95	- `PlayerPresenter`: Business logic for playback
 96	- `PlayerActivity`: Full-screen player UI
 97	
 98	## Troubleshooting
 99	
 100	### If Music Doesn't Play:
 101	1. **Check Internet Connection**: Songs stream from online URLs
 102	2. **Check Audio Permissions**: Ensure app has audio permissions
 103	3. **Check Device Volume**: Make sure media volume is up
 104	4. **Check Logs**: Look for ExoPlayer errors in logcat
 105	
 106	### Common Issues:
 107	- **Network Error**: Check if URLs are accessible
 108	- **Permission Denied**: Ensure all audio permissions granted
 109	- **Service Not Starting**: Check AndroidManifest service registration
 110

 31	 */

 35	 view?.showLoading()
 36	 
 37	 presenterScope.launch {
 38	 try {
 39	 val result = repository.getAllSongs()
 40	 
 41	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 42	 view?.hideLoading()
 43	 
 44	 result.fold(
 45	 onSuccess = { songs ->
 46	 currentSongs = songs
 47	 if (songs.isEmpty()) {

 49	 } else {
 50	 view?.showSongs(songs)
 51	 }
 52	 },
 53	 onFailure = { exception ->
 54	 view?.showError(exception.message ?: "Failed to load songs")
 55	 }
 56	 )
 57	 }
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 60	 view?.hideLoading()
 61	 view?.showError(e.message ?: "An unexpected error occurred")
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 }
 65	 }

 6	/**
 7	 * Data model representing a song with all necessary information for streaming
 8	 */
 9	@Parcelize
 10	data class Song(
 11	 val id: String,
 12	 val title: String,
 13	 val artist: String,
 14	 val album: String,
 15	 val duration: Long, // Duration in milliseconds
 16	 val artworkUrl: String,
 17	 val streamUrl: String,
 18	 val genre: String? = null,
 19	 val releaseYear: Int? = null,
 20	 val trackNumber: Int? = null
 21	) : Parcelable {
 22	 
 23	 /**
 24	 * Returns formatted duration string (mm:ss)
 25	 */
 26	 fun getFormattedDuration(): String {
 27	 val minutes = (duration / 1000) / 60
 28	 val seconds = (duration / 1000) % 60
 29	 return String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes, seconds)
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 /**
 33	 * Returns display text for artist and album
 34	 */
 35	 fun getArtistAlbumText(): String {
 36	 return "$artist $album"
 37	 }
 38	}

 37	 private fun initializeMusicService() {
 38	 musicServiceConnection = MusicServiceConnection(context)
 39	 musicServiceConnection?.setPlaybackStateListener(object : MusicServiceConnection.PlaybackStateListener {
 40	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 41	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 42	 }
 43	
 44	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 45	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 46	
 47	 // Update seek bar
 48	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 49	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 50	 } else 0
 51	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 52	 }

 55	 song?.let {
 56	 currentSong = it
 57	 view?.showSongInfo(it)
 58	 }
 59	 }
 60	 })
 61	 musicServiceConnection?.connect()
 62	 }
 63	 
 64	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 65	 Log.d(TAG, "initializePlayer called with song: ${song.title}, playlist size: ${playlist.size}")
 66	 this.currentSong = song
 67	 this.playlist = playlist
 68	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 69	
 70	 Log.d(TAG, "Current index: $currentIndex")
 71	
 72	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 73	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 74	 updateNavigationButtons()
 75	
 76	 // Start playing the song
 77	 Log.d(TAG, "Starting playback...")
 78	 musicServiceConnection?.playPlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 79	 }
 80	
 81	 override fun playPause() {
 82	 musicServiceConnection?.playPause()
 83	 }
 84	
 85	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 86	 musicServiceConnection?.seekTo(position)
 87	 }
 88	 
 89	 override fun skipToNext() {
 90	 if (currentIndex < playlist.size - 1) {
 91	 currentIndex++
 92	 currentSong = playlist[currentIndex]
 93	 view?.showSongInfo(currentSong!!)
 94	 }
 95	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToNext()
 96	 updateNavigationButtons()
 97	 }
 98	
 99	 override fun skipToPrevious() {
 100	 if (currentIndex > 0) {
 101	 currentIndex--
 102	 currentSong = playlist[currentIndex]
 103	 view?.showSongInfo(currentSong!!)
 104	 }
 105	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToPrevious()
 106	 updateNavigationButtons()
 107	 }
 108	 
 109	 override fun toggleShuffle() {
 110	 isShuffled = !isShuffled
 111	 view?.showShuffleState(isShuffled)
 112	 updateNavigationButtons()
 113	 }

 140	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song) {
 141	 currentSong = song

 143	 }
 144	 
 145	 override fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {
 146	 this.playlist = songs
 147	 this.currentIndex = currentIndex
 148	 view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)
 149	 updateNavigationButtons()
 150	 }
 151	 
 152	 private fun updateNavigationButtons() {
 153	 val canGoPrevious = when {
 154	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 155	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 156	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 157	 }
 158	 
 159	 val canGoNext = when {
 160	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 161	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 162	 else -> currentIndex < playlist.size - 1
 163	 }
 164	 
 165	 view?.enablePreviousButton(canGoPrevious)
 166	 view?.enableNextButton(canGoNext)
 167	 }
 168	}

 41	 private fun initializePlayer() {

 43	
 44	 // Create a custom HTTP data source factory with better error handling
 45	 val httpDataSourceFactory = DefaultHttpDataSource.Factory()
 46	 .setUserAgent("MusicPlayer/1.0")
 47	 .setConnectTimeoutMs(30000)
 48	 .setReadTimeoutMs(30000)
 49	 .setAllowCrossProtocolRedirects(true)
 50	
 51	 val mediaSourceFactory = DefaultMediaSourceFactory(this)
 52	 .setDataSourceFactory(httpDataSourceFactory)
 53	
 54	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 55	 .setMediaSourceFactory(mediaSourceFactory)
 56	 .setAudioAttributes(
 57	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 58	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 59	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 60	 .build(),
 61	 true
 62	 )
 63	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 64	 .build()

 166	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 167	 Log.d(TAG, "Creating MediaItem for song: ${song.title}, URL: ${song.streamUrl}")
 168	
 169	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 170	 .setTitle(song.title)

 172	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 173	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 174	 .build()

 177	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 178	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 179	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 180	 .build()
 181	
 182	 Log.d(TAG, "MediaItem created with URI: ${mediaItem.localConfiguration?.uri}")
 183	 return mediaItem
 184	 }

 188	 */

Path: app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/data/provider/LocalMusicProvider.kt
 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.provider
 2	
 3	import android.content.Context
 4	import android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever
 5	import android.net.Uri
 6	import android.util.Log
 7	import com.nauh.musicplayer.R
 8	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 9	import java.lang.reflect.Field
 10	
 11	/**
 12	 * Provider class for loading music files from the app's raw resources directory
 13	 * Scans res/raw folder and creates Song objects for local music files
 14	 */
 15	class LocalMusicProvider(private val context: Context) {
 16	 
 17	 companion object {
 18	 private const val TAG = "LocalMusicProvider"
 19	 private const val DEFAULT_ARTWORK_URL = "android.resource://com.nauh.musicplayer/drawable/placeholder_album_art"
 20	 }
 21	 
 22	 /**
 23	 * Scans the res/raw directory and returns a list of Song objects for all music files
 24	 */
 25	 fun getLocalSongs(): List<Song> {
 26	 Log.d(TAG, "Scanning local music files from res/raw")
 27	 val songs = mutableListOf<Song>()
 28	 
 29	 try {
 30	 // Get all raw resource IDs using reflection
 31	 val rawResourceIds = getRawResourceIds()
 32	 Log.d(TAG, "Found ${rawResourceIds.size} raw resources")
 33	 
 34	 rawResourceIds.forEach { (resourceName, resourceId) ->
 35	 if (isMusicFile(resourceName)) {
 36	 Log.d(TAG, "Processing music file: $resourceName")
 37	 val song = createSongFromRawResource(resourceName, resourceId)
 38	 if (song != null) {
 39	 songs.add(song)
 40	 Log.d(TAG, "Added song: ${song.title}")
 41	 }
 42	 }
 43	 }
 44	 
 45	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 46	 Log.e(TAG, "Error scanning local music files", e)
 47	 }
 48	 
 49	 Log.d(TAG, "Successfully loaded ${songs.size} local songs")
 50	 return songs
 51	 }
 52	 
 53	 /**
 54	 * Gets all raw resource IDs using reflection
 55	 */
 56	 private fun getRawResourceIds(): Map<String, Int> {
 57	 val resourceMap = mutableMapOf<String, Int>()
 58	 
 59	 try {
 60	 val rawClass = R.raw::class.java
 61	 val fields: Array<Field> = rawClass.declaredFields
 62	 
 63	 for (field in fields) {
 64	 try {
 65	 val resourceName = field.name
 66	 val resourceId = field.getInt(null)
 67	 resourceMap[resourceName] = resourceId
 68	 Log.d(TAG, "Found raw resource: $resourceName -> $resourceId")
 69	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 70	 Log.w(TAG, "Could not access field: ${field.name}", e)
 71	 }
 72	 }
 73	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 74	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting raw resource IDs", e)
 75	 }
 76	 
 77	 return resourceMap
 78	 }
 79	 
 80	 /**
 81	 * Checks if a resource name represents a music file based on common audio file extensions
 82	 */
 83	 private fun isMusicFile(resourceName: String): Boolean {
 84	 val audioExtensions = listOf("mp3", "wav", "m4a", "aac", "ogg", "flac")
 85	 return audioExtensions.any { ext ->
 86	 resourceName.lowercase().contains(ext) || resourceName.lowercase().endsWith("_$ext")
 87	 }
 88	 }

 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work

 84	## Technical Details
 85	
 86	### Architecture:
 87	- **MVP Pattern**: Clean separation of concerns
 88	- **ExoPlayer**: Professional audio streaming
 89	- **MediaSession**: System integration for media controls
 90	- **Background Service**: Continues playback when app is minimized

...
 4	
 5	/**
 6	 * Contract interface for Player screen MVP pattern
 7	 * Defines the communication between View, Presenter, and Model for music playback
 8	 */
 9	interface PlayerContract {
 10	 
 11	 /**
 12	 * View interface - defines what the Player View can do
 13	 */
 14	 interface View {
 15	 fun showSongInfo(song: Song)
 16	 fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean)
 17	 fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long)
 18	 fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int)
 19	 fun showLoading()
 20	 fun hideLoading()
 21	 fun showError(message: String)
 22	 fun enablePreviousButton(enabled: Boolean)
 23	 fun enableNextButton(enabled: Boolean)
 24	 fun showShuffleState(isShuffled: Boolean)
 25	 fun showRepeatState(repeatMode: Int)
 26	 fun updatePlaylist(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int)
 27	 }
 28	 
 29	 /**
 30	 * Presenter interface - defines what the Player Presenter can do
 31	 */
 32	 interface Presenter {
 33	 fun attachView(view: View)
 34	 fun detachView()
 35	 fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>)
 36	 fun playPause()
 37	 fun seekTo(position: Long)
 38	 fun skipToNext()
 39	 fun skipToPrevious()
 40	 fun toggleShuffle()
 41	 fun toggleRepeat()
 42	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)

...
 16	
 17	/**
 18	 * Service connection class to manage communication between UI and MusicService
 19	 * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods
 20	 */
 21	class MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {
 22	
 23	 private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null
 24	 private var mediaController: MediaController? = null
 25	 private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null
 26	 private var isConnected = false
 27	 private var pendingPlaylist: Pair<List<Song>, Int>? = null
 28	 private var connectionRetryCount = 0
 29	 private val maxRetryAttempts = 3
 30	 private var progressUpdateHandler: android.os.Handler? = null
 31	 private var progressUpdateRunnable: Runnable? = null
 32	
 33	 companion object {
 34	 private const val TAG = "MusicServiceConnection"
 35	 private const val CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MS = 10000L // 10 seconds
 36	 }
 37	 
 38	 interface PlaybackStateListener {
 39	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 40	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 41	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song?)
 42	 fun onPlaybackError(error: String)
 43	 fun onConnectionError(error: String)
 44	 }
 45	 
 46	 fun setPlaybackStateListener(listener: PlaybackStateListener) {
 47	 this.playbackStateListener = listener
 48	 }
 49	 
 50	 fun connect() {
 51	 Log.d(TAG, "Connecting to MusicService... (attempt ${connectionRetryCount + 1})")
 52	
 53	 // Start the service first to ensure it's running
 54	 val serviceIntent = Intent(context, MusicService::class.java)
 55	 try {
 56	 val result = context.startService(serviceIntent)
 57	 Log.d(TAG, "Service start result: $result")
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to start service", e)
 60	 return
 61	 }
 62	
 63	 val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))
 64	 Log.d(TAG, "Creating MediaController with session token: $sessionToken")
 65	 mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()
 66	 Log.d(TAG, "MediaController future created: $mediaControllerFuture")
 67	
 68	 // Add timeout handling
 69	 val timeoutHandler = android.os.Handler(android.os.Looper.getMainLooper())
 70	 val timeoutRunnable = Runnable {
 71	 if (!isConnected) {
 72	 Log.e(TAG, "MediaController connection timeout after ${CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MS}ms")
 73	 handleConnectionFailure()
 74	 }
 75	 }
 76	 timeoutHandler.postDelayed(timeoutRunnable, CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MS)
...
 164	 
 165	 fun disconnect() {
 166	 Log.d(TAG, "Disconnecting from MusicService")
 167	 isConnected = false
 168	 pendingPlaylist = null
 169	
 170	 // Stop progress updates
 171	 progressUpdateRunnable?.let { runnable ->
 172	 progressUpdateHandler?.removeCallbacks(runnable)
 173	 }
 174	 progressUpdateHandler = null
 175	 progressUpdateRunnable = null
 176	
 177	 mediaController?.release()
 178	 mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)
 179	 mediaController = null
 180	 mediaControllerFuture = null
 181	 }
 182	 
 183	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 184	 val mediaItem = MusicService.createMediaItem(song)
 185	 mediaController?.setMediaItem(mediaItem)
 186	 mediaController?.prepare()
 187	 mediaController?.play()
 188	 }

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.utils
 2	
 3	import android.util.Log
 4	import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
 5	import kotlinx.coroutines.withContext
 6	import java.net.HttpURLConnection
 7	import java.net.URL
 8	
 9	/**
 10	 * Utility class for network operations
 11	 */
 12	object NetworkUtils {
 13	 private const val TAG = "NetworkUtils"
 14	 
 15	 /**
 16	 * Test if a URL is accessible
 17	 */
 18	 suspend fun testUrl(urlString: String): Boolean = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 19	 try {
 20	 Log.d(TAG, "Testing URL: $urlString")
 21	 val url = URL(urlString)
 22	 val connection = url.openConnection() as HttpURLConnection
 23	 connection.requestMethod = "HEAD"
 24	 connection.connectTimeout = 10000
 25	 connection.readTimeout = 10000
 26	 connection.setRequestProperty("User-Agent", "MusicPlayer/1.0")
 27	 
 28	 val responseCode = connection.responseCode
 29	 Log.d(TAG, "URL $urlString response code: $responseCode")
 30	 
 31	 connection.disconnect()
 32	 responseCode in 200..299
 33	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 34	 Log.e(TAG, "Error testing URL $urlString: ${e.message}", e)
 35	 false
 36	 }
 37	 }
 38	 
 39	 /**
 40	 * Test multiple URLs and return the working ones
 41	 */
 42	 suspend fun testUrls(urls: List<String>): List<String> = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 43	 urls.filter { testUrl(it) }
 44	 }
 45	}

 3	import android.os.Parcelable

 6	/**
 7	 * Data model representing a song with all necessary information for streaming
 8	 */
 9	@Parcelize
 10	data class Song(
 11	 val id: String,
 12	 val title: String,
 13	 val artist: String,
 14	 val album: String,
 15	 val duration: Long, // Duration in milliseconds
 16	 val artworkUrl: String,
 17	 val streamUrl: String,
 18	 val genre: String? = null,
 19	 val releaseYear: Int? = null,
 20	 val trackNumber: Int? = null
 21	) : Parcelable {
 22	 
 23	 /**
 24	 * Returns formatted duration string (mm:ss)
 25	 */
 26	 fun getFormattedDuration(): String {
 27	 val minutes = (duration / 1000) / 60
 28	 val seconds = (duration / 1000) % 60
 29	 return String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes, seconds)
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 /**
 33	 * Returns display text for artist and album
 34	 */
 35	 fun getArtistAlbumText(): String {
 36	 return "$artist $album"
 37	 }
 38	}

 14	 val songs: List<Song> = emptyList(),

 16	 val createdAt: Long = System.currentTimeMillis()
 17	) : Parcelable {
 18	 
 19	 /**

 22	 fun getTotalDuration(): Long {

6. **Sample Music Data** - Local songs for testing

- **Presenters**: MainPresenter, PlayerPresenter
- **Views**: MainActivity, PlayerActivity
- **Service**: MusicService, NotificationHelper
- **Adapters**: SongAdapter for RecyclerView
- **Utils**: Helper classes

## Plan for Music Player App

Based on the UI image, I need to create:

1. **Main Activity** - Shows a list of songs with album art, title, and artist
2. **Player Activity** - Full-screen player with controls, progress bar, and album art
3. **MVP Architecture** - Separate View, Presenter, and Model layers
4. **Music Service** - Background service for audio playback
5. **Notification** - Media notification with playback controls
6. **Sample Music Data** - Local songs for testing

### File Structure:
- **Data Models**: Song, Playlist
- **MVP Contracts**: MainContract, PlayerContract 
- **Presenters**: MainPresenter, PlayerPresenter
- **Views**: MainActivity, PlayerActivity
- **Service**: MusicService, NotificationHelper
- **Adapters**: SongAdapter for RecyclerView
- **Utils**: Helper classes

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/data/model/Playlist.kt", "file_content": "package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model\n\nimport android.os.Parcelable\nimport kotlinx.parcelize.Parcelize\n\n/**\n * Data model representing a playlist containing multiple songs\n */\n@Parcelize\ndata class Playlist(\n val id: String,\n val name: String,\n val description: String? = null,\n val songs: List<Song> = emptyList(),\n val artworkUrl: String? = null,\n val createdAt: Long = System.currentTimeMillis()\n) : Parcelable {\n \n /**\n * Returns total duration of all songs in the playlist\n */\n fun getTotalDuration(): Long {\n return songs.sumOf { it.duration }\n }\n \n /**\n * Returns formatted total duration string\n */\n fun getFormattedTotalDuration(): String {\n val totalSeconds = getTotalDuration() / 1000\n val hours = totalSeconds / 3600\n val minutes = (totalSeconds % 3600) / 60\n val seconds = totalSeconds % 60\n \n return if (hours > 0) {\n String.format(\"%02d:%02d:%02d\", hours, minutes, seconds)\n } else {\n String.format(\"%02d:%02d\", minutes, seconds)\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * Returns the number of songs in the playlist\n */\n fun getSongCount(): Int {\n return songs.size\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"### 2. "file_content": "package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.repository\n\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.withContext\n\n/**\n * Repository class for managing music data\n * Provides sample songs for the music player\n */\nclass MusicRepository {\n \n /**\n * Get sample songs for testing\n */\n suspend fun getSongs(): List<Song> = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {\n // Sample songs with streaming URLs for testing\n listOf(\n Song(\n id = \"1\",\n title = \"12600 lettres (D\u00e9bat)\",\n artist = \"Franco & TP OK Jazz\",\n album = \"Classic Congolese\",\n duration = 240000, // 4 minutes\n artworkUrl = \"https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/FF6B6B/FFFFFF?text=Franco\",\n streamUrl = \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/BabyElephantWalk60.wav\"\n ),\n Song(\n id = \"2\",\n title = \"Again & Again\",\n artist = \"Usatof\",\n album = \"Electronic Vibes\",\n duration = 195000, // 3:15\n artworkUrl = \"https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/4ECDC4/FFFFFF?text=Usatof\",\n streamUrl = \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/CantinaBand60.wav\"\n ),\n Song(\n id = \"3\",\n title = \"Ain't No Mountain High Enough\",\n artist = \"Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell\",\n album = \"Motown Classics\",\n duration = 267000, // 4:27\n artworkUrl = \"https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/45B7D1/FFFFFF?text=Motown\",\n streamUrl = \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/ImperialMarch60.wav\"\n ),\n Song(\n id = \"4\",\n title = \"All I Have to Do Is Dream\",\n artist = \"The Everly Brothers\",\n album = \"Classic Rock\",\n duration = 156000, // 2:36\n artworkUrl = \"https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/96CEB4/FFFFFF?text=Everly\",\n streamUrl = \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/PinkPanther60.wav\"\n ),\n Song(\n id = \"5\",\n title = \"All Night\",\n artist = \"Siddy Ranks\",\n album = \"Reggae Hits\",\n duration = 213000, // 3:33\n artworkUrl = \"https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/FFEAA7/000000?text=Reggae\",\n streamUrl = \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/StarWars60.wav\"\n ),\n Song(\n id = \"6\",\n title = \"Escape (The Pi\u00f1a Colada Song)\",\n artist = \"Rupert Holmes\",\n album = \"Soft Rock Classics\",\n duration = 278000, // 4:38\n artworkUrl = \"https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/DDA0DD/FFFFFF?text=Holmes\",\n streamUrl = \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/taunt.wav\"\n ),\n Song(\n id = \"7\",\n title = \"September\",\n artist = \"Earth, Wind & Fire\",\n album = \"Disco Funk\",\n duration = 215000, // 3:35\n artworkUrl = \"https://via.placeholder.com/300x300/FF7675/FFFFFF?text=EWF\",\n streamUrl = \"https://www2.cs.uic.edu/~i101/SoundFiles/gettysburg10.wav\"\n )\n )\n }\n \n /**\n * Search songs by title or artist\n */\n suspend fun searchSongs(query: String): List<Song> = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {\n val allSongs = getSongs()\n if (query.isBlank()) {\n allSongs\n } else {\n allSongs.filter { song ->\n song.title.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||\n song.artist.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||\n song.album.contains(query, ignoreCase = true)\n }\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * Get song by ID\n */\n suspend fun getSongById(id: String): Song? = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {\n getSongs().find { it.id == id }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"### 5. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/service/MusicService.kt", "file_content": "package com.nauh.musicplayer.service\n\nimport android.app.PendingIntent\nimport android.content.Intent\nimport android.os.Bundle\nimport android.util.Log\nimport androidx.media3.common.AudioAttributes\nimport androidx.media3.common.C\nimport androidx.media3.common.MediaItem\nimport androidx.media3.common.MediaMetadata\nimport androidx.media3.common.Player\nimport androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer\nimport androidx.media3.session.MediaSession\nimport androidx.media3.session.MediaSessionService\nimport androidx.media3.session.SessionToken\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.MainActivity\n\n/**\n * Background service for music playback using ExoPlayer and MediaSession\n */\nclass MusicService : MediaSessionService() {\n \n private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null\n private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer\n private lateinit var notificationHelper: NotificationHelper\n \n companion object {\n private const val TAG = \"MusicService\"\n const val ACTION_PLAY = \"com.nauh.musicplayer.PLAY\"\n const val ACTION_PAUSE = \"com.nauh.musicplayer.PAUSE\"\n const val ACTION_NEXT = \"com.nauh.musicplayer.NEXT\"\n const val ACTION_PREVIOUS = \"com.nauh.musicplayer.PREVIOUS\"\n \n fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {\n val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()\n .setTitle(song.title)\n .setArtist(song.artist)\n .setAlbumTitle(song.album)\n .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))\n .build()\n \n return MediaItem.Builder()\n .setUri(song.streamUrl)\n .setMediaId(song.getMediaId())\n .setMediaMetadata(metadata)\n .build()\n }\n }\n \n override fun onCreate() {\n super.onCreate()\n Log.d(TAG, \"MusicService onCreate\")\n \n initializePlayer()\n initializeMediaSession()\n initializeNotificationHelper()\n }\n \n private fun initializePlayer() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Initializing ExoPlayer\")\n \n val audioAttributes = AudioAttributes.Builder()\n .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)\n .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)\n .build()\n \n player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)\n .setAudioAttributes(audioAttributes, true)\n .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)\n .build()\n \n player.addListener(object : Player.Listener {\n override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Playback state changed: $playbackState\")\n updateNotification()\n }\n \n override fun onIsPlayingChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Is playing changed: $isPlaying\")\n updateNotification()\n }\n \n override fun onMediaItemTransition(mediaItem: MediaItem?, reason: Int) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Media item transition: ${mediaItem?.mediaMetadata?.title}\")\n updateNotification()\n }\n })\n }\n \n private fun initializeMediaSession() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Initializing MediaSession\")\n \n val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(\n this,\n 0,\n Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),\n PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE\n )\n \n mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)\n .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)\n .build()\n \n Log.d(TAG, \"MediaSession created with token: ${mediaSession?.token}\")\n }\n \n private fun initializeNotificationHelper() {\n notificationHelper = NotificationHelper(this)\n }\n \n private fun updateNotification() {\n mediaSession?.let { session ->\n notificationHelper.updateNotification(session)\n }\n }\n \n override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {\n Log.d(TAG, \"onGetSession called for controller: ${controllerInfo.packageName}\")\n return mediaSession\n }\n \n override fun onDestroy() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"MusicService onDestroy\")\n mediaSession?.run {\n player.release()\n release()\n mediaSession = null\n }\n super.onDestroy()\n }\n \n override fun onStartCommand(intent: Intent?, flags: Int, startId: Int): Int {\n Log.d(TAG, \"onStartCommand: ${intent?.action}\")\n \n when (intent?.action) {\n ACTION_PLAY -> player.play()\n ACTION_PAUSE -> player.pause()\n ACTION_NEXT -> player.seekToNext()\n ACTION_PREVIOUS -> player.seekToPrevious()\n }\n \n return START_STICKY\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"### 6. Create the Music Service:

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/service/NotificationHelper.kt", "file_content": "package com.nauh.musicplayer.service\n\nimport android.app.Notification\nimport android.app.NotificationChannel\nimport android.app.NotificationManager\nimport android.app.PendingIntent\nimport android.content.Context\nimport android.content.Intent\nimport android.graphics.Bitmap\nimport android.graphics.drawable.Drawable\nimport android.os.Build\nimport android.support.v4.media.session.MediaSessionCompat\nimport android.util.Log\nimport androidx.core.app.NotificationCompat\nimport androidx.media3.session.MediaSession\nimport com.bumptech.glide.Glide\nimport com.bumptech.glide.request.target.CustomTarget\nimport com.bumptech.glide.request.transition.Transition\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.R\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.PlayerActivity\n\n/**\n * Helper class for managing music playback notifications\n */\nclass NotificationHelper(private val context: Context) {\n \n companion object {\n private const val TAG = \"NotificationHelper\"\n private const val NOTIFICATION_ID = 1001\n private const val CHANNEL_ID = \"music_playback_channel\"\n private const val CHANNEL_NAME = \"Music Playback\"\n private const val CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION = \"Controls for music playback\"\n }\n \n private val notificationManager = context.getSystemService(Context.NOTIFICATION_SERVICE) as NotificationManager\n \n init {\n createNotificationChannel()\n }\n \n private fun createNotificationChannel() {\n if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.O) {\n val channel = NotificationChannel(\n CHANNEL_ID,\n CHANNEL_NAME,\n NotificationManager.IMPORTANCE_LOW\n ).apply {\n description = CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION\n setShowBadge(false)\n lockscreenVisibility = Notification.VISIBILITY_PUBLIC\n }\n notificationManager.createNotificationChannel(channel)\n Log.d(TAG, \"Notification channel created\")\n }\n }\n \n fun updateNotification(mediaSession: MediaSession) {\n val player = mediaSession.player\n val mediaMetadata = player.currentMediaItem?.mediaMetadata\n \n if (mediaMetadata == null) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"No media metadata available, hiding notification\")\n hideNotification()\n return\n }\n \n val title = mediaMetadata.title?.toString() ?: \"Unknown Title\"\n val artist = mediaMetadata.artist?.toString() ?: \"Unknown Artist\"\n val artworkUri = mediaMetadata.artworkUri\n \n Log.d(TAG, \"Updating notification for: $title by $artist\")\n \n // Load artwork and create notification\n if (artworkUri != null) {\n loadArtworkAndCreateNotification(title, artist, artworkUri.toString(), player.isPlaying)\n } else {\n createNotification(title, artist, null, player.isPlaying)\n }\n }\n \n private fun loadArtworkAndCreateNotification(title: String, artist: String, artworkUrl: String, isPlaying: Boolean) {\n Glide.with(context)\n .asBitmap()\n .load(artworkUrl)\n .into(object : CustomTarget<Bitmap>() {\n override fun onResourceReady(resource: Bitmap, transition: Transition<in Bitmap>?) {\n createNotification(title, artist, resource, isPlaying)\n }\n \n override fun onLoadCleared(placeholder: Drawable?) {\n createNotification(title, artist, null, isPlaying)\n }\n \n override fun onLoadFailed(errorDrawable: Drawable?) {\n createNotification(title, artist, null, isPlaying)\n }\n })\n }\n \n private fun createNotification(title: String, artist: String, artwork: Bitmap?, isPlaying: Boolean) {\n val playPauseAction = if (isPlaying) {\n NotificationCompat.Action(\n R.drawable.ic_pause,\n \"Pause\",\n createPendingIntent(MusicService.ACTION_PAUSE)\n )\n } else {\n NotificationCompat.Action(\n R.drawable.ic_play,\n \"Play\",\n createPendingIntent(MusicService.ACTION_PLAY)\n )\n }\n \n val contentIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(\n context,\n 0,\n Intent(context, PlayerActivity::class.java),\n PendingIntent.FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT or PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE\n )\n \n val notification = NotificationCompat.Builder(context, CHANNEL_ID)\n .setContentTitle(title)\n .setContentText(artist)\n .setSmallIcon(R.drawable.ic_music_note)\n .setLargeIcon(artwork)\n .setContentIntent(contentIntent)\n .setVisibility(NotificationCompat.VISIBILITY_PUBLIC)\n .setOnlyAlertOnce(true)\n .addAction(\n NotificationCompat.Action(\n R.drawable.ic_skip_previous,\n \"Previous\",\n createPendingIntent(MusicService.ACTION_PREVIOUS)\n )\n )\n .addAction(playPauseAction)\n .addAction(\n NotificationCompat.Action(\n R.drawable.ic_skip_next,\n \"Next\",\n createPendingIntent(MusicService.ACTION_NEXT)\n )\n )\n .setStyle(\n androidx.media.app.NotificationCompat.MediaStyle()\n .setShowActionsInCompactView(0, 1, 2)\n )\n .build()\n \n notificationManager.notify(NOTIFICATION_ID, notification)\n Log.d(TAG, \"Notification updated\")\n }\n \n private fun createPendingIntent(action: String): PendingIntent {\n val intent = Intent(context, MusicService::class.java).apply {\n this.action = action\n }\n return PendingIntent.getService(\n context,\n action.hashCode(),\n intent,\n PendingIntent.FLAG_UPDATE_CURRENT or PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE\n )\n }\n \n fun hideNotification() {\n notificationManager.cancel(NOTIFICATION_ID)\n Log.d(TAG, \"Notification hidden\")\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"### 7. Create the Notification Helper:

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/service/MusicServiceConnection.kt", "file_content": "package com.nauh.musicplayer.service\n\nimport android.content.ComponentName\nimport android.content.Context\nimport android.content.Intent\nimport android.os.Handler\nimport android.os.Looper\nimport android.util.Log\nimport androidx.media3.common.MediaItem\nimport androidx.media3.common.Player\nimport androidx.media3.session.MediaController\nimport androidx.media3.session.SessionToken\nimport com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song\n\n/**\n * Service connection class to manage communication between UI and MusicService\n * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods\n */\nclass MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {\n\n private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null\n private var mediaController: MediaController? = null\n private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null\n private var isConnected = false\n private var pendingPlaylist: Pair<List<Song>, Int>? = null\n private var progressUpdateHandler: Handler? = null\n private var progressUpdateRunnable: Runnable? = null\n\n companion object {\n private const val TAG = \"MusicServiceConnection\"\n private const val PROGRESS_UPDATE_INTERVAL = 1000L // 1 second\n }\n \n interface PlaybackStateListener {\n fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)\n fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)\n fun onSongChanged(song: Song?)\n fun onPlaybackError(error: String)\n fun onConnectionError(error: String)\n }\n \n fun setPlaybackStateListener(listener: PlaybackStateListener) {\n this.playbackStateListener = listener\n }\n \n fun connect() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Connecting to MusicService...\")\n\n // Start the service first to ensure it's running\n val serviceIntent = Intent(context, MusicService::class.java)\n try {\n context.startService(serviceIntent)\n Log.d(TAG, \"Service started successfully\")\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n Log.e(TAG, \"Failed to start service\", e)\n playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError(\"Failed to start music service\")\n return\n }\n\n val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))\n mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()\n\n mediaControllerFuture?.addListener({\n try {\n mediaController = mediaControllerFuture?.get()\n if (mediaController != null) {\n onMediaControllerConnected()\n } else {\n Log.e(TAG, \"MediaController is null after connection\")\n playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError(\"Failed to connect to music service\")\n }\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n Log.e(TAG, \"Error getting MediaController\", e)\n playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError(\"Connection error: ${e.message}\")\n }\n }, context.mainExecutor)\n }\n \n private fun onMediaControllerConnected() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"MediaController connected successfully\")\n isConnected = true\n \n mediaController?.addListener(object : Player.Listener {\n override fun onIsPlayingChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Playback state changed: isPlaying = $isPlaying\")\n playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying)\n \n if (isPlaying) {\n startProgressUpdates()\n } else {\n stopProgressUpdates()\n }\n }\n \n override fun onMediaItemTransition(mediaItem: MediaItem?, reason: Int) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Media item changed: ${mediaItem?.mediaMetadata?.title}\")\n // Convert MediaItem back to Song if needed\n // For now, we'll handle this in the presenter\n }\n \n override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Player state changed: $playbackState\")\n when (playbackState) {\n Player.STATE_BUFFERING -> {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Player is buffering\")\n }\n Player.STATE_READY -> {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Player is ready\")\n }\n Player.STATE_ENDED -> {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Playback ended\")\n stopProgressUpdates()\n }\n Player.STATE_IDLE -> {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Player is idle\")\n }\n }\n }\n })\n \n // Handle pending playlist if any\n pendingPlaylist?.let { (songs, index) ->\n Log.d(TAG, \"Playing pending playlist\")\n playPlaylist(songs, index)\n pendingPlaylist = null\n }\n }\n \n private fun startProgressUpdates() {\n if (progressUpdateHandler == null) {\n progressUpdateHandler = Handler(Looper.getMainLooper())\n }\n \n progressUpdateRunnable = object : Runnable {\n override fun run() {\n mediaController?.let { controller ->\n val position = controller.currentPosition\n val duration = controller.duration\n if (duration > 0) {\n playbackStateListener?.onProgressUpdate(position, duration)\n }\n }\n progressUpdateHandler?.postDelayed(this, PROGRESS_UPDATE_INTERVAL)\n }\n }\n \n progressUpdateRunnable?.let { runnable ->\n progressUpdateHandler?.post(runnable)\n }\n }\n \n private fun stopProgressUpdates() {\n progressUpdateRunnable?.let { runnable ->\n progressUpdateHandler?.removeCallbacks(runnable)\n }\n }\n \n fun disconnect() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Disconnecting from MusicService\")\n isConnected = false\n pendingPlaylist = null\n\n stopProgressUpdates()\n progressUpdateHandler = null\n progressUpdateRunnable = null\n\n mediaController?.release()\n mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)\n mediaController = null\n mediaControllerFuture = null\n }\n \n fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {\n if (!isConnected || mediaController == null) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Not connected, storing playlist for later\")\n pendingPlaylist = Pair(songs, startIndex)\n return\n }\n \n Log.d(TAG, \"Playing playlist with ${songs.size} songs, starting at index $startIndex\")\n \n val mediaItems = songs.map { song -> MusicService.createMediaItem(song) }\n mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)\n mediaController?.prepare()\n mediaController?.play()\n }\n \n fun playSong(song: Song) {\n playPlaylist(listOf(song), 0)\n }\n \n fun playPause() {\n mediaController?.let { controller ->\n if (controller.isPlaying) {\n controller.pause()\n } else {\n controller.play()\n }\n }\n }\n \n fun skipToNext() {\n mediaController?.seekToNext()\n }\n \n fun skipToPrevious() {\n mediaController?.seekToPrevious()\n }\n \n fun seekTo(position: Long) {\n mediaController?.seekTo(position)\n }\n \n fun isPlaying(): Boolean {\n return mediaController?.isPlaying ?: false\n }\n \n fun getCurrentPosition(): Long {\n return mediaController?.currentPosition ?: 0\n }\n \n fun getDuration(): Long {\n return mediaController?.duration ?: 0\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"### 8. Create the Service Connection:

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/presenter/MainPresenter.kt", "file_content": "package com.nauh.musicplayer.presenter\n\nimport android.util.Log\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.MainContract\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.repository.MusicRepository\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineScope\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.Job\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.launch\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.withContext\n\n/**\n * Presenter for the Main screen following MVP pattern\n * Handles business logic for song list display and user interactions\n */\nclass MainPresenter(\n private val musicRepository: MusicRepository\n) : MainContract.Presenter {\n \n private var view: MainContract.View? = null\n private val presenterScope = CoroutineScope(Dispatchers.Main + Job())\n private var currentSongs: List<Song> = emptyList()\n private var currentPlayingSongId: String? = null\n \n companion object {\n private const val TAG = \"MainPresenter\"\n }\n \n override fun attachView(view: MainContract.View) {\n this.view = view\n Log.d(TAG, \"View attached\")\n }\n \n override fun detachView() {\n this.view = null\n Log.d(TAG, \"View detached\")\n }\n \n override fun loadSongs() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Loading songs...\")\n view?.showLoading()\n \n presenterScope.launch {\n try {\n val songs = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {\n musicRepository.getSongs()\n }\n \n currentSongs = songs\n \n if (songs.isNotEmpty()) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Loaded ${songs.size} songs\")\n view?.hideLoading()\n view?.hideEmptyState()\n view?.showSongs(songs)\n } else {\n Log.d(TAG, \"No songs found\")\n view?.hideLoading()\n view?.showEmptyState()\n }\n \n } catch (e: Exception) {\n Log.e(TAG, \"Error loading songs\", e)\n view?.hideLoading()\n view?.showError(\"Failed to load songs: ${e.message}\")\n }\n }\n }\n \n override fun onSongClicked(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Song clicked: ${song.title}\")\n \n // Update the currently playing song\n currentPlayingSongId = song.id\n \n // Navigate to player\n view?.navigateToPlayer(song, playlist)\n \n // Update the UI to show this song is playing\n view?.updateSongPlayingState(song.id, true)\n }\n \n override fun onRefresh() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Refreshing songs...\")\n loadSongs()\n }\n \n override fun searchSongs(query: String) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Searching songs with query: '$query'\")\n view?.showLoading()\n \n presenterScope.launch {\n try {\n val songs = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {\n musicRepository.searchSongs(query)\n }\n \n if (songs.isNotEmpty()) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Found ${songs.size} songs matching query\")\n view?.hideLoading()\n view?.hideEmptyState()\n view?.showSongs(songs)\n } else {\n Log.d(TAG, \"No songs found for query\")\n view?.hideLoading()\n view?.showEmptyState()\n }\n \n } catch (e: Exception) {\n Log.e(TAG, \"Error searching songs\", e)\n view?.hideLoading()\n view?.showError(\"Failed to search songs: ${e.message}\")\n }\n }\n }\n \n override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(songId: String?, isPlaying: Boolean) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Playback state changed: songId=$songId, isPlaying=$isPlaying\")\n \n // Update the currently playing song ID\n currentPlayingSongId = if (isPlaying) songId else null\n \n // Update all songs' playing state\n currentSongs.forEach { song ->\n val isSongPlaying = isPlaying && song.id == songId\n view?.updateSongPlayingState(song.id, isSongPlaying)\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * Get the current list of songs\n */\n fun getCurrentSongs(): List<Song> {\n return currentSongs\n }\n \n /**\n * Get the currently playing song ID\n */\n fun getCurrentPlayingSongId(): String? {\n return currentPlayingSongId\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"### 9. "file_content": "package com.nauh.musicplayer.presenter\n\nimport android.content.Context\nimport android.util.Log\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.PlayerContract\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.service.MusicServiceConnection\n\n/**\n * Presenter for the Player screen following MVP pattern\n * Handles business logic for music playback and user interactions\n */\nclass PlayerPresenter(\n private val context: Context\n) : PlayerContract.Presenter, MusicServiceConnection.PlaybackStateListener {\n \n private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null\n private var musicServiceConnection: MusicServiceConnection? = null\n private var currentSong: Song? = null\n private var currentPlaylist: List<Song> = emptyList()\n private var currentIndex: Int = 0\n private var isShuffled: Boolean = false\n private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF\n \n companion object {\n private const val TAG = \"PlayerPresenter\"\n }\n \n override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {\n this.view = view\n Log.d(TAG, \"View attached\")\n \n // Initialize music service connection\n musicServiceConnection = MusicServiceConnection(context).apply {\n setPlaybackStateListener(this@PlayerPresenter)\n connect()\n }\n }\n \n override fun detachView() {\n this.view = null\n Log.d(TAG, \"View detached\")\n \n // Disconnect from music service\n musicServiceConnection?.disconnect()\n musicServiceConnection = null\n }\n \n override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Initializing player with song: ${song.title}\")\n \n currentSong = song\n currentPlaylist = playlist\n currentIndex = playlist.indexOfFirst { it.id == song.id }.takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0\n \n // Show song info\n view?.showSongInfo(song)\n view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)\n \n // Update navigation buttons\n updateNavigationButtons()\n \n // Start playback\n view?.showLoading()\n musicServiceConnection?.playPlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)\n }\n \n override fun playPause() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Play/Pause button clicked\")\n musicServiceConnection?.playPause()\n }\n \n override fun seekTo(position: Long) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Seeking to position: $position\")\n musicServiceConnection?.seekTo(position)\n }\n \n override fun skipToNext() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Skip to next\")\n \n if (currentIndex < currentPlaylist.size - 1) {\n currentIndex++\n currentSong = currentPlaylist[currentIndex]\n view?.showSongInfo(currentSong!!)\n updateNavigationButtons()\n }\n \n musicServiceConnection?.skipToNext()\n }\n \n override fun skipToPrevious() {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Skip to previous\")\n \n if (currentIndex > 0) {\n currentIndex--\n currentSong = currentPlaylist[currentIndex]\n view?.showSongInfo(currentSong!!)\n updateNavigationButtons()\n }\n \n musicServiceConnection?.skipToPrevious()\n }\n \n override fun toggleShuffle() {\n isShuffled = !isShuffled\n Log.d(TAG, \"Shuffle toggled: $isShuffled\")\n view?.showShuffleState(isShuffled)\n \n // TODO: Implement shuffle logic in service\n }\n \n override fun toggleRepeat() {\n repeatMode = when (repeatMode) {\n PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL\n PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE\n PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF\n else -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF\n }\n \n Log.d(TAG, \"Repeat mode changed: $repeatMode\")\n view?.showRepeatState(repeatMode)\n \n // TODO: Implement repeat logic in service\n }\n \n private fun updateNavigationButtons() {\n view?.enablePreviousButton(currentIndex > 0)\n view?.enableNextButton(currentIndex < currentPlaylist.size - 1)\n }\n \n // MusicServiceConnection.PlaybackStateListener implementation\n \n override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Playback state changed: $isPlaying\")\n view?.hideLoading()\n view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)\n }\n \n override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {\n view?.updateProgress(position, duration)\n \n if (duration > 0) {\n val progress = ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()\n view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)\n }\n }\n \n override fun onSongChanged(song: Song?) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Song changed: ${song?.title}\")\n song?.let {\n currentSong = it\n // Find the new index in the playlist\n currentIndex = currentPlaylist.indexOfFirst { playlistSong -> playlistSong.id == it.id }\n .takeIf { index -> index >= 0 } ?: currentIndex\n \n view?.showSongInfo(it)\n updateNavigationButtons()\n }\n }\n \n override fun onPlaybackError(error: String) {\n Log.e(TAG, \"Playback error: $error\")\n view?.hideLoading()\n view?.showError(error)\n }\n \n override fun onConnectionError(error: String) {\n Log.e(TAG, \"Connection error: $error\")\n view?.hideLoading()\n view?.showError(error)\n }\n \n override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {\n // Implementation moved to interface method above\n }\n \n override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {\n // Implementation moved to interface method above\n }\n \n override fun onSongChanged(song: Song?) {\n // Implementation moved to interface method above\n }\n \n override fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Playlist changed: ${songs.size} songs, current index: $currentIndex\")\n currentPlaylist = songs\n this.currentIndex = currentIndex\n \n if (currentIndex < songs.size) {\n currentSong = songs[currentIndex]\n view?.showSongInfo(currentSong!!)\n }\n \n view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)\n updateNavigationButtons()\n }\n \n override fun onBufferingStateChanged(isBuffering: Boolean) {\n Log.d(TAG, \"Buffering state changed: $isBuffering\")\n view?.showBuffering(isBuffering)\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"### 10. "file_content": "package com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.adapter\n\nimport android.view.LayoutInflater\nimport android.view.View\nimport android.view.ViewGroup\nimport android.widget.ImageView\nimport android.widget.TextView\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.DiffUtil\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.ListAdapter\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView\nimport com.bumptech.glide.Glide\nimport com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.RoundedCorners\nimport com.bumptech.glide.request.RequestOptions\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.R\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song\n\n/**\n * RecyclerView adapter for displaying songs in a list\n */\nclass SongAdapter(\n private val onSongClick: (Song, List<Song>) -> Unit\n) : ListAdapter<Song, SongAdapter.SongViewHolder>(SongDiffCallback()) {\n \n private val playingStates = mutableMapOf<String, Boolean>()\n \n override fun onCreateViewHolder(parent: ViewGroup, viewType: Int): SongViewHolder {\n val view = LayoutInflater.from(parent.context)\n .inflate(R.layout.item_song, parent, false)\n return SongViewHolder(view)\n }\n \n override fun onBindViewHolder(holder: SongViewHolder, position: Int) {\n val song = getItem(position)\n holder.bind(song, playingStates[song.id] ?: false)\n }\n \n /**\n * Update the playing state of a specific song\n */\n fun updatePlayingState(songId: String, isPlaying: Boolean) {\n playingStates[songId] = isPlaying\n \n // Find the position of the song and notify the adapter\n val position = currentList.indexOfFirst { it.id == songId }\n if (position != -1) {\n notifyItemChanged(position)\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * Clear all playing states\n */\n fun clearPlayingStates() {\n playingStates.clear()\n notifyDataSetChanged()\n }\n \n inner class SongViewHolder(itemView: View) : RecyclerView.ViewHolder(itemView) {\n private val albumArt: ImageView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.ivAlbumArt)\n private val title: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.tvTitle)\n private val artist: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.tvArtist)\n private val duration: TextView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.tvDuration)\n private val playingIndicator: ImageView = itemView.findViewById(R.id.ivPlayingIndicator)\n \n fun bind(song: Song, isPlaying: Boolean) {\n title.text = song.title\n artist.text = song.artist\n duration.text = song.getFormattedDuration()\n \n // Load album artwork\n Glide.with(itemView.context)\n .load(song.artworkUrl)\n .apply(\n RequestOptions()\n .placeholder(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)\n .error(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)\n .transform(RoundedCorners(16))\n )\n .into(albumArt)\n \n // Show/hide playing indicator\n playingIndicator.visibility = if (isPlaying) View.VISIBLE else View.GONE\n \n // Set click listener\n itemView.setOnClickListener {\n onSongClick(song, currentList)\n }\n \n // Update text color based on playing state\n if (isPlaying) {\n title.setTextColor(itemView.context.getColor(R.color.colorPrimary))\n artist.setTextColor(itemView.context.getColor(R.color.colorPrimary))\n } else {\n title.setTextColor(itemView.context.getColor(R.color.textPrimary))\n artist.setTextColor(itemView.context.getColor(R.color.textSecondary))\n }\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * DiffUtil callback for efficient list updates\n */\n private class SongDiffCallback : DiffUtil.ItemCallback<Song>() {\n override fun areItemsTheSame(oldItem: Song, newItem: Song): Boolean {\n return oldItem.id == newItem.id\n }\n \n override fun areContentsTheSame(oldItem: Song, newItem: Song): Boolean {\n return oldItem == newItem\n }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now I need to "package com.nauh.musicplayer.ui\n\nimport android.content.Intent\nimport android.os.Bundle\nimport android.view.View\nimport android.widget.ProgressBar\nimport android.widget.TextView\nimport android.widget.Toast\nimport androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity\nimport androidx.appcompat.widget.SearchView\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView\nimport androidx.swiperefreshlayout.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.R\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.MainContract\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.repository.MusicRepository\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.presenter.MainPresenter\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.adapter.SongAdapter\n\n/**\n * Main activity displaying the list of songs\n * Implements MVP pattern as the View layer\n */\nclass MainActivity : AppCompatActivity(), MainContract.View {\n \n private lateinit var presenter: MainPresenter\n private lateinit var songAdapter: SongAdapter\n \n // UI Components\n private lateinit var recyclerView: RecyclerView\n private lateinit var progressBar: ProgressBar\n private lateinit var emptyStateText: TextView\n private lateinit var swipeRefreshLayout: SwipeRefreshLayout\n private lateinit var searchView: SearchView\n \n companion object {\n private const val TAG = \"MainActivity\"\n }\n \n override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {\n super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)\n setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)\n \n initializeViews()\n setupRecyclerView()\n setupSearchView()\n setupSwipeRefresh()\n initializePresenter()\n \n // Load songs\n presenter.loadSongs()\n }\n \n private fun initializeViews() {\n recyclerView = findViewById(R.id.recyclerViewSongs)\n progressBar = findViewById(R.id.progressBar)\n emptyStateText = findViewById(R.id.tvEmptyState)\n swipeRefreshLayout = findViewById(R.id.swipeRefreshLayout)\n searchView = findViewById(R.id.searchView)\n }\n \n private fun setupRecyclerView() {\n songAdapter = SongAdapter { song, playlist ->\n presenter.onSongClicked(song, playlist)\n }\n \n recyclerView.apply {\n layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(this@MainActivity)\n adapter = songAdapter\n setHasFixedSize(true)\n }\n }\n \n private fun setupSearchView() {\n searchView.setOnQueryTextListener(object : SearchView.OnQueryTextListener {\n override fun onQueryTextSubmit(query: String?): Boolean {\n query?.let { presenter.searchSongs(it) }\n return true\n }\n \n override fun onQueryTextChange(newText: String?): Boolean {\n if (newText.isNullOrBlank()) {\n presenter.loadSongs()\n } else {\n presenter.searchSongs(newText)\n }\n return true\n }\n })\n }\n \n private fun setupSwipeRefresh() {\n swipeRefreshLayout.setOnRefreshListener {\n presenter.onRefresh()\n }\n \n swipeRefreshLayout.setColorSchemeResources(\n R.color.colorPrimary,\n R.color.colorAccent\n )\n }\n \n private fun initializePresenter() {\n val musicRepository = MusicRepository()\n presenter = MainPresenter(musicRepository)\n presenter.attachView(this)\n }\n \n override fun onDestroy() {\n super.onDestroy()\n presenter.detachView()\n }\n \n // MainContract.View implementation\n \n override fun showSongs(songs: List<Song>) {\n songAdapter.submitList(songs)\n recyclerView.visibility = View.VISIBLE\n }\n \n override fun showLoading() {\n progressBar.visibility = View.VISIBLE\n swipeRefreshLayout.isRefreshing = false\n }\n \n override fun hideLoading() {\n progressBar.visibility = View.GONE\n swipeRefreshLayout.isRefreshing = false\n }\n \n override fun showError(message: String) {\n Toast.makeText(this, message, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show()\n }\n \n override fun showEmptyState() {\n emptyStateText.visibility = View.VISIBLE\n recyclerView.visibility = View.GONE\n }\n \n override fun hideEmptyState() {\n emptyStateText.visibility = View.GONE\n recyclerView.visibility = View.VISIBLE\n }\n \n override fun navigateToPlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {\n val intent = Intent(this, PlayerActivity::class.java).apply {\n putExtra(PlayerActivity.EXTRA_SONG, song)\n putParcelableArrayListExtra(PlayerActivity.EXTRA_PLAYLIST, ArrayList(playlist))\n }\n startActivity(intent)\n }\n \n override fun updateSongPlayingState(songId: String, isPlaying: Boolean) {\n songAdapter.updatePlayingState(songId, isPlaying)\n }\n \n override fun onResume() {\n super.onResume()\n // Update playing states when returning from player\n // This could be enhanced with a proper communication mechanism\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"### 12. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/ui/PlayerActivity.kt", "file_content": "package com.nauh.musicplayer.ui\n\nimport android.os.Bundle\nimport android.view.View\nimport android.widget.ImageButton\nimport android.widget.ImageView\nimport android.widget.ProgressBar\nimport android.widget.SeekBar\nimport android.widget.TextView\nimport android.widget.Toast\nimport androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity\nimport com.bumptech.glide.Glide\nimport com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.bitmap.RoundedCorners\nimport com.bumptech.glide.request.RequestOptions\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.R\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.PlayerContract\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.presenter.PlayerPresenter\n\n/**\n * Player activity for music playback control\n * Implements MVP pattern as the View layer\n */\nclass PlayerActivity : AppCompatActivity(), PlayerContract.View {\n \n private lateinit var presenter: PlayerPresenter\n \n // UI Components\n private lateinit var albumArt: ImageView\n private lateinit var songTitle: TextView\n private lateinit var artistName: TextView\n private lateinit var currentTime: TextView\n private lateinit var totalTime: TextView\n private lateinit var seekBar: SeekBar\n private lateinit var playPauseButton: ImageButton\n private lateinit var previousButton: ImageButton\n private lateinit var nextButton: ImageButton\n private lateinit var shuffleButton: ImageButton\n private lateinit var repeatButton: ImageButton\n private lateinit var progressBar: ProgressBar\n private lateinit var backButton: ImageButton\n \n private var isUserSeeking = false\n \n companion object {\n const val EXTRA_SONG = \"extra_song\"\n const val EXTRA_PLAYLIST = \"extra_playlist\"\n private const val TAG = \"PlayerActivity\"\n }\n \n override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {\n super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)\n setContentView(R.layout.activity_player)\n \n initializeViews()\n setupClickListeners()\n setupSeekBar()\n initializePresenter()\n \n // Get song and playlist from intent\n val song = intent.getParcelableExtra<Song>(EXTRA_SONG)\n val playlist = intent.getParcelableArrayListExtra<Song>(EXTRA_PLAYLIST) ?: emptyList()\n \n if (song != null) {\n presenter.initializePlayer(song, playlist)\n } else {\n showError(\"No song selected\")\n finish()\n }\n }\n \n private fun initializeViews() {\n albumArt = findViewById(R.id.ivAlbumArt)\n songTitle = findViewById(R.id.tvSongTitle)\n artistName = findViewById(R.id.tvArtistName)\n currentTime = findViewById(R.id.tvCurrentTime)\n totalTime = findViewById(R.id.tvTotalTime)\n seekBar = findViewById(R.id.seekBar)\n playPauseButton = findViewById(R.id.btnPlayPause)\n previousButton = findViewById(R.id.btnPrevious)\n nextButton = findViewById(R.id.btnNext)\n shuffleButton = findViewById(R.id.btnShuffle)\n repeatButton = findViewById(R.id.btnRepeat)\n progressBar = findViewById(R.id.progressBar)\n backButton = findViewById(R.id.btnBack)\n }\n \n private fun setupClickListeners() {\n playPauseButton.setOnClickListener { presenter.playPause() }\n previousButton.setOnClickListener { presenter.skipToPrevious() }\n nextButton.setOnClickListener { presenter.skipToNext() }\n shuffleButton.setOnClickListener { presenter.toggleShuffle() }\n repeatButton.setOnClickListener { presenter.toggleRepeat() }\n backButton.setOnClickListener { finish() }\n }\n \n private fun setupSeekBar() {\n seekBar.setOnSeekBarChangeListener(object : SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener {\n override fun onProgressChanged(seekBar: SeekBar?, progress: Int, fromUser: Boolean) {\n if (fromUser) {\n // Update current time display while dragging\n val duration = presenter.getDuration()\n val position = (progress / 100.0 * duration).toLong()\n currentTime.text = formatTime(position)\n }\n }\n \n override fun onStartTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {\n isUserSeeking = true\n }\n \n override fun onStopTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {\n isUserSeeking = false\n seekBar?.let { bar ->\n val duration = presenter.getDuration()\n val position = (bar.progress / 100.0 * duration).toLong()\n presenter.seekTo(position)\n }\n }\n })\n }\n \n private fun initializePresenter() {\n presenter = PlayerPresenter(this)\n presenter.attachView(this)\n }\n \n override fun onDestroy() {\n super.onDestroy()\n presenter.detachView()\n }\n \n // PlayerContract.View implementation\n \n override fun showSongInfo(song: Song) {\n songTitle.text = song.title\n artistName.text = song.artist\n totalTime.text = song.getFormattedDuration()\n \n // Load album artwork\n Glide.with(this)\n .load(song.artworkUrl)\n .apply(\n RequestOptions()\n .placeholder(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)\n .error(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)\n .transform(RoundedCorners(24))\n )\n .into(albumArt)\n }\n \n override fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean) {\n val iconRes = if (isPlaying) R.drawable.ic_pause else R.drawable.ic_play\n playPauseButton.setImageResource(iconRes)\n }\n \n override fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long) {\n if (!isUserSeeking) {\n currentTime.text = formatTime(currentPosition)\n totalTime.text = formatTime(duration)\n }\n }\n \n override fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int) {\n if (!isUserSeeking) {\n seekBar.progress = position\n seekBar.max = max\n }\n }\n \n override fun showLoading() {\n progressBar.visibility = View.VISIBLE\n }\n \n override fun hideLoading() {\n progressBar.visibility = View.GONE\n }\n \n override fun showError(message: String) {\n Toast.makeText(this, message, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show()\n }\n \n override fun enablePreviousButton(enabled: Boolean) {\n previousButton.isEnabled = enabled\n previousButton.alpha = if (enabled) 1.0f else 0.5f\n }\n \n override fun enableNextButton(enabled: Boolean) {\n nextButton.isEnabled = enabled\n nextButton.alpha = if (enabled) 1.0f else 0.5f\n }\n \n override fun showShuffleState(isShuffled: Boolean) {\n val alpha = if (isShuffled) 1.0f else 0.5f\n shuffleButton.alpha = alpha\n }\n \n override fun showRepeatState(repeatMode: Int) {\n when (repeatMode) {\n PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF -> {\n repeatButton.setImageResource(R.drawable.ic_repeat)\n repeatButton.alpha = 0.5f\n }\n PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> {\n repeatButton.setImageResource(R.drawable.ic_repeat)\n repeatButton.alpha = 1.0f\n }\n PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE -> {\n repeatButton.setImageResource(R.drawable.ic_repeat_one)\n repeatButton.alpha = 1.0f\n }\n }\n }\n \n override fun updatePlaylist(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {\n // Could be used to update a playlist view if implemented\n }\n \n override fun showBuffering(isBuffering: Boolean) {\n if (isBuffering) {\n showLoading()\n } else {\n hideLoading()\n }\n }\n \n private fun formatTime(timeMs: Long): String {\n val totalSeconds = timeMs / 1000\n val minutes = totalSeconds / 60\n val seconds = totalSeconds % 60\n return String.format(\"%02d:%02d\", minutes, seconds)\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"### 13. ","workspace_file_chunks":[]},{"status":"success","request_id":"2bb52f45-0f95-4ea9-9788-77053dd5a023","request_message":"","structured_output_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":5,"content":"","tool_use":{"tool_use_id":"toolu_vrtx_01YZU78avZkaa2UnjZSUCQEE","tool_name":"str-replace-editor","input_json":"{"command": "str_replace", "path": "README.md", "instruction_reminder": "ALWAYS BREAK DOWN EDITS INTO SMALLER CHUNKS OF AT MOST 150 LINES EACH.", "old_str": "# Music Player\n\nA modern Android music player application built with MVP architecture, featuring background playback service and media notifications.\n\n## \ud83c\udfb5 Features\n\n- **MVP Architecture**: Clean separation of concerns with Model-View-Presenter pattern\n- **Background Playback**: Continues playing music when app is minimized\n- **Media Notifications**: Rich notifications with playback controls\n- **ExoPlayer Integration**: Professional audio streaming with ExoPlayer\n- **Modern UI**: Material Design with smooth animations\n- **Search Functionality**: Search songs by title, artist, or album\n- **Playlist Support**: Play multiple songs in sequence\n- **Media Controls**: Play, pause, skip, seek, shuffle, and repeat\n\n## \ud83c\udfd7\ufe0f Architecture\n\nThis app follows the **MVP (Model-View-Presenter)** architectural pattern:\n\n### Model Layer\n- **Data Models**: `Song`, `Playlist` - Core data structures\n- **Repository**: `MusicRepository` - Data access and management\n- **API Service**: Handles music streaming from remote sources\n\n### View Layer\n- **Activities**: `MainActivity`, `PlayerActivity` - UI components\n- **Adapters**: `SongAdapter` - RecyclerView data binding\n- **XML Layouts**: All UI designed with XML (no Jetpack Compose)\n\n### Presenter Layer\n- **Presenters**: `MainPresenter`, `PlayerPresenter` - Business logic\n- **Contracts**: MVP interfaces defining communication protocols\n\n### Service Layer\n- **MusicService**: Background audio playback using ExoPlayer\n- **NotificationHelper**: Media notification management\n\n## \ud83c\udfb5 Features\n\n- **Song List**: Browse available songs with album artwork\n- **Music Player**: Full-featured player with controls\n- **Background Playback**: Music continues when app is minimized\n- **Media Notifications**: Control playback from notification panel\n- **Search**: Find songs by title, artist, or album\n- **Responsive UI**: Smooth animations and modern design\n\n## \ud83d\udee0\ufe0f Technical Stack\n\n- **Language**: Kotlin\n- **Architecture**: MVP (Model-View-Presenter)\n- **Audio Engine**: ExoPlayer (Media3)\n- **UI Framework**: Android Views (XML layouts)\n- **Networking**: Retrofit + OkHttp\n- **Image Loading**: Glide\n- **Dependency Injection**: Manual DI (no framework)\n- **Testing**: JUnit for unit tests\n\n## \ud83d\udcf1 Screenshots\n\nThe app features a clean, modern interface similar to popular music players:\n\n- **Main Screen**: List of songs with album art, titles, and artists\n- **Player Screen**: Full-screen player with large album art and controls\n- **Notification**: Media controls in the notification panel\n\n## \ud83c\udfaf Key Components\n\n### MainActivity\n- Displays list of available songs\n- Implements search functionality\n- Handles song selection and navigation\n\n### PlayerActivity \n- Full-screen music player interface\n- Playback controls (play/pause, skip, seek)\n- Progress tracking and song information display\n\n### MusicService\n- Background service for audio playback\n- ExoPlayer integration for streaming\n- Media session for system integration\n\n### NotificationHelper\n- Creates and manages media notifications\n- Provides playback controls in notification panel\n- Handles notification actions\n\n## \ud83d\udd27 Setup and Installation\n\n1. **Clone the repository**\n ```bash\n git clone <repository-url>\n cd MusicPlayer\n ```\n\n2. **Open in Android Studio**\n - Open Android Studio\n - Select \"Open an existing project\"\n - Navigate to the project directory\n\n3. **Build and Run**\n ```bash\n ./gradlew assembleDebug\n ```\n\n4. **Install on device/emulator**\n ```bash\n adb install app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk\n ```\n\n## \ud83c\udfb5 Sample Music\n\nThe app includes 7 sample songs for testing:\n\n1. **\"12600 lettres (D\u00e9bat)\"** - Franco & TP OK Jazz\n2. **\"Again & Again\"** - Usatof \n3. **\"Ain't No Mountain High Enough\"** - Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell\n4. **\"All I Have to Do Is Dream\"** - The Everly Brothers\n5. **\"All Night\"** - Siddy Ranks\n6. **\"Escape (The Pi\u00f1a Colada Song)\"** - Rupert Holmes\n7. **\"September\"** - Earth, Wind & Fire\n\nAll songs use publicly available demo tracks for testing purposes.\n\n## \ud83d\udcc1 Project Structure\n\n```\napp/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 contract/ # MVP contracts\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 MainContract.kt\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 PlayerContract.kt\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 data/ # Data layer\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 model/\n\u2502 \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 Song.kt\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 Playlist.kt\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 repository/\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 MusicRepository.kt\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 presenter/ # Business logic\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 MainPresenter.kt\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 PlayerPresenter.kt\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 service/ # Background services\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 MusicService.kt\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 MusicServiceConnection.kt\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 NotificationHelper.kt\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 ui/ # View layer\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 adapter/\n\u2502 \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 SongAdapter.kt\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 MainActivity.kt\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 PlayerActivity.kt\n\u2514\u2500\u2500 MusicPlayerApplication.kt\n```\n\n## \ud83c\udfaf Key Implementation Details\n\n### MVP Pattern\n- **Contracts**: Define interfaces between View and Presenter\n- **Presenters**: Handle business logic and coordinate between View and Model\n- **Views**: Activities implement View interfaces for UI updates\n\n### Background Playback\n- **MediaSessionService**: Extends MediaSessionService for background playback\n- **ExoPlayer**: Handles audio streaming and playback\n- **MediaSession**: Integrates with Android's media system\n\n### Notifications\n- **MediaStyle**: Uses MediaStyle notifications for playback controls\n- **PendingIntents**: Handle notification button actions\n- **Foreground Service**: Keeps service alive during playback\n\n## \ud83e\uddea Testing\n\nRun unit tests:\n```bash\n./gradlew test\n```\n\nThe project includes unit tests for:\n- Song model functionality\n- Data formatting methods\n- Core business logic\n\n## \ud83d\udd04 How It Works\n\n### When You Open the App:\n1. **MainActivity** loads and displays the song list\n2. **MainPresenter** fetches songs from **MusicRepository**\n3. **SongAdapter** displays songs in RecyclerView with album art\n\n### When You Click a Song:\n1. **MainActivity** \u2192 `onSongClicked()` \u2192 **PlayerActivity**\n2. **PlayerActivity** \u2192 `initializePlayer()` \u2192 **PlayerPresenter** \n3. **PlayerPresenter** \u2192 `playPlaylist()` \u2192 **MusicServiceConnection**\n4. **MusicServiceConnection** \u2192 **MusicService** \u2192 **ExoPlayer**\n5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL\n\n### Real-time Updates:\n- Progress bar updates automatically\n- Play/pause button state changes\n- Song information displays\n- Navigation buttons work\n\n## \ud83d\udccb Requirements\n\n- **Android API Level**: 24+ (Android 7.0)\n-
