Path: MUSIC_PLAYBACK_GUIDE.md
...
 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work
 44	
 45	## How to Test
 46	
 47	### 1. **Build and Install**
 48	```bash
 49	./gradlew assembleDebug
 50	# Install APK on device/emulator
 51	```

 185	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 186	 if (!isConnected || mediaController == null) {
 187	 Log.d(TAG, "Not connected, storing playlist for later")
 188	 pendingPlaylist = Pair(songs, startIndex)
 189	 return
 190	 }
 191	
 192	 Log.d(TAG, "Playing playlist with ${songs.size} songs, starting at index $startIndex")
 193	
 194	 try {
 195	 val mediaItems = songs.map { song -> MusicService.createMediaItem(song) }
 196	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 197	 mediaController?.prepare()
 198	 mediaController?.play()
 199	 Log.d(TAG, "Playlist started successfully")
 200	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 201	 Log.e(TAG, "Error playing playlist", e)
 202	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackError("Failed to play playlist: ${e.message}")
 203	 }
 204	 }
 205	 
 206	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 207	 playPlaylist(listOf(song), 0)
 208	 }

 106	 private fun setupSeekBar() {
 107	 seekBar.setOnSeekBarChangeListener(object : SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener {
 108	 override fun onProgressChanged(seekBar: SeekBar?, progress: Int, fromUser: Boolean) {
 109	 if (fromUser) {
 110	 // Calculate position based on progress and duration
 111	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with actual player
 112	 }
 113	 }
 114	 
 115	 override fun onStartTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {}
 116	 
 117	 override fun onStopTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {
 118	 seekBar?.let { bar ->
 119	 // Seek to the selected position
 120	 val progress = bar.progress
 121	 val duration = bar.max
 122	 if (duration > 0) {
 123	 val position = (progress.toFloat() / 100f * duration).toLong()
 124	 presenter.seekTo(position)
 125	 }
 126	 }
 127	 }
 128	 })
 129	 
 130	 // Setup control button listeners
 131	 playPauseButton.setOnClickListener {
 132	 presenter.playPause()
 133	 }
 134	 
 135	 previousButton.setOnClickListener {
 136	 presenter.skipToPrevious()
 137	 }
 138	 
 139	 nextButton.setOnClickListener {
 140	 presenter.skipToNext()
 141	 }
 142	 
 143	 shuffleButton.setOnClickListener {
 144	 presenter.toggleShuffle()
 145	 }
 146	 
 147	 repeatButton.setOnClickListener {
 148	 presenter.toggleRepeat()
 149	 }
 150	 }

 157	 // MVP View Interface Implementation
 158	 override fun showSongInfo(song: Song) {
 159	 songTitle.text = song.title
 160	 artistName.text = song.artist
 161	 albumName.text = song.album
 162	 totalTime.text = song.getFormattedDuration()
 163	 
 164	 // Load album artwork
 165	 Glide.with(this)
 166	 .load(song.artworkUrl)
 167	 .placeholder(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)
 168	 .error(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)
 169	 .transform(RoundedCorners(32))
 170	 .into(albumArtwork)
 171	 }
 172	
 173	 override fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 174	 val iconRes = if (isPlaying) R.drawable.ic_pause else R.drawable.ic_play_arrow
 175	 playPauseButton.setImageResource(iconRes)
 176	 }
 177	
 178	 override fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long) {
 179	 val minutes = (currentPosition / 1000) / 60
 180	 val seconds = (currentPosition / 1000) % 60
 181	 currentTime.text = String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes, seconds)
 182	 }
 183	
 184	 override fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int) {
 185	 seekBar.max = max
 186	 seekBar.progress = position
 187	 }
 188	
 189	 override fun showLoading() {
 190	 progressBar.visibility = View.VISIBLE
 191	 }
 192	
 193	 override fun hideLoading() {
 194	 progressBar.visibility = View.GONE
 195	 }
 196	
 197	 override fun showError(message: String) {
 198	 Toast.makeText(this, message, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show()
 199	 }

 10	class PlayerPresenter : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 11	 
 12	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null

 137	 private fun updateNavigationButtons() {

 141	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 142	 }

 145	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 146	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 147	 else -> currentIndex < playlist.size - 1
 148	 }
 149

 19	/**
 20	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 21	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 22	 */
 23	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 24	 
 25	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 26	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 27	 
 28	 override fun onCreate() {
 29	 super.onCreate()
 30	 initializePlayer()
 31	 initializeMediaSession()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 35	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 36	 .setAudioAttributes(
 37	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 38	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 39	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 40	 .build(),
 41	 true
 42	 )
 43	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 44	 .build()
 45	 }
 46	 
 47	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 48	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 49	 this,
 50	 0,
 51	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 52	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 53	 )
 54	 
 55	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 56	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 57	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 58	 .build()
 59	 }
 60	 
 61	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 62	 return mediaSession
 63	 }
 64	 
 65	 override fun onDestroy() {
 66	 mediaSession?.run {
 67	 player.release()
 68	 release()
 69	 mediaSession = null
 70	 }
 71	 super.onDestroy()
 72	 }

 93	 companion object {
 94	 /**
 95	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 96	 */
 97	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 98	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 99	 .setTitle(song.title)
 100	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 101	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 102	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 103	 .build()
 104	 
 105	 return MediaItem.Builder()
 106	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 107	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 108	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 109	 .build()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 /**
 113	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 114	 */
 115	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 116	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 117	 }
 118	 }
 119	}

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.contract

 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song

 5	/**
 6	 * Contract interface for Player screen MVP pattern
 7	 * Defines the communication between View, Presenter, and Model for music playback
 8	 */
 9	interface PlayerContract {
 10	 
 11	 /**
 12	 * View interface - defines what the Player View can do
 13	 */
 14	 interface View {
 15	 fun showSongInfo(song: Song)
 16	 fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean)
 17	 fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long)
 18	 fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int)
 19	 fun showLoading()
 20	 fun hideLoading()
 21	 fun showError(message: String)
 22	 fun enablePreviousButton(enabled: Boolean)
 23	 fun enableNextButton(enabled: Boolean)
 24	 fun showShuffleState(isShuffled: Boolean)
 25	 fun showRepeatState(repeatMode: Int)
 26	 fun updatePlaylist(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int)
 27	 }
 28	 
 29	 /**
 30	 * Presenter interface - defines what the Player Presenter can do
 31	 */
 32	 interface Presenter {
 33	 fun attachView(view: View)
 34	 fun detachView()
 35	 fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>)
 36	 fun playPause()
 37	 fun seekTo(position: Long)
 38	 fun skipToNext()
 39	 fun skipToPrevious()
 40	 fun toggleShuffle()
 41	 fun toggleRepeat()
 42	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 43	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 44	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song)
 45	 fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int)
 46	 }
 47	 
 48	 /**
 49	 * Repeat modes for the player
 50	 */
 51	 object RepeatMode {
 52	 const val OFF = 0
 53	 const val ONE = 1
 54	 const val ALL = 2
 55	 }
 56	}
 57

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model
 2	
 3	import android.os.Parcelable
 4	import kotlinx.parcelize.Parcelize
 5	
 6	/**
 7	 * Data model representing a song with all necessary information for streaming
 8	 */
 9	@Parcelize
 10	data class Song(
 11	 val id: String,
 12	 val title: String,
 13	 val artist: String,
 14	 val album: String,
 15	 val duration: Long, // Duration in milliseconds
 16	 val artworkUrl: String,
 17	 val streamUrl: String,
 18	 val genre: String? = null,
 19	 val releaseYear: Int? = null,
 20	 val trackNumber: Int? = null
 21	) : Parcelable {
 22	 
 23	 /**
 24	 * Returns formatted duration string (mm:ss)
 25	 */
 26	 fun getFormattedDuration(): String {
 27	 val minutes = (duration / 1000) / 60
 28	 val seconds = (duration / 1000) % 60
 29	 return String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes, seconds)
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 /**
 33	 * Returns display text for artist and album
 34	 */
 35	 fun getArtistAlbumText(): String {
 36	 return "$artist $album"
 37	 }
 38	}

Path: app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/data/repository/MusicRepository.kt
 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.repository
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.api.MockMusicData
 4	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.api.MusicApiService
 5	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 6	import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
 7	import kotlinx.coroutines.delay
 8	import kotlinx.coroutines.withContext
 9	
 10	/**
 11	 * Repository class that handles data operations for music
 12	 * Implements the Repository pattern to abstract data sources
 13	 */
 14	class MusicRepository(
 15	 private val apiService: MusicApiService? = null
 16	) {
 17	 
 18	 /**
 19	 * Fetch all songs from the data source
 20	 * For demo purposes, returns mock data with simulated network delay
 21	 */
 22	 suspend fun getAllSongs(): Result<List<Song>> {
 23	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 24	 try {
 25	 // Simulate network delay
 26	 delay(1000)
 27	 
 28	 // For demo purposes, return mock data
 29	 // In a real app, this would call apiService.getAllSongs()
 30	 val songs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 31	 Result.success(songs)
 32	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 33	 Result.failure(e)
 34	 }
 35	 }
 36	 }
 37	 
 38	 /**
 39	 * Search songs by query
 40	 */
 41	 suspend fun searchSongs(query: String): Result<List<Song>> {
 42	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 43	 try {
 44	 delay(500) // Simulate network delay
 45	 
 46	 val allSongs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 47	 val filteredSongs = allSongs.filter { song ->
 48	 song.title.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||
 49	 song.artist.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||
 50	 song.album.contains(query, ignoreCase = true)
 51	 }
 52	 
 53	 Result.success(filteredSongs)
 54	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 55	 Result.failure(e)
 56	 }
 57	 }
 58	 }
 59	 
 60	 /**
 61	 * Get song by ID
 62	 */
 63	 suspend fun getSongById(id: String): Result<Song?> {
 64	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 65	 try {
 66	 delay(300) // Simulate network delay
 67	 
 68	 val song = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs().find { it.id == id }
 69	 Result.success(song)
 70	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 71	 Result.failure(e)
 72	 }
 73	 }
 74	 }
 75	 
 76	 /**
 77	 * Get songs by genre
 78	 */
 79	 suspend fun getSongsByGenre(genre: String): Result<List<Song>> {
 80	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 81	 try {
 82	 delay(500) // Simulate network delay
 83	 
 84	 val allSongs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 85	 val filteredSongs = allSongs.filter { song ->
 86	 song.genre?.equals(genre, ignoreCase = true) == true
 87	 }
 88	 
 89	 Result.success(filteredSongs)
 90	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 91	 Result.failure(e)
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	 }

Path: app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/data/provider/LocalMusicProvider.kt
 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.provider
 2	
 3	import android.content.Context
 4	import android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever
 5	import android.net.Uri
 6	import android.util.Log
 7	import com.nauh.musicplayer.R
 8	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 9	import java.lang.reflect.Field
 10	
 11	/**
 12	 * Provider class for loading music files from the app's raw resources directory
 13	 * Scans res/raw folder and creates Song objects for local music files
 14	 */
 15	class LocalMusicProvider(private val context: Context) {
 16	 
 17	 companion object {
 18	 private const val TAG = "LocalMusicProvider"
 19	 private const val DEFAULT_ARTWORK_URL = "android.resource://com.nauh.musicplayer/drawable/placeholder_album_art"
 20	 }
 21	 
 22	 /**
 23	 * Scans the res/raw directory and returns a list of Song objects for all music files
 24	 */
 25	 fun getLocalSongs(): List<Song> {
 26	 Log.d(TAG, "Scanning local music files from res/raw")
 27	 val songs = mutableListOf<Song>()
 28	 
 29	 try {
 30	 // Get all raw resource IDs using reflection
 31	 val rawResourceIds = getRawResourceIds()
 32	 Log.d(TAG, "Found ${rawResourceIds.size} raw resources")
 33	 
 34	 rawResourceIds.forEach { (resourceName, resourceId) ->
 35	 if (isMusicFile(resourceName)) {
 36	 Log.d(TAG, "Processing music file: $resourceName")
 37	 val song = createSongFromRawResource(resourceName, resourceId)
 38	 if (song != null) {
 39	 songs.add(song)
 40	 Log.d(TAG, "Added song: ${song.title}")
 41	 }
 42	 }
 43	 }
 44	 
 45	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 46	 Log.e(TAG, "Error scanning local music files", e)
 47	 }
 48	 
 49	 Log.d(TAG, "Successfully loaded ${songs.size} local songs")
 50	 return songs
 51	 }
 52	 
 53	 /**
 54	 * Gets all raw resource IDs using reflection
 55	 */
 56	 private fun getRawResourceIds(): Map<String, Int> {
 57	 val resourceMap = mutableMapOf<String, Int>()
 58	 
 59	 try {
 60	 val rawClass = R.raw::class.java
 61	 val fields: Array<Field> = rawClass.declaredFields
 62	 
 63	 for (field in fields) {
 64	 try {
 65	 val resourceName = field.name
 66	 val resourceId = field.getInt(null)
 67	 resourceMap[resourceName] = resourceId
 68	 Log.d(TAG, "Found raw resource: $resourceName -> $resourceId")
 69	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 70	 Log.w(TAG, "Could not access field: ${field.name}", e)
 71	 }
 72	 }
 73	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 74	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting raw resource IDs", e)
 75	 }
 76	 
 77	 return resourceMap
 78	 }
 79	 
 80	 /**
 81	 * Checks if a resource name represents a music file based on common audio file extensions
 82	 */
 83	 private fun isMusicFile(resourceName: String): Boolean {
 84	 val audioExtensions = listOf("mp3", "wav", "m4a", "aac", "ogg", "flac")
 85	 return audioExtensions.any { ext ->
 86	 resourceName.lowercase().contains(ext) || resourceName.lowercase().endsWith("_$ext")
 87	 }
 88	 }
 89	 
 90	 /**
 91	 * Creates a Song object from a raw resource
 92	 */
 93	 private fun createSongFromRawResource(resourceName: String, resourceId: Int): Song? {
 94	 return try {
 95	 val uri = Uri.parse("android.resource://${context.packageName}/$resourceId")
 96	 Log.d(TAG, "Created URI for $resourceName: $uri")
 97	 
 98	 // Extract metadata using MediaMetadataRetriever
 99	 val metadata = extractMetadata(uri)
 100	 
 101	 // Generate song details
 102	 val title = metadata.title ?: formatResourceNameAsTitle(resourceName)
 103	 val artist = metadata.artist ?: "Local Artist"
 104	 val album = metadata.album ?: "Local Music"
 105	 val duration = metadata.duration ?: estimateDuration()
 106	 
 107	 Song(
 108	 id = "local_$resourceId",
 109	 title = title,
 110	 artist = artist,
 111	 album = album,
 112	 duration = duration,
 113	 artworkUrl = DEFAULT_ARTWORK_URL,
 114	 streamUrl = uri.toString(),
 115	 genre = "Local"
 116	 )
 117	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 118	 Log.e(TAG, "Error creating song from resource: $resourceName", e)
 119	 null
 120	 }
 121	 }
 122	 
 123	 /**
 124	 * Data class to hold extracted metadata
 125	 */
 126	 private data class AudioMetadata(
 127	 val title: String? = null,
 128	 val artist: String? = null,
 129	 val album: String? = null,
 130	 val duration: Long? = null
 131	 )

 104	
 105	### Prerequisites
 106	- Android Studio Arctic Fox or later
 107	- Android SDK API 24+ (Android 7.0)
 108	- Kotlin 1.8+
 109	
 110	### Installation
 111	1. Clone the repository
 112	2. Open in Android Studio
 113	3. Sync Gradle dependencies
 114	4. Run on device or emulator
 115	
 116	### Configuration
 117	The app currently uses mock data for demonstration. To integrate with a real API:
 118	
 119	1. Update `MusicApiService` with your API endpoints
 120	2. Modify `MusicRepository` to use actual network calls
 121	3. Replace mock data in `MockMusicData` with real data sources
 122	
 123	## Project Structure

 73	The app includes 7 sample songs:
 74	1. **"12600 lettres (Dbat)"** - Franco & TP OK Jazz
 75	2. **"Again & Again"** - Usatof
 76	3. **"Ain't No Mountain High Enough"** - Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell
 77	4. **"All I Have to Do Is Dream"** - The Everly Brothers
 78	5. **"All Night"** - Siddy Ranks
 79	6. **"Escape (The Pia Colada Song)"** - Rupert Holmes
 80	7. **"September"** - Earth, Wind & Fire
 81	
 82	All songs use SoundHelix demo tracks for testing.
 83	
 84	## Technical Details
 85	
 86	### Architecture:
 87	- **MVP Pattern**: Clean separation of concerns
 88	- **ExoPlayer**: Professional audio streaming
 89	- **MediaSession**: System integration for media controls
 90	- **Background Service**: Continues playback when app is minimized

 6	/**
 7	 * Data model representing a song with all necessary information for streaming
 8	 */
 9	@Parcelize
 10	data class Song(
 11	 val id: String,
 12	 val title: String,
 13	 val artist: String,
 14	 val album: String,
 15	 val duration: Long, // Duration in milliseconds
 16	 val artworkUrl: String,
 17	 val streamUrl: String,
 18	 val genre: String? = null,
 19	 val releaseYear: Int? = null,
 20	 val trackNumber: Int? = null
 21	) : Parcelable {
 22	 
 23	 /**
 24	 * Returns formatted duration string (mm:ss)
 25	 */
 26	 fun getFormattedDuration(): String {
 27	 val minutes = (duration / 1000) / 60
 28	 val seconds = (duration / 1000) % 60
 29	 return String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes, seconds)
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 /**
 33	 * Returns display text for artist and album
 34	 */
 35	 fun getArtistAlbumText(): String {
 36	 return "$artist $album"
 37	 }
 38	}

 128	 } else 0

 130	 }

 144	 view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)
 145	 updateNavigationButtons()
 146	 }

 152	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 153	 }

"package com.nauh.musicplayer\n\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.PlayerContract\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song\nimport com.nauh.musicplayer.presenter.PlayerPresenter\nimport org.junit.Before\nimport org.junit.Test\nimport org.mockito.Mock\nimport org.mockito.Mockito.*\nimport org.mockito.MockitoAnnotations\n\n/**\n * Unit test for PlayerPresenter\n */\nclass PlayerPresenterTest {\n \n @Mock\n private lateinit var mockView: PlayerContract.View\n \n private lateinit var presenter: PlayerPresenter\n \n private val testSong = Song(\n id = \"1\",\n title = \"Test Song\",\n artist = \"Test Artist\",\n album = \"Test Album\",\n duration = 180000, // 3 minutes\n artworkUrl = \"test_artwork_url\",\n streamUrl = \"test_stream_url\"\n )\n \n private val testPlaylist = listOf(\n testSong,\n Song(\n id = \"2\",\n title = \"Test Song 2\",\n artist = \"Test Artist 2\",\n album = \"Test Album 2\",\n duration = 210000,\n artworkUrl = \"test_artwork_url_2\",\n streamUrl = \"test_stream_url_2\"\n )\n )\n \n @Before\n fun setup() {\n MockitoAnnotations.openMocks(this)\n presenter = PlayerPresenter()\n presenter.attachView(mockView)\n }\n \n @Test\n fun initializePlayer_shouldShowSongInfo() {\n // When\n presenter.initializePlayer(testSong, testPlaylist)\n \n // Then\n verify(mockView).showSongInfo(testSong)\n verify(mockView).updatePlaylist(testPlaylist, 0)\n }\n \n @Test\n fun onSongChanged_shouldUpdateView() {\n // When\n presenter.onSongChanged(testSong)\n \n // Then\n verify(mockView).showSongInfo(testSong)\n }\n \n @Test\n fun onPlaybackStateChanged_shouldUpdatePlayPauseButton() {\n // When\n presenter.onPlaybackStateChanged(true)\n \n // Then\n verify(mockView).updatePlayPauseButton(true)\n }\n \n @Test\n fun onProgressUpdate_shouldUpdateProgressAndSeekBar() {\n // Given\n val position = 90000L // 1.5 minutes\n val duration = 180000L // 3 minutes\n \n // When\n presenter.onProgressUpdate(position, duration)\n \n // Then\n verify(mockView).updateProgress(position, duration)\n verify(mockView).updateSeekBar(50, 100) // 50% progress\n }\n \n @Test\n fun toggleShuffle_shouldUpdateShuffleState() {\n // When\n presenter.toggleShuffle()\n \n // Then\n verify(mockView).showShuffleState(true)\n \n // When toggle again\n presenter.toggleShuffle()\n \n // Then\n verify(mockView).showShuffleState(false)\n }\n \n @Test\n fun toggleRepeat_shouldCycleThroughRepeatModes() {\n // When - first toggle (OFF -> ALL)\n presenter.toggleRepeat()\n \n // Then\n verify(mockView).showRepeatState(PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL)\n \n // When - second toggle (ALL -> ONE)\n presenter.toggleRepeat()\n \n // Then\n verify(mockView).showRepeatState(PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE)\n \n // When - third toggle (ONE -> OFF)\n presenter.toggleRepeat()\n \n // Then\n verify(mockView).showRepeatState(PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF)\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"ADB khng c trong PATH.  36	 
 37	 presenterScope.launch {
 38	 try {
 39	 val result = repository.getAllSongs()
 40	 
 41	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 42	 view?.hideLoading()

 50	 view?.showSongs(songs)
 51	 }

 53	 onFailure = { exception ->

 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.PlayerContract
 4	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 5	
 6	/**
 7	 * Presenter for the Player screen
 8	 * Handles business logic for music playback and communication between View and Service
 9	 */
 10	class PlayerPresenter : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 11	 
 12	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 13	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 14	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 15	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 16	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 17	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 18	 
 19	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 20	 this.view = view
 21	 }
 22	 
 23	 override fun detachView() {
 24	 this.view = null
 25	 }
 26	 
 27	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 28	 this.currentSong = song
 29	 this.playlist = playlist
 30	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 31	 
 32	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 33	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 34	 updateNavigationButtons()
 35	 }
 36	 
 37	 override fun playPause() {
 38	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with MusicService
 39	 // For now, just toggle the UI state
 40	 val isCurrentlyPlaying = true // This should come from actual player state
 41	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isCurrentlyPlaying)
 42	 }
 43	 
 44	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 45	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with MusicService
 46	 // For now, just update the UI
 47	 currentSong?.let { song ->
 48	 view?.updateProgress(position, song.duration)
 49	 }
 50	 }
 51	 
 52	 override fun skipToNext() {
 53	 if (playlist.isEmpty()) return
 54	 
 55	 currentIndex = when {
 56	 isShuffled -> (0 until playlist.size).random()
 57	 currentIndex < playlist.size - 1 -> currentIndex + 1
 58	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> 0
 59	 else -> currentIndex // Stay at current if no repeat
 60	 }
 61	 
 62	 if (currentIndex < playlist.size) {
 63	 currentSong = playlist[currentIndex]
 64	 currentSong?.let { song ->
 65	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 66	 onSongChanged(song)
 67	 }
 68	 }
 69	 
 70	 updateNavigationButtons()
 71	 }

 100	 override fun toggleRepeat() {
 101	 repeatMode = when (repeatMode) {
 102	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL
 103	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE
 104	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 105	 else -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 106	 }
 107	 view?.showRepeatState(repeatMode)
 108	 updateNavigationButtons()
 109	 }
 110	 
 111	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 112	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 113	 
 114	 // Update seek bar
 115	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 116	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 117	 } else 0
 118	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 119	 }

 123	 }

 129	 
 130	 override fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {
 131	 this.playlist = songs

 133	 view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)
 134	 updateNavigationButtons()
 135	 }
 136	 
 137	 private fun updateNavigationButtons() {
 138	 val canGoPrevious = when {
 139	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 140	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 141	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 142	 }
 143	 
 144	 val canGoNext = when {
 145	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 146	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 147	 else -> currentIndex < playlist.size - 1
 148	 }
 149	 
 150	 view?.enablePreviousButton(canGoPrevious)
 151	 view?.enableNextButton(canGoNext)
 152	 }

 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work
 44	
 45	## How to Test
 46	
 47	### 1. **Build and Install**
 48	```bash
 49	./gradlew assembleDebug
 50	# Install APK on device/emulator
 51	```

 184	 
 185	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 186	 if (!isConnected || mediaController == null) {
 187	 Log.d(TAG, "Not connected, storing playlist for later")
 188	 pendingPlaylist = Pair(songs, startIndex)
 189	 return
 190	 }
 191	
 192	 Log.d(TAG, "Playing playlist with ${songs.size} songs, starting at index $startIndex")
 193	
 194	 try {
 195	 val mediaItems = songs.map { song -> MusicService.createMediaItem(song) }
 196	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 197	 mediaController?.prepare()
 198	 mediaController?.play()
 199	 Log.d(TAG, "Playlist started successfully")
 200	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 201	 Log.e(TAG, "Error playing playlist", e)
 202	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackError("Failed to play playlist: ${e.message}")
 203	 }
 204	 }
 205	 
 206	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 207	 playPlaylist(listOf(song), 0)
 208	 }

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.app.PendingIntent
 4	import android.content.Intent
 5	import android.os.Bundle
 6	import androidx.media3.common.AudioAttributes
 7	import androidx.media3.common.C
 8	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaMetadata
 10	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 11	import androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer
 12	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSession
 13	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSessionService
 14	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.Futures
 15	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 16	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 17	import com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.MainActivity
 18	
 19	/**
 20	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 21	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 22	 */
 23	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 24	 
 25	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 26	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 27	 
 28	 override fun onCreate() {
 29	 super.onCreate()
 30	 initializePlayer()
 31	 initializeMediaSession()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 35	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 36	 .setAudioAttributes(
 37	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 38	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 39	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 40	 .build(),
 41	 true
 42	 )
 43	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 44	 .build()
 45	 }
 46	 
 47	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 48	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 49	 this,
 50	 0,
 51	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 52	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 53	 )
 54	 
 55	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 56	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 57	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 58	 .build()
 59	 }
 60	 
 61	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 62	 return mediaSession
 63	 }
 64	 
 65	 override fun onDestroy() {
 66	 mediaSession?.run {
 67	 player.release()
 68	 release()
 69	 mediaSession = null
 70	 }
 71	 super.onDestroy()
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 /**
 75	 * Custom MediaSession callback to handle media commands
 76	 */
 77	 private inner class MediaSessionCallback : MediaSession.Callback {
 78	
 79	 override fun onAddMediaItems(
 80	 mediaSession: MediaSession,
 81	 controller: MediaSession.ControllerInfo,
 82	 mediaItems: MutableList<MediaItem>
 83	 ): ListenableFuture<MutableList<MediaItem>> {
 84	 val updatedMediaItems = mediaItems.map { mediaItem ->
 85	 mediaItem.buildUpon()
 86	 .setUri(mediaItem.requestMetadata.mediaUri)
 87	 .build()
 88	 }.toMutableList()
 89	 return Futures.immediateFuture(updatedMediaItems)
 90	 }
 91	 }
 92	 
 93	 companion object {
 94	 /**
 95	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 96	 */
 97	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 98	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 99	 .setTitle(song.title)
 100	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 101	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 102	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 103	 .build()
 104	 
 105	 return MediaItem.Builder()
 106	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 107	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 108	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 109	 .build()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 /**
 113	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 114	 */
 115	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 116	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 117	 }
 118	 }
 119	}

 120	 companion object {
 121	 /**
 122	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 123	 */
 124	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 125	 Log.d(TAG, "Creating MediaItem for song: ${song.title} with URL: ${song.streamUrl}")
 126	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 127	 .setTitle(song.title)
 128	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 129	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 130	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 131	 .build()
 132	
 133	 val mediaItem = MediaItem.Builder()
 134	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 135	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 136	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 137	 .build()
 138	
 139	 Log.d(TAG, "MediaItem created successfully for: ${song.title}")
 140	 return mediaItem
 141	 }
 142	 
 143	 /**
 144	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 145	 */
 146	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 147	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 148	 }
 149	 }

IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "test_music_playback.md", "file_content": "# \ud83c\udfb5 Test Music Playback - Debug Guide\n\n## \u2705 C\u00e1c Thay \u0110\u1ed5i \u0110\u00e3 Th\u1ef1c Hi\u1ec7n:\n\n### 1. **C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt PlayerPresenter**\n- \u2705 Th\u00eam MusicServiceConnection\n- \u2705 Implement c\u00e1c method th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 (playPause, seekTo, skipToNext, skipToPrevious)\n- \u2705 Th\u00eam auto-play khi m\u1edf PlayerActivity\n- \u2705 Th\u00eam delay 500ms \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o service connection\n\n### 2. **C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt PlayerActivity**\n- \u2705 G\u1ecdi `presenter.initializeMusicService(this)` trong initializePresenter()\n\n### 3. **C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt MusicService**\n- \u2705 Th\u00eam logging chi ti\u1ebft\n- \u2705 Th\u00eam Player.Listener \u0111\u1ec3 debug state changes\n\n### 4. **C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt Sample Data**\n- \u2705 Thay th\u1ebf SoundHelix URLs b\u1eb1ng URLs \u0111\u00e1ng tin c\u1eady h\u01a1n:\n - Google Storage: `commondatastorage.googleapis.com`\n - Learning Container: `learningcontainer.com`\n - File Examples: `file-examples.com`\n\n### 5. **C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt AndroidManifest.xml**\n- \u2705 Th\u00eam `android:usesCleartextTraffic=\"true\"`\n\n## \ud83e\uddea C\u00e1ch Test:\n\n### 1. **C\u00e0i \u0111\u1eb7t APK:**\n```bash\n./gradlew assembleDebug\n# C\u00e0i \u0111\u1eb7t file APK t\u1eeb app/build/outputs/apk/debug/\n```\n\n### 2. **Ki\u1ec3m tra Logs:**\n```bash\n# Xem t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 logs li\u00ean quan \u0111\u1ebfn music playback\nadb logcat | grep -E \"(PlayerPresenter|MusicServiceConnection|MusicService|ExoPlayer)\"\n\n# Ho\u1eb7c filter theo tag c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3\nadb logcat -s PlayerPresenter MusicServiceConnection MusicService\n```\n\n### 3. **Test Flow:**\n1. **M\u1edf app** \u2192 Xem danh s\u00e1ch b\u00e0i h\u00e1t\n2. **Click v\u00e0o b\u00e0i h\u00e1t** \u2192 M\u1edf PlayerActivity\n3. **Ki\u1ec3m tra logs** \u2192 Xem c\u00f3 l\u1ed7i g\u00ec kh\u00f4ng\n4. **Nh\u1ea5n Play/Pause** \u2192 Test controls\n\n## \ud83d\udd0d Debug Checklist:\n\n### **N\u1ebfu v\u1eabn kh\u00f4ng ph\u00e1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1ea1c, ki\u1ec3m tra:**\n\n1. **Service Connection:**\n - [ ] MusicService c\u00f3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c start kh\u00f4ng?\n - [ ] MediaController c\u00f3 connect \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kh\u00f4ng?\n - [ ] C\u00f3 pending playlist n\u00e0o kh\u00f4ng?\n\n2. **ExoPlayer State:**\n - [ ] Player state c\u00f3 chuy\u1ec3n sang BUFFERING/READY kh\u00f4ng?\n - [ ] URL c\u00f3 accessible kh\u00f4ng?\n - [ ] Network permission c\u00f3 \u0111\u1ee7 kh\u00f4ng?\n\n3. **Audio Focus:**\n - [ ] App c\u00f3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c audio focus kh\u00f4ng?\n - [ ] Device c\u00f3 b\u1ecb mute kh\u00f4ng?\n - [ ] Volume c\u00f3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c set \u0111\u00fang kh\u00f4ng?\n\n## \ud83d\udcf1 Expected Logs:\n\n```\nD/PlayerPresenter: Initializing music service connection\nD/MusicServiceConnection: Connecting to MusicService...\nD/MusicService: MusicService onCreate\nD/MusicService: Initializing ExoPlayer\nD/MusicService: ExoPlayer initialized successfully\nD/PlayerPresenter: Initializing player with song: Sample Audio 1\nD/PlayerPresenter: Auto-playing song: Sample Audio 1\nD/PlayerPresenter: Attempting to play playlist after delay\nD/MusicServiceConnection: Playing playlist with 3 songs, starting at index 0\nD/MusicService: Creating MediaItem for song: Sample Audio 1 with URL: https://...\nD/MusicService: Player state changed to: BUFFERING\nD/MusicService: Player state changed to: READY\nD/MusicService: Player isPlaying changed to: true\n```\n\n## \ud83d\udea8 Common Issues:\n\n1. **Network Issues:** URLs kh\u00f4ng accessible\n2. **Timing Issues:** Service ch\u01b0a connect khi g\u1ecdi playPlaylist\n3. **Audio Focus:** App kh\u00f4ng c\u00f3 quy\u1ec1n ph\u00e1t audio\n4. **ExoPlayer Issues:** Codec kh\u00f4ng support ho\u1eb7c format kh\u00f4ng \u0111\u00fang\n\n## \ud83d\udd27 Next Steps:\n\nN\u1ebfu v\u1eabn kh\u00f4ng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng, c\u1ea7n:\n1. Ki\u1ec3m tra logs chi ti\u1ebft\n2. Test v\u1edbi local audio files\n3. Th\u00eam error handling t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n\n4. Ki\u1ec3m tra audio permissions"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Tuyt vi! Build thnh cng. By gi hy to mt test script kim tra xem c vn g khc khng.  1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.content.ComponentName
 4	import android.content.Context
 5	import android.content.Intent
 6	import android.os.Handler
 7	import android.os.Looper
 8	import android.util.Log
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 10	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 11	import androidx.media3.session.MediaController
 12	import androidx.media3.session.SessionToken
 13	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 14	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 15	
 16	/**
 17	 * Service connection class to manage communication between UI and MusicService
 18	 * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods
 19	 */
 20	class MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {
 21	
 22	 private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null
 23	 private var mediaController: MediaController? = null
 24	 private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null
 25	 private var isConnected = false
 26	 private var pendingPlaylist: Pair<List<Song>, Int>? = null
 27	 private var progressUpdateHandler: Handler? = null
 28	 private var progressUpdateRunnable: Runnable? = null
 29	
 30	 companion object {
 31	 private const val TAG = "MusicServiceConnection"
 32	 private const val PROGRESS_UPDATE_INTERVAL = 1000L // 1 second
 33	 }
 34	 
 35	 interface PlaybackStateListener {
 36	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 37	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 38	 fun onCurrentSongChanged(song: Song?)
 39	 fun onPlaybackError(error: String)
 40	 fun onConnectionError(error: String)
 41	 }
 42	 
 43	 fun setPlaybackStateListener(listener: PlaybackStateListener) {
 44	 this.playbackStateListener = listener
 45	 }
 46	 
 47	 fun connect() {
 48	 Log.d(TAG, "Connecting to MusicService...")
 49	
 50	 // Start the service first to ensure it's running
 51	 val serviceIntent = Intent(context, MusicService::class.java)
 52	 try {
 53	 context.startService(serviceIntent)
 54	 Log.d(TAG, "Service started successfully")
 55	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 56	 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to start service", e)
 57	 playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError("Failed to start music service")
 58	 return
 59	 }
 60	
 61	 val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))
 62	 mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()
 63	
 64	 mediaControllerFuture?.addListener({
 65	 try {
 66	 mediaController = mediaControllerFuture?.get()
 67	 if (mediaController != null) {
 68	 onMediaControllerConnected()
 69	 } else {
 70	 Log.e(TAG, "MediaController is null after connection")
 71	 playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError("Failed to connect to music service")
 72	 }
 73	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 74	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting MediaController", e)
 75	 playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError("Connection error: ${e.message}")
 76	 }
 77	 }, context.mainExecutor)
 78	 }
 79	 
 80	 private fun onMediaControllerConnected() {
 81	 Log.d(TAG, "MediaController connected successfully")
 82	 isConnected = true
 83	 
 84	 mediaController?.addListener(object : Player.Listener {
 85	 override fun onIsPlayingChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 86	 Log.d(TAG, "Playback state changed: isPlaying = $isPlaying")
 87	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying)
 88	 
 89	 if (isPlaying) {
 90	 startProgressUpdates()
 91	 } else {
 92	 stopProgressUpdates()
 93	 }
 94	 }
 95	 
 96	 override fun onMediaItemTransition(mediaItem: MediaItem?, reason: Int) {
 97	 Log.d(TAG, "Media item changed: ${mediaItem?.mediaMetadata?.title}")
 98	 mediaItem?.let { item ->
 99	 // Convert MediaItem back to Song
 100	 val song = Song(
 101	 id = item.mediaId,
 102	 title = item.mediaMetadata.title?.toString() ?: "Unknown",
 103	 artist = item.mediaMetadata.artist?.toString() ?: "Unknown",
 104	 album = item.mediaMetadata.albumTitle?.toString() ?: "Unknown",
 105	 duration = mediaController?.duration ?: 0,
 106	 artworkUrl = item.mediaMetadata.artworkUri?.toString() ?: "",
 107	 streamUrl = item.localConfiguration?.uri?.toString() ?: ""
 108	 )
 109	 playbackStateListener?.onCurrentSongChanged(song)
 110	 }
 111	 }
 112	 
 113	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(playbackState: Int) {
 114	 Log.d(TAG, "Player state changed: $playbackState")
 115	 when (playbackState) {
 116	 Player.STATE_BUFFERING -> {
 117	 Log.d(TAG, "Player is buffering")
 118	 }
 119	 Player.STATE_READY -> {
 120	 Log.d(TAG, "Player is ready")
 121	 }
 122	 Player.STATE_ENDED -> {
 123	 Log.d(TAG, "Playback ended")
 124	 stopProgressUpdates()
 125	 }
 126	 Player.STATE_IDLE -> {
 127	 Log.d(TAG, "Player is idle")
 128	 }
 129	 }
 130	 }
 131	 })
 132	 
 133	 // Handle pending playlist if any
 134	 pendingPlaylist?.let { (songs, index) ->
 135	 Log.d(TAG, "Playing pending playlist")
 136	 playPlaylist(songs, index)
 137	 pendingPlaylist = null
 138	 }
 139	 }
 140	 
 141	 private fun startProgressUpdates() {
 142	 if (progressUpdateHandler == null) {
 143	 progressUpdateHandler = Handler(Looper.getMainLooper())
 144	 }
 145	 
 146	 progressUpdateRunnable = object : Runnable {
 147	 override fun run() {
 148	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 149	 val position = controller.currentPosition
 150	 val duration = controller.duration
 151	 if (duration > 0) {
 152	 playbackStateListener?.onProgressUpdate(position, duration)
 153	 }
 154	 }
 155	 progressUpdateHandler?.postDelayed(this, PROGRESS_UPDATE_INTERVAL)
 156	 }
 157	 }
 158	 
 159	 progressUpdateRunnable?.let { runnable ->
 160	 progressUpdateHandler?.post(runnable)
 161	 }
 162	 }
 163	 
 164	 private fun stopProgressUpdates() {
 165	 progressUpdateRunnable?.let { runnable ->
 166	 progressUpdateHandler?.removeCallbacks(runnable)
 167	 }
 168	 }
 169	 
 170	 fun disconnect() {
 171	 Log.d(TAG, "Disconnecting from MusicService")
 172	 isConnected = false
 173	 pendingPlaylist = null
 174	
 175	 stopProgressUpdates()
 176	 progressUpdateHandler = null
 177	 progressUpdateRunnable = null
 178	
 179	 mediaController?.release()
 180	 mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)
 181	 mediaController = null
 182	 mediaControllerFuture = null
 183	 }
 184	 
 185	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 186	 if (!isConnected || mediaController == null) {
 187	 Log.d(TAG, "Not connected, storing playlist for later")
 188	 pendingPlaylist = Pair(songs, startIndex)
 189	 return
 190	 }
 191	
 192	 Log.d(TAG, "Playing playlist with ${songs.size} songs, starting at index $startIndex")
 193	
 194	 try {
 195	 val mediaItems = songs.map { song -> MusicService.createMediaItem(song) }
 196	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 197	 mediaController?.prepare()
 198	 mediaController?.play()
 199	 Log.d(TAG, "Playlist started successfully")
 200	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 201	 Log.e(TAG, "Error playing playlist", e)
 202	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackError("Failed to play playlist: ${e.message}")
 203	 }
 204	 }
 205	 
 206	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 207	 playPlaylist(listOf(song), 0)
 208	 }
 209	 
 210	 fun playPause() {
 211	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 212	 if (controller.isPlaying) {
 213	 controller.pause()
 214	 } else {
 215	 controller.play()
 216	 }
 217	 }
 218	 }
 219	 
 220	 fun skipToNext() {
 221	 mediaController?.seekToNext()
 222	 }
 223	 
 224	 fun skipToPrevious() {
 225	 mediaController?.seekToPrevious()
 226	 }
 227	 
 228	 fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 229	 mediaController?.seekTo(position)
 230	 }
 231	 
 232	 fun isPlaying(): Boolean {
 233	 return mediaController?.isPlaying ?: false
 234	 }
 235	 
 236	 fun getCurrentPosition(): Long {
 237	 return mediaController?.currentPosition ?: 0
 238	 }
 239	 
 240	 fun getDuration(): Long {
 241	 return mediaController?.duration ?: 0
 242	 }
 243	}

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.app.PendingIntent
 4	import android.content.Intent
 5	import android.os.Bundle
 6	import androidx.media3.common.AudioAttributes
 7	import androidx.media3.common.C
 8	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaMetadata
 10	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 11	import androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer
 12	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSession
 13	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSessionService
 14	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.Futures
 15	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 16	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 17	import com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.MainActivity
 18	
 19	/**
 20	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 21	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 22	 */
 23	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 24	 
 25	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 26	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 27	 
 28	 override fun onCreate() {
 29	 super.onCreate()
 30	 initializePlayer()
 31	 initializeMediaSession()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 35	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 36	 .setAudioAttributes(
 37	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 38	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 39	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 40	 .build(),
 41	 true
 42	 )
 43	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 44	 .build()
 45	 }
 46	 
 47	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 48	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 49	 this,
 50	 0,
 51	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 52	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 53	 )
 54	 
 55	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 56	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 57	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 58	 .build()
 59	 }
 60	 
 61	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 62	 return mediaSession
 63	 }
 64	 
 65	 override fun onDestroy() {
 66	 mediaSession?.run {
 67	 player.release()
 68	 release()
 69	 mediaSession = null
 70	 }
 71	 super.onDestroy()
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 /**
 75	 * Custom MediaSession callback to handle media commands
 76	 */
 77	 private inner class MediaSessionCallback : MediaSession.Callback {
 78	
 79	 override fun onAddMediaItems(
 80	 mediaSession: MediaSession,
 81	 controller: MediaSession.ControllerInfo,
 82	 mediaItems: MutableList<MediaItem>
 83	 ): ListenableFuture<MutableList<MediaItem>> {
 84	 val updatedMediaItems = mediaItems.map { mediaItem ->
 85	 mediaItem.buildUpon()
 86	 .setUri(mediaItem.requestMetadata.mediaUri)
 87	 .build()
 88	 }.toMutableList()
 89	 return Futures.immediateFuture(updatedMediaItems)
 90	 }
 91	 }
 92	 
 93	 companion object {
 94	 /**
 95	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 96	 */
 97	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 98	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 99	 .setTitle(song.title)
 100	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 101	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 102	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 103	 .build()
 104	 
 105	 return MediaItem.Builder()
 106	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 107	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 108	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 109	 .build()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 /**
 113	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 114	 */
 115	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 116	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 117	 }
 118	 }
 119	}

 34	 override fun loadSongs() {
 35	 view?.showLoading()
 36	 
 37	 presenterScope.launch {
 38	 try {
 39	 val result = repository.getAllSongs()
 40	 
 41	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 42	 view?.hideLoading()
 43	 
 44	 result.fold(
 45	 onSuccess = { songs ->
 46	 currentSongs = songs
 47	 if (songs.isEmpty()) {
 48	 view?.showEmptyState()
 49	 } else {
 50	 view?.showSongs(songs)
 51	 }
 52	 },
 53	 onFailure = { exception ->
 54	 view?.showError(exception.message ?: "Failed to load songs")
 55	 }
 56	 )
 57	 }
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 60	 view?.hideLoading()
 61	 view?.showError(e.message ?: "An unexpected error occurred")
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 }
 65	 }

 17	/**
 18	 * RecyclerView adapter for displaying songs in a list
 19	 * Uses ListAdapter with DiffUtil for efficient updates
 20	 */
 21	class SongAdapter(
 22	 private val onSongClick: (Song, List<Song>) -> Unit,
 23	 private val onMoreOptionsClick: (Song) -> Unit = {}
 24	) : ListAdapter<Song, SongAdapter.SongViewHolder>(SongDiffCallback()) {
 25	
 26	 private var currentPlayingSong: Song? = null
 27	
 28	 override fun onCreateViewHolder(parent: ViewGroup, viewType: Int): SongViewHolder {
 29	 val view = LayoutInflater.from(parent.context)
 30	 .inflate(R.layout.item_song, parent, false)

 71	 fun bind(song: Song, isCurrentlyPlaying: Boolean) {

 73	 artistAlbum.text = song.getArtistAlbumText()
 74	 songDuration.text = song.getFormattedDuration()

 84	 .transform(RoundedCorners(16))
 85	 .into(albumArtwork)

 88	 itemView.setOnClickListener {
 89	 onSongClick(song, currentList)
 90	 }

 93	 onMoreOptionsClick(song)
 94	 }
 95	 }

Path: MUSIC_PLAYBACK_GUIDE.md
...
 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work
 44	
 45	## How to Test
 46	
 47	### 1. **Build and Install**
 48	```bash
 49	./gradlew assembleDebug
 50	# Install APK on device/emulator
 51	```

 184	 
 185	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 186	 if (!isConnected || mediaController == null) {
 187	 Log.d(TAG, "Not connected, storing playlist for later")
 188	 pendingPlaylist = Pair(songs, startIndex)
 189	 return
 190	 }
 191	
 192	 Log.d(TAG, "Playing playlist with ${songs.size} songs, starting at index $startIndex")
 193	
 194	 try {
 195	 val mediaItems = songs.map { song -> MusicService.createMediaItem(song) }
 196	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 197	 mediaController?.prepare()
 198	 mediaController?.play()
 199	 Log.d(TAG, "Playlist started successfully")
 200	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 201	 Log.e(TAG, "Error playing playlist", e)
 202	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackError("Failed to play playlist: ${e.message}")
 203	 }
 204	 }
 205	 
 206	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 207	 playPlaylist(listOf(song), 0)
 208	 }

 106	 private fun setupSeekBar() {
 107	 seekBar.setOnSeekBarChangeListener(object : SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener {
 108	 override fun onProgressChanged(seekBar: SeekBar?, progress: Int, fromUser: Boolean) {
 109	 if (fromUser) {
 110	 // Calculate position based on progress and duration
 111	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with actual player
 112	 }
 113	 }
 114	 
 115	 override fun onStartTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {}
 116	 
 117	 override fun onStopTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {
 118	 seekBar?.let { bar ->
 119	 // Seek to the selected position
 120	 val progress = bar.progress
 121	 val duration = bar.max
 122	 if (duration > 0) {
 123	 val position = (progress.toFloat() / 100f * duration).toLong()
 124	 presenter.seekTo(position)
 125	 }
 126	 }
 127	 }
 128	 })
 129

 131	 playPauseButton.setOnClickListener {
 132	 presenter.playPause()
 133	 }
 134

 137	 }
 138	 
 139	 nextButton.setOnClickListener {

 141	 }

 145	 }
 146

 149	 }

 167	 .placeholder(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)

 169	 .transform(RoundedCorners(32))
 170	 .into(albumArtwork)

 173	 override fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 174	 val iconRes = if (isPlaying) R.drawable.ic_pause else R.drawable.ic_play_arrow
 175	 playPauseButton.setImageResource(iconRes)
 176	 }
 177	
 178	 override fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long) {
 179	 val minutes = (currentPosition / 1000) / 60
 180	 val seconds = (currentPosition / 1000) % 60
 181	 currentTime.text = String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes, seconds)
 182	 }
 183	
 184	 override fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int) {
 185	 seekBar.max = max
 186	 seekBar.progress = position
 187	 }
 188	
 189	 override fun showLoading() {
 190	 progressBar.visibility = View.VISIBLE
 191	 }
 192	
 193	 override fun hideLoading() {
 194	 progressBar.visibility = View.GONE
 195	 }

 198	 Toast.makeText(this, message, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show()
 199	 }

 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.PlayerContract
 4	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 5	
 6	/**
 7	 * Presenter for the Player screen
 8	 * Handles business logic for music playback and communication between View and Service
 9	 */
 10	class PlayerPresenter : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 11	 
 12	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 13	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 14	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 15	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 16	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 17	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 18	 
 19	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 20	 this.view = view
 21	 }
 22	 
 23	 override fun detachView() {
 24	 this.view = null
 25	 }
 26	 
 27	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 28	 this.currentSong = song
 29	 this.playlist = playlist
 30	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 31	 
 32	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 33	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 34	 updateNavigationButtons()
 35	 }
 36	 
 37	 override fun playPause() {
 38	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with MusicService
 39	 // For now, just toggle the UI state
 40	 val isCurrentlyPlaying = true // This should come from actual player state
 41	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isCurrentlyPlaying)
 42	 }
 43	 
 44	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 45	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with MusicService
 46	 // For now, just update the UI
 47	 currentSong?.let { song ->
 48	 view?.updateProgress(position, song.duration)
 49	 }
 50	 }
...
 124	 
 125	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song) {
 126	 currentSong = song
 127	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 128	 }
 129	 
 130	 override fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {
 131	 this.playlist = songs
 132	 this.currentIndex = currentIndex
 133	 view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)
 134	 updateNavigationButtons()
 135	 }
 136	 
 137	 private fun updateNavigationButtons() {
 138	 val canGoPrevious = when {
 139	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 140	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 141	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 142	 }
 143	 
 144	 val canGoNext = when {
 145	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 146	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 147	 else -> currentIndex < playlist.size - 1
 148	 }
 149	 
 150	 view?.enablePreviousButton(canGoPrevious)
 151	 view?.enableNextButton(canGoNext)
 152	 }
 153	}

 18	
 19	/**
 20	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 21	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 22	 */
 23	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 24	 
 25	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 26	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 27	 
 28	 override fun onCreate() {
 29	 super.onCreate()
 30	 initializePlayer()
 31	 initializeMediaSession()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 35	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 36	 .setAudioAttributes(
 37	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 38	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 39	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 40	 .build(),
 41	 true
 42	 )
 43	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 44	 .build()
 45	 }
 46	 
 47	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 48	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 49	 this,
 50	 0,
 51	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 52	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 53	 )
 54	 
 55	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 56	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 57	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 58	 .build()
 59	 }
 60	 
 61	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 62	 return mediaSession
 63	 }
 64	 
 65	 override fun onDestroy() {
 66	 mediaSession?.run {
 67	 player.release()
 68	 release()
 69	 mediaSession = null
 70	 }
 71	 super.onDestroy()
 72	 }

 93	 companion object {
 94	 /**
 95	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 96	 */
 97	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 98	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 99	 .setTitle(song.title)
 100	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 101	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 102	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 103	 .build()
 104	 
 105	 return MediaItem.Builder()
 106	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 107	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 108	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 109	 .build()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 /**
 113	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 114	 */
 115	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 116	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 117	 }
 118	 }
 119	}

 10	class PlayerPresenter : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 11	 
 12	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 13	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 14	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 15	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 16	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 17	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 18	 
 19	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 20	 this.view = view
 21	 }
 22	 
 23	 override fun detachView() {

 27	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 28	 this.currentSong = song
 29	 this.playlist = playlist
 30	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 31	 
 32	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 33	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 34	 updateNavigationButtons()
 35	 }
 36	 
 37	 override fun playPause() {
 38	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with MusicService
 39	 // For now, just toggle the UI state
 40	 val isCurrentlyPlaying = true // This should come from actual player state
 41	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isCurrentlyPlaying)
 42	 }

 44	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 45	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with MusicService
 46	 // For now, just update the UI
 47	 currentSong?.let { song ->
 48	 view?.updateProgress(position, song.duration)
 49	 }
 50	 }
 51	 
 52	 override fun skipToNext() {
 53	 if (playlist.isEmpty()) return
 54	 
 55	 currentIndex = when {
 56	 isShuffled -> (0 until playlist.size).random()
 57	 currentIndex < playlist.size - 1 -> currentIndex + 1
 58	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> 0
 59	 else -> currentIndex // Stay at current if no repeat
 60	 }
 61	 
 62	 if (currentIndex < playlist.size) {
 63	 currentSong = playlist[currentIndex]
 64	 currentSong?.let { song ->
 65	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 66	 onSongChanged(song)
 67	 }
 68	 }
 69	 
 70	 updateNavigationButtons()
 71	 }
 72	 
 73	 override fun skipToPrevious() {
 74	 if (playlist.isEmpty()) return
 75	 
 76	 currentIndex = when {
 77	 isShuffled -> (0 until playlist.size).random()
 78	 currentIndex > 0 -> currentIndex - 1
 79	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size - 1
 80	 else -> currentIndex // Stay at current if no repeat
 81	 }
 82	 
 83	 if (currentIndex >= 0 && currentIndex < playlist.size) {
 84	 currentSong = playlist[currentIndex]
 85	 currentSong?.let { song ->
 86	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 87	 onSongChanged(song)
 88	 }
 89	 }
 90	 
 91	 updateNavigationButtons()
 92	 }
 93	 
 94	 override fun toggleShuffle() {
 95	 isShuffled = !isShuffled
 96	 view?.showShuffleState(isShuffled)
 97	 updateNavigationButtons()
 98	 }
 99	 
 100	 override fun toggleRepeat() {
 101	 repeatMode = when (repeatMode) {
 102	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL
 103	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE
 104	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 105	 else -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 106	 }
 107	 view?.showRepeatState(repeatMode)
 108	 updateNavigationButtons()
 109	 }
 110	 
 111	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 112	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 113	 
 114	 // Update seek bar
 115	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 116	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 117	 } else 0
 118	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 119	 }
 120	 
 121	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 122	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 123	 }
 124	 
 125	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song) {
 126	 currentSong = song
 127	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 128	 }
 129	 
 130	 override fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {
 131	 this.playlist = songs
 132	 this.currentIndex = currentIndex
 133	 view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)
 134	 updateNavigationButtons()
 135	 }
 136	 
 137	 private fun updateNavigationButtons() {
 138	 val canGoPrevious = when {
 139	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 140	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 141	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 142	 }
 143	 
 144	 val canGoNext = when {
 145	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 146	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 147	 else -> currentIndex < playlist.size - 1
 148	 }
 149	 
 150	 view?.enablePreviousButton(canGoPrevious)
 151	 view?.enableNextButton(canGoNext)
 152	 }
 153	}

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.contract
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 4	
 5	/**
 6	 * Contract interface for Player screen MVP pattern
 7	 * Defines the communication between View, Presenter, and Model for music playback
 8	 */
 9	interface PlayerContract {
 10	 
 11	 /**
 12	 * View interface - defines what the Player View can do
 13	 */
 14	 interface View {
 15	 fun showSongInfo(song: Song)
 16	 fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean)
 17	 fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long)
 18	 fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int)
 19	 fun showLoading()
 20	 fun hideLoading()
 21	 fun showError(message: String)
 22	 fun enablePreviousButton(enabled: Boolean)
 23	 fun enableNextButton(enabled: Boolean)
 24	 fun showShuffleState(isShuffled: Boolean)
 25	 fun showRepeatState(repeatMode: Int)
 26	 fun updatePlaylist(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int)
 27	 }
 28	 
 29	 /**
 30	 * Presenter interface - defines what the Player Presenter can do
 31	 */
 32	 interface Presenter {
 33	 fun attachView(view: View)
 34	 fun detachView()
 35	 fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>)
 36	 fun playPause()
 37	 fun seekTo(position: Long)
 38	 fun skipToNext()
 39	 fun skipToPrevious()
 40	 fun toggleShuffle()
 41	 fun toggleRepeat()
 42	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 43	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 44	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song)
 45	 fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int)
 46	 }
 47	 
 48	 /**
 49	 * Repeat modes for the player
 50	 */
 51	 object RepeatMode {
 52	 const val OFF = 0
 53	 const val ONE = 1
 54	 const val ALL = 2
 55	 }
 56	}

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.repository
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.api.MockMusicData
 4	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.api.MusicApiService
 5	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 6	import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
 7	import kotlinx.coroutines.delay
 8	import kotlinx.coroutines.withContext
 9	
 10	/**
 11	 * Repository class that handles data operations for music
 12	 * Implements the Repository pattern to abstract data sources
 13	 */
 14	class MusicRepository(
 15	 private val apiService: MusicApiService? = null
 16	) {
 17	 
 18	 /**
 19	 * Fetch all songs from the data source
 20	 * For demo purposes, returns mock data with simulated network delay
 21	 */
 22	 suspend fun getAllSongs(): Result<List<Song>> {
 23	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 24	 try {
 25	 // Simulate network delay
 26	 delay(1000)
 27	 
 28	 // For demo purposes, return mock data
 29	 // In a real app, this would call apiService.getAllSongs()
 30	 val songs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 31	 Result.success(songs)
 32	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 33	 Result.failure(e)
 34	 }
 35	 }
 36	 }
 37	 
 38	 /**
 39	 * Search songs by query
 40	 */
 41	 suspend fun searchSongs(query: String): Result<List<Song>> {
 42	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 43	 try {
 44	 delay(500) // Simulate network delay
 45	 
 46	 val allSongs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 47	 val filteredSongs = allSongs.filter { song ->
 48	 song.title.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||
 49	 song.artist.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||
 50	 song.album.contains(query, ignoreCase = true)
 51	 }
 52	 
 53	 Result.success(filteredSongs)
 54	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 55	 Result.failure(e)
 56	 }
 57	 }
 58	 }
 59	 
 60	 /**
 61	 * Get song by ID
 62	 */
 63	 suspend fun getSongById(id: String): Result<Song?> {
 64	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 65	 try {
 66	 delay(300) // Simulate network delay
 67	 
 68	 val song = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs().find { it.id == id }
 69	 Result.success(song)
 70	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 71	 Result.failure(e)
 72	 }
 73	 }
 74	 }
 75	 
 76	 /**
 77	 * Get songs by genre
 78	 */
 79	 suspend fun getSongsByGenre(genre: String): Result<List<Song>> {
 80	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 81	 try {
 82	 delay(500) // Simulate network delay
 83	 
 84	 val allSongs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 85	 val filteredSongs = allSongs.filter { song ->
 86	 song.genre?.equals(genre, ignoreCase = true) == true
 87	 }
 88	 
 89	 Result.success(filteredSongs)
 90	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 91	 Result.failure(e)
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	 }

Path: app/src/main/java/com/nauh/musicplayer/data/provider/LocalMusicProvider.kt
 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.provider
 2	
 3	import android.content.Context
 4	import android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever
 5	import android.net.Uri
 6	import android.util.Log
 7	import com.nauh.musicplayer.R
 8	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 9	import java.lang.reflect.Field
 10	
 11	/**
 12	 * Provider class for loading music files from the app's raw resources directory
 13	 * Scans res/raw folder and creates Song objects for local music files
 14	 */
 15	class LocalMusicProvider(private val context: Context) {
 16	 
 17	 companion object {
 18	 private const val TAG = "LocalMusicProvider"
 19	 private const val DEFAULT_ARTWORK_URL = "android.resource://com.nauh.musicplayer/drawable/placeholder_album_art"
 20	 }
 21	 
 22	 /**
 23	 * Scans the res/raw directory and returns a list of Song objects for all music files
 24	 */
 25	 fun getLocalSongs(): List<Song> {
 26	 Log.d(TAG, "Scanning local music files from res/raw")
 27	 val songs = mutableListOf<Song>()
 28	 
 29	 try {
 30	 // Get all raw resource IDs using reflection
 31	 val rawResourceIds = getRawResourceIds()
 32	 Log.d(TAG, "Found ${rawResourceIds.size} raw resources")
 33	 
 34	 rawResourceIds.forEach { (resourceName, resourceId) ->
 35	 if (isMusicFile(resourceName)) {
 36	 Log.d(TAG, "Processing music file: $resourceName")
 37	 val song = createSongFromRawResource(resourceName, resourceId)
 38	 if (song != null) {
 39	 songs.add(song)
 40	 Log.d(TAG, "Added song: ${song.title}")
 41	 }
 42	 }
 43	 }
 44	 
 45	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 46	 Log.e(TAG, "Error scanning local music files", e)
 47	 }
 48	 
 49	 Log.d(TAG, "Successfully loaded ${songs.size} local songs")
 50	 return songs
 51	 }
 52	 
 53	 /**
 54	 * Gets all raw resource IDs using reflection
 55	 */
 56	 private fun getRawResourceIds(): Map<String, Int> {
 57	 val resourceMap = mutableMapOf<String, Int>()
 58	 
 59	 try {
 60	 val rawClass = R.raw::class.java
 61	 val fields: Array<Field> = rawClass.declaredFields
 62	 
 63	 for (field in fields) {
 64	 try {
 65	 val resourceName = field.name
 66	 val resourceId = field.getInt(null)
 67	 resourceMap[resourceName] = resourceId
 68	 Log.d(TAG, "Found raw resource: $resourceName -> $resourceId")
 69	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 70	 Log.w(TAG, "Could not access field: ${field.name}", e)
 71	 }
 72	 }
 73	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 74	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting raw resource IDs", e)
 75	 }
 76	 
 77	 return resourceMap
 78	 }
 79	 
 80	 /**
 81	 * Checks if a resource name represents a music file based on common audio file extensions
 82	 */
 83	 private fun isMusicFile(resourceName: String): Boolean {
 84	 val audioExtensions = listOf("mp3", "wav", "m4a", "aac", "ogg", "flac")
 85	 return audioExtensions.any { ext ->
 86	 resourceName.lowercase().contains(ext) || resourceName.lowercase().endsWith("_$ext")
 87	 }
 88	 }
 89	 
 90	 /**
 91	 * Creates a Song object from a raw resource
 92	 */
 93	 private fun createSongFromRawResource(resourceName: String, resourceId: Int): Song? {
 94	 return try {
 95	 val uri = Uri.parse("android.resource://${context.packageName}/$resourceId")
 96	 Log.d(TAG, "Created URI for $resourceName: $uri")
 97	 
 98	 // Extract metadata using MediaMetadataRetriever
 99	 val metadata = extractMetadata(uri)
 100	 
 101	 // Generate song details
 102	 val title = metadata.title ?: formatResourceNameAsTitle(resourceName)
 103	 val artist = metadata.artist ?: "Local Artist"
 104	 val album = metadata.album ?: "Local Music"
 105	 val duration = metadata.duration ?: estimateDuration()
 106	 
 107	 Song(
 108	 id = "local_$resourceId",
 109	 title = title,
 110	 artist = artist,
 111	 album = album,
 112	 duration = duration,
 113	 artworkUrl = DEFAULT_ARTWORK_URL,
 114	 streamUrl = uri.toString(),
 115	 genre = "Local"
 116	 )
 117	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 118	 Log.e(TAG, "Error creating song from resource: $resourceName", e)
 119	 null
 120	 }
 121	 }
 122	 
 123	 /**
 124	 * Data class to hold extracted metadata
 125	 */
 126	 private data class AudioMetadata(
 127	 val title: String? = null,
 128	 val artist: String? = null,
 129	 val album: String? = null,
 130	 val duration: Long? = null
 131	 )

 104	
 105	### Prerequisites
 106	- Android Studio Arctic Fox or later
 107	- Android SDK API 24+ (Android 7.0)
 108	- Kotlin 1.8+
 109	
 110	### Installation
 111	1. Clone the repository
 112	2. Open in Android Studio
 113	3. Sync Gradle dependencies
 114	4. Run on device or emulator
 115	
 116	### Configuration
 117	The app currently uses mock data for demonstration. To integrate with a real API:
 118	
 119	1. Update `MusicApiService` with your API endpoints
 120	2. Modify `MusicRepository` to use actual network calls
 121	3. Replace mock data in `MockMusicData` with real data sources
 122	
 123	## Project Structure

 83	
 84	## Technical Details
 85	
 86	### Architecture:
 87	- **MVP Pattern**: Clean separation of concerns
 88	- **ExoPlayer**: Professional audio streaming
 89	- **MediaSession**: System integration for media controls
 90	- **Background Service**: Continues playback when app is minimized

 100	 override fun skipToPrevious() {
 101	 Log.d(TAG, "Skip to previous")
 102	 musicServiceConnection?.skipToPrevious()

 104	 
 105	 override fun toggleShuffle() {
 106	 isShuffled = !isShuffled
 107	 view?.showShuffleState(isShuffled)
 108	 updateNavigationButtons()
 109	 }
 110	 
 111	 override fun toggleRepeat() {
 112	 repeatMode = when (repeatMode) {
 113	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL
 114	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE
 115	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 116	 else -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 117	 }
 118	 view?.showRepeatState(repeatMode)
 119	 updateNavigationButtons()
 120	 }
 121	 
 122	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 123	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 124	 
 125	 // Update seek bar
 126	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 127	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 128	 } else 0
 129	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 130	 }
 131	 
 132	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 133	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 134	 }
 135	 
 136	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song) {
 137	 currentSong = song
 138	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 139	 }
 140	 
 141	 override fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {
 142	 this.playlist = songs
 143	 this.currentIndex = currentIndex
 144	 view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)
 145	 updateNavigationButtons()
 146	 }
 147	 
 148	 private fun updateNavigationButtons() {
 149	 val canGoPrevious = when {
 150	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 151	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 152	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 153	 }

 34	 override fun loadSongs() {
 35	 view?.showLoading()
 36	 
 37	 presenterScope.launch {
 38	 try {
 39	 val result = repository.getAllSongs()
 40	 
 41	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 42	 view?.hideLoading()
 43	 
 44	 result.fold(
 45	 onSuccess = { songs ->
 46	 currentSongs = songs
 47	 if (songs.isEmpty()) {
 48	 view?.showEmptyState()
 49	 } else {
 50	 view?.showSongs(songs)
 51	 }
 52	 },
 53	 onFailure = { exception ->
 54	 view?.showError(exception.message ?: "Failed to load songs")
 55	 }
 56	 )
 57	 }
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 60	 view?.hideLoading()
 61	 view?.showError(e.message ?: "An unexpected error occurred")

 63	 }

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.presenter
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.PlayerContract
 4	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 5	
 6	/**
 7	 * Presenter for the Player screen
 8	 * Handles business logic for music playback and communication between View and Service
 9	 */
 10	class PlayerPresenter : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 11	 
 12	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 13	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 14	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 15	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 16	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 17	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 18	 
 19	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 20	 this.view = view
 21	 }
 22	 
 23	 override fun detachView() {
 24	 this.view = null
 25	 }
 26	 
 27	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 28	 this.currentSong = song
 29	 this.playlist = playlist
 30	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 31	 
 32	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 33	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 34	 updateNavigationButtons()
 35	 }
 36	 
 37	 override fun playPause() {
 38	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with MusicService
 39	 // For now, just toggle the UI state
 40	 val isCurrentlyPlaying = true // This should come from actual player state
 41	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isCurrentlyPlaying)
 42	 }
 43	 
 44	 override fun seekTo(position: Long) {
 45	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with MusicService
 46	 // For now, just update the UI
 47	 currentSong?.let { song ->
 48	 view?.updateProgress(position, song.duration)
 49	 }
 50	 }
 51	 
 52	 override fun skipToNext() {
 53	 if (playlist.isEmpty()) return
 54	 
 55	 currentIndex = when {
 56	 isShuffled -> (0 until playlist.size).random()
 57	 currentIndex < playlist.size - 1 -> currentIndex + 1
 58	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> 0
 59	 else -> currentIndex // Stay at current if no repeat
 60	 }
 61	 
 62	 if (currentIndex < playlist.size) {
 63	 currentSong = playlist[currentIndex]
 64	 currentSong?.let { song ->
 65	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 66	 onSongChanged(song)
 67	 }
 68	 }
 69	 
 70	 updateNavigationButtons()
 71	 }
...
 99	 
 100	 override fun toggleRepeat() {
 101	 repeatMode = when (repeatMode) {
 102	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL
 103	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE
 104	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 105	 else -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 106	 }
 107	 view?.showRepeatState(repeatMode)
 108	 updateNavigationButtons()
 109	 }
 110	 
 111	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 112	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 113	 
 114	 // Update seek bar
 115	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 116	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 117	 } else 0
 118	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 119	 }
 120	 
 121	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 122	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 123	 }
 124	 
 125	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song) {
 126	 currentSong = song
 127	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 128	 }
 129	 
 130	 override fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {
 131	 this.playlist = songs
 132	 this.currentIndex = currentIndex
 133	 view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)
 134	 updateNavigationButtons()
 135	 }
 136	 
 137	 private fun updateNavigationButtons() {
 138	 val canGoPrevious = when {
 139	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 140	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 141	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 142	 }
 143	 
 144	 val canGoNext = when {
 145	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 146	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 147	 else -> currentIndex < playlist.size - 1
 148	 }
 149	 
 150	 view?.enablePreviousButton(canGoPrevious)
 151	 view?.enableNextButton(canGoNext)
 152	 }
 153	}

Path: MUSIC_PLAYBACK_GUIDE.md
...
 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work
 44	
 45	## How to Test
 46	
 47	### 1. **Build and Install**
 48	```bash
 49	./gradlew assembleDebug
 50	# Install APK on device/emulator
 51	```

 184	 
 185	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 186	 if (!isConnected || mediaController == null) {
 187	 Log.d(TAG, "Not connected, storing playlist for later")
 188	 pendingPlaylist = Pair(songs, startIndex)
 189	 return
 190	 }
 191	
 192	 Log.d(TAG, "Playing playlist with ${songs.size} songs, starting at index $startIndex")
 193	
 194	 try {
 195	 val mediaItems = songs.map { song -> MusicService.createMediaItem(song) }
 196	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 197	 mediaController?.prepare()
 198	 mediaController?.play()
 199	 Log.d(TAG, "Playlist started successfully")
 200	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 201	 Log.e(TAG, "Error playing playlist", e)
 202	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackError("Failed to play playlist: ${e.message}")
 203	 }
 204	 }
 205	 
 206	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 207	 playPlaylist(listOf(song), 0)
 208	 }
