 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.service
 2	
 3	import android.app.PendingIntent
 4	import android.content.Intent
 5	import android.os.Bundle
 6	import androidx.media3.common.AudioAttributes
 7	import androidx.media3.common.C
 8	import androidx.media3.common.MediaItem
 9	import androidx.media3.common.MediaMetadata
 10	import androidx.media3.common.Player
 11	import androidx.media3.exoplayer.ExoPlayer
 12	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSession
 13	import androidx.media3.session.MediaSessionService
 14	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.Futures
 15	import com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture
 16	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 17	import com.nauh.musicplayer.ui.MainActivity
 18	
 19	/**
 20	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 21	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 22	 */
 23	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 24	 
 25	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 26	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 27	 
 28	 override fun onCreate() {
 29	 super.onCreate()
 30	 initializePlayer()
 31	 initializeMediaSession()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 35	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 36	 .setAudioAttributes(
 37	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 38	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 39	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 40	 .build(),
 41	 true
 42	 )
 43	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 44	 .build()
 45	 }
 46	 
 47	 private fun initializeMediaSession() {
 48	 val sessionActivityPendingIntent = PendingIntent.getActivity(
 49	 this,
 50	 0,
 51	 Intent(this, MainActivity::class.java),
 52	 PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE
 53	 )
 54	 
 55	 mediaSession = MediaSession.Builder(this, player)
 56	 .setSessionActivity(sessionActivityPendingIntent)
 57	 .setCallback(MediaSessionCallback())
 58	 .build()
 59	 }
 60	 
 61	 override fun onGetSession(controllerInfo: MediaSession.ControllerInfo): MediaSession? {
 62	 return mediaSession
 63	 }
 64	 
 65	 override fun onDestroy() {
 66	 mediaSession?.run {
 67	 player.release()
 68	 release()
 69	 mediaSession = null
 70	 }
 71	 super.onDestroy()
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 /**
 75	 * Custom MediaSession callback to handle media commands
 76	 */
 77	 private inner class MediaSessionCallback : MediaSession.Callback {
 78	
 79	 override fun onAddMediaItems(
 80	 mediaSession: MediaSession,
 81	 controller: MediaSession.ControllerInfo,
 82	 mediaItems: MutableList<MediaItem>
 83	 ): ListenableFuture<MutableList<MediaItem>> {
 84	 val updatedMediaItems = mediaItems.map { mediaItem ->
 85	 mediaItem.buildUpon()
 86	 .setUri(mediaItem.requestMetadata.mediaUri)
 87	 .build()
 88	 }.toMutableList()
 89	 return Futures.immediateFuture(updatedMediaItems)
 90	 }
 91	 }
 92	 
 93	 companion object {
 94	 /**
 95	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 96	 */
 97	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 98	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 99	 .setTitle(song.title)
 100	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 101	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 102	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 103	 .build()
 104	 
 105	 return MediaItem.Builder()
 106	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 107	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 108	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 109	 .build()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 /**
 113	 * Create a list of MediaItems from a list of Songs
 114	 */
 115	 fun createMediaItems(songs: List<Song>): List<MediaItem> {
 116	 return songs.map { createMediaItem(it) }
 117	 }
 118	 }
 119	}

Path: MUSIC_PLAYBACK_GUIDE.md
 1	# Music Playback Implementation Guide
 2	
 3	## What Has Been Fixed
 4	
 5	### 1. **MusicService Integration**
 6	- MusicService properly registered in AndroidManifest.xml
 7	- All required audio permissions added
 8	- ExoPlayer integration for professional audio streaming
 9	
 10	### 2. **Service Connection**
 11	- Created MusicServiceConnection class
 12	- Handles MediaController setup and communication
 13	- Provides playback state callbacks
 14	
 15	### 3. **PlayerPresenter Updates**
 16	- Integrated with MusicServiceConnection
 17	- Actual playback methods implemented:
 18	 - `playPause()` - Play/pause functionality
 19	 - `seekTo()` - Seek to specific position
 20	 - `skipToNext()` - Skip to next track
 21	 - `skipToPrevious()` - Skip to previous track
 22	- Real-time progress updates
 23	- Playback state management
 24	
 25	### 4. **PlayerActivity Integration**
 26	- Context passed to PlayerPresenter
 27	- All UI callbacks implemented
 28	- Proper lifecycle management
 29	
 30	## How Music Playback Works Now
 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work
 44	
 45	## How to Test
 46	
 47	### 1. **Build and Install**
 48	```bash
 49	./gradlew assembleDebug
 50	# Install APK on device/emulator
 51	```
 52	
 53	### 2. **Test Basic Playback**
 54	1. Open the app
 55	2. You'll see a list of songs with circular album art
 56	3. **Tap any song** PlayerActivity opens
 57	4. **Tap play button** Music should start playing
 58	5. **Tap pause button** Music should pause
 59	
 60	### 3. **Test Controls**
 61	- **Seek Bar**: Drag to seek to different positions
 62	- **Next/Previous**: Skip between tracks
 63	- **Shuffle/Repeat**: Toggle playback modes
 64	
 65	### 4. **Test Background Playback**
 66	1. Start playing a song
 67	2. Press home button or switch apps
 68	3. Music should continue playing in background
 69	4. Check notification panel for media controls
 70	
 71	## Sample Songs Available
 72	
 73	The app includes 7 sample songs:
 74	1. **"12600 lettres (Dbat)"** - Franco & TP OK Jazz
 75	2. **"Again & Again"** - Usatof
 76	3. **"Ain't No Mountain High Enough"** - Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell
 77	4. **"All I Have to Do Is Dream"** - The Everly Brothers
 78	5. **"All Night"** - Siddy Ranks
 79	6. **"Escape (The Pia Colada Song)"** - Rupert Holmes
 80	7. **"September"** - Earth, Wind & Fire
 81	
 82	All songs use SoundHelix demo tracks for testing.
 83	
 84	## Technical Details
 85	
 86	### Architecture:
 87	- **MVP Pattern**: Clean separation of concerns
 88	- **ExoPlayer**: Professional audio streaming
 89	- **MediaSession**: System integration for media controls
 90	- **Background Service**: Continues playback when app is minimized
 91	
 92	### Key Components:
 93	- `MusicService`: Background audio service
 94	- `MusicServiceConnection`: Service binding and communication
 95	- `PlayerPresenter`: Business logic for playback
 96	- `PlayerActivity`: Full-screen player UI
 97	
 98	## Troubleshooting
 99	
 100	### If Music Doesn't Play:
 101	1. **Check Internet Connection**: Songs stream from online URLs
 102	2. **Check Audio Permissions**: Ensure app has audio permissions
 103	3. **Check Device Volume**: Make sure media volume is up
 104	4. **Check Logs**: Look for ExoPlayer errors in logcat
 105	
 106	### Common Issues:
 107	- **Network Error**: Check if URLs are accessible
 108	- **Permission Denied**: Ensure all audio permissions granted
 109	- **Service Not Starting**: Check AndroidManifest service registration
 110	
 111	## Next Steps

 20	/**
 21	 * Background music service using ExoPlayer and MediaSession
 22	 * Handles audio playback, notifications, and media controls
 23	 */
 24	class MusicService : MediaSessionService() {
 25	
 26	 private var mediaSession: MediaSession? = null
 27	 private lateinit var player: ExoPlayer
 28	
 29	 companion object {
 30	 private const val TAG = "MusicService"
 31	 }
 32	
 33	 override fun onCreate() {
 34	 super.onCreate()
 35	 Log.d(TAG, "MusicService onCreate")
 36	 initializePlayer()
 37	 initializeMediaSession()
 38	 }
 39	 
 40	 private fun initializePlayer() {
 41	 Log.d(TAG, "Initializing ExoPlayer")
 42	 player = ExoPlayer.Builder(this)
 43	 .setAudioAttributes(
 44	 AudioAttributes.Builder()
 45	 .setContentType(C.AUDIO_CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC)
 46	 .setUsage(C.USAGE_MEDIA)
 47	 .build(),
 48	 true
 49	 )
 50	 .setHandleAudioBecomingNoisy(true)
 51	 .build()

 9	/**
 10	 * Presenter for the Player screen
 11	 * Handles business logic for music playback and communication between View and Service
 12	 */
 13	class PlayerPresenter : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 14	
 15	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 16	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 17	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 18	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 19	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 20	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 21	 private var musicServiceConnection: MusicServiceConnection? = null
 22	
 23	 companion object {
 24	 private const val TAG = "PlayerPresenter"
 25	 }
 26	 
 27	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 28	 this.view = view
 29	 }
 30	
 31	 override fun detachView() {
 32	 musicServiceConnection?.disconnect()
 33	 musicServiceConnection = null
 34	 this.view = null
 35	 }
...
 61	
 62	 override fun onConnectionError(error: String) {
 63	 Log.e(TAG, "Connection error: $error")
 64	 view?.showError(error)
 65	 }
 66	 })
 67	 connect()
 68	 }
 69	 }
 70	 
 71	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 72	 Log.d(TAG, "Initializing player with song: ${song.title}")
 73	 this.currentSong = song
 74	 this.playlist = playlist
 75	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 76	
 77	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 78	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 79	 updateNavigationButtons()
 80	
 81	 // Start playing the song
 82	 musicServiceConnection?.playPlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 83	 }
 84	 
 85	 override fun playPause() {
 86	 Log.d(TAG, "Play/Pause button pressed")
 87	 musicServiceConnection?.playPause()
 88	 }
...
 110	 
 111	 override fun toggleRepeat() {
 112	 repeatMode = when (repeatMode) {
 113	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL
 114	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE
 115	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 116	 else -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 117	 }
 118	 view?.showRepeatState(repeatMode)
 119	 updateNavigationButtons()
 120	 }
 121	 
 122	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 123	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 124	 
 125	 // Update seek bar
 126	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 127	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 128	 } else 0
 129	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 130	 }
 131	 
 132	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 133	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 134	 }
 135	 
 136	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song) {
 137	 currentSong = song
 138	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 139	 }
 140	 
 141	 override fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {
 142	 this.playlist = songs
 143	 this.currentIndex = currentIndex
 144	 view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)
 145	 updateNavigationButtons()
 146	 }
 147	 
 148	 private fun updateNavigationButtons() {
 149	 val canGoPrevious = when {
 150	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 151	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 152	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 153	 }
 154	 
 155	 val canGoNext = when {
 156	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 157	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 158	 else -> currentIndex < playlist.size - 1
 159	 }
 160	 
 161	 view?.enablePreviousButton(canGoPrevious)
 162	 view?.enableNextButton(canGoNext)
 163	 }
 164	}

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.contract
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 4	
 5	/**
 6	 * Contract interface for Player screen MVP pattern
 7	 * Defines the communication between View, Presenter, and Model for music playback
 8	 */
 9	interface PlayerContract {
 10	 
 11	 /**
 12	 * View interface - defines what the Player View can do
 13	 */
 14	 interface View {
 15	 fun showSongInfo(song: Song)
 16	 fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean)
 17	 fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long)
 18	 fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int)
 19	 fun showLoading()
 20	 fun hideLoading()
 21	 fun showError(message: String)
 22	 fun enablePreviousButton(enabled: Boolean)
 23	 fun enableNextButton(enabled: Boolean)
 24	 fun showShuffleState(isShuffled: Boolean)
 25	 fun showRepeatState(repeatMode: Int)
 26	 fun updatePlaylist(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int)
 27	 }
 28	 
 29	 /**
 30	 * Presenter interface - defines what the Player Presenter can do
 31	 */
 32	 interface Presenter {
 33	 fun attachView(view: View)
 34	 fun detachView()
 35	 fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>)
 36	 fun playPause()
 37	 fun seekTo(position: Long)
 38	 fun skipToNext()
 39	 fun skipToPrevious()
 40	 fun toggleShuffle()
 41	 fun toggleRepeat()
 42	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 43	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 44	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song)
 45	 fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int)
 46	 }
 47	 
 48	 /**
 49	 * Repeat modes for the player
 50	 */
 51	 object RepeatMode {
 52	 const val OFF = 0
 53	 const val ONE = 1
 54	 const val ALL = 2
 55	 }
 56	}

 17	
 18	/**
 19	 * Service connection class to manage communication between UI and MusicService
 20	 * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods
 21	 */
 22	class MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {
 23	
 24	 private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null
 25	 private var mediaController: MediaController? = null
 26	 private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null
 27	 private var isConnected = false
 28	 private var pendingPlaylist: Pair<List<Song>, Int>? = null
 29	 private var progressUpdateHandler: Handler? = null
 30	 private var progressUpdateRunnable: Runnable? = null
 31	
 32	 companion object {
 33	 private const val TAG = "MusicServiceConnection"
 34	 private const val PROGRESS_UPDATE_INTERVAL = 1000L // 1 second
 35	 }
...
 48	 
 49	 @RequiresApi(Build.VERSION_CODES.P)
 50	 fun connect() {
 51	 Log.d(TAG, "Connecting to MusicService...")
 52	
 53	 // Start the service first to ensure it's running
 54	 val serviceIntent = Intent(context, MusicService::class.java)
 55	 try {
 56	 context.startService(serviceIntent)
 57	 Log.d(TAG, "Service started successfully")
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to start service", e)
 60	 playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError("Failed to start music service")
 61	 return
 62	 }
 63	
 64	 val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))
 65	 mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()
 66	
 67	 mediaControllerFuture?.addListener({
 68	 try {
 69	 mediaController = mediaControllerFuture?.get()
 70	 if (mediaController != null) {
 71	 onMediaControllerConnected()
 72	 } else {
 73	 Log.e(TAG, "MediaController is null after connection")
 74	 playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError("Failed to connect to music service")
 75	 }
 76	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 77	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting MediaController", e)
 78	 playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError("Connection error: ${e.message}")
 79	 }
 80	 }, context.mainExecutor)
 81	 }

 83	 private fun onMediaControllerConnected() {

 25	class PlayerActivity : AppCompatActivity(), PlayerContract.View {

 27	 companion object {
 28	 const val EXTRA_SONG = "extra_song"
 29	 const val EXTRA_PLAYLIST = "extra_playlist"
 30	 }
 31	
 32	 private lateinit var presenter: PlayerPresenter
 33	 
 34	 // UI Components

 39	 private lateinit var albumName: TextView

 42	 private lateinit var totalTime: TextView
 43	 private lateinit var playPauseButton: ImageButton

 50	 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 51	 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 52	 setContentView(R.layout.activity_player)
 53	 
 54	 initializeViews()
 55	 setupToolbar()
 56	 setupSeekBar()
 57	 initializePresenter()
 58	 
 59	 // Get song and playlist from intent
 60	 val song = if (android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.TIRAMISU) {
 61	 intent.getParcelableExtra(EXTRA_SONG, Song::class.java)
 62	 } else {
 63	 @Suppress("DEPRECATION")
 64	 intent.getParcelableExtra<Song>(EXTRA_SONG)
 65	 }
 66	
 67	 val playlist = if (android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.TIRAMISU) {
 68	 intent.getParcelableArrayListExtra(EXTRA_PLAYLIST, Song::class.java) ?: emptyList()
 69	 } else {
 70	 @Suppress("DEPRECATION")
 71	 intent.getParcelableArrayListExtra<Song>(EXTRA_PLAYLIST) ?: emptyList()
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 if (song != null) {
 75	 presenter.initializePlayer(song, playlist)
 76	 } else {
 77	 finish() // Close activity if no song provided
 78	 }
 79	 }

 86	 albumName = findViewById(R.id.playerAlbumName)
 87	 seekBar = findViewById(R.id.seekBar)
 88	 currentTime = findViewById(R.id.currentTime)
 89	 totalTime = findViewById(R.id.totalTime)
 90	 playPauseButton = findViewById(R.id.playPauseButton)
 91	 previousButton = findViewById(R.id.previousButton)
 92	 nextButton = findViewById(R.id.nextButton)
 93	 shuffleButton = findViewById(R.id.shuffleButton)
 94	 repeatButton = findViewById(R.id.repeatButton)
 95	 progressBar = findViewById(R.id.playerProgressBar)
 96	 }

 98	 private fun setupToolbar() {
 99	 setSupportActionBar(toolbar)
 100	 supportActionBar?.setDisplayHomeAsUpEnabled(true)
 101	 toolbar.setNavigationOnClickListener {
 102	 finish()
 103	 }
 104	 }
 105	
 106	 private fun setupSeekBar() {
 107	 seekBar.setOnSeekBarChangeListener(object : SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener {
 108	 override fun onProgressChanged(seekBar: SeekBar?, progress: Int, fromUser: Boolean) {
 109	 if (fromUser) {
 110	 // Calculate position based on progress and duration
 111	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with actual player
 112	 }
 113	 }
 114	 
 115	 override fun onStartTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {}
 116	 
 117	 override fun onStopTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {
 118	 seekBar?.let { bar ->
 119	 // Seek to the selected position
 120	 val progress = bar.progress
 121	 val duration = bar.max
 122	 if (duration > 0) {
 123	 val position = (progress.toFloat() / 100f * duration).toLong()
 124	 presenter.seekTo(position)
 125	 }
 126	 }
 127	 }
 128	 })
 129	 
 130	 // Setup control button listeners
 131	 playPauseButton.setOnClickListener {
 132	 presenter.playPause()
 133	 }
 134	 
 135	 previousButton.setOnClickListener {
 136	 presenter.skipToPrevious()
 137	 }
 138	 
 139	 nextButton.setOnClickListener {
 140	 presenter.skipToNext()
 141	 }
 142	 
 143	 shuffleButton.setOnClickListener {
 144	 presenter.toggleShuffle()
 145	 }
 146	 
 147	 repeatButton.setOnClickListener {
 148	 presenter.toggleRepeat()
 149	 }
 150	 }
 151	
 152	 private fun initializePresenter() {
 153	 presenter = PlayerPresenter()
 154	 presenter.attachView(this)
 155	 presenter.initializeMusicService(this)
 156	 }

 158	 // MVP View Interface Implementation
 159	 override fun showSongInfo(song: Song) {
 160	 songTitle.text = song.title
 161	 artistName.text = song.artist
 162	 albumName.text = song.album
 163	 totalTime.text = song.getFormattedDuration()
 164	 
 165	 // Load album artwork
 166	 Glide.with(this)
 167	 .load(song.artworkUrl)
 168	 .placeholder(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)
 169	 .error(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)
 170	 .transform(RoundedCorners(32))
 171	 .into(albumArtwork)
 172	 }
 173	
 174	 override fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 175	 val iconRes = if (isPlaying) R.drawable.ic_pause else R.drawable.ic_play_arrow
 176	 playPauseButton.setImageResource(iconRes)
 177	 }
 178	
 179	 override fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long) {
 180	 val minutes = (currentPosition / 1000) / 60
 181	 val seconds = (currentPosition / 1000) % 60
 182	 currentTime.text = String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes, seconds)
 183	 }
 184	
 185	 override fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int) {
 186	 seekBar.max = max
 187	 seekBar.progress = position
 188	 }
 189	
 190	 override fun showLoading() {
 191	 progressBar.visibility = View.VISIBLE
 192	 }
 193	
 194	 override fun hideLoading() {
 195	 progressBar.visibility = View.GONE
 196	 }
 197	
 198	 override fun showError(message: String) {
 199	 Toast.makeText(this, message, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show()
 200	 }
 201	
 202	 override fun enablePreviousButton(enabled: Boolean) {
 203	 previousButton.isEnabled = enabled
 204	 previousButton.alpha = if (enabled) 1.0f else 0.5f
 205	 }
 206	
 207	 override fun enableNextButton(enabled: Boolean) {
 208	 nextButton.isEnabled = enabled
 209	 nextButton.alpha = if (enabled) 1.0f else 0.5f
 210	 }
 211	
 212	 override fun showShuffleState(isShuffled: Boolean) {
 213	 val color = if (isShuffled) {
 214	 ContextCompat.getColor(this, R.color.primary)
 215	 } else {
 216	 ContextCompat.getColor(this, R.color.text_secondary)
 217	 }
 218	 shuffleButton.setColorFilter(color)
 219	 }
 220	
 221	 override fun showRepeatState(repeatMode: Int) {
 222	 val (iconRes, color) = when (repeatMode) {
 223	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF -> {
 224	 R.drawable.ic_repeat to ContextCompat.getColor(this, R.color.text_secondary)
 225	 }
 226	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> {
 227	 R.drawable.ic_repeat to ContextCompat.getColor(this, R.color.primary)
 228	 }
 229	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE -> {
 230	 R.drawable.ic_repeat to ContextCompat.getColor(this, R.color.primary)
 231	 }
 232	 else -> {
 233	 R.drawable.ic_repeat to ContextCompat.getColor(this, R.color.text_secondary)
 234	 }
 235	 }
 236	 
 237	 repeatButton.setImageResource(iconRes)
 238	 repeatButton.setColorFilter(color)
 239	 }
 240	
 241	 override fun updatePlaylist(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {
 242	 // Update playlist information if needed
 243	 // This could be used to show playlist info or update navigation buttons
 244	 }
 245	
 246	 override fun onDestroy() {
 247	 super.onDestroy()
 248	 presenter.detachView()
 249	 }
 250	}

 21	/**
 22	 * Main Activity implementing MVP pattern
 23	 * Displays the list of songs and handles user interactions
 24	 */
 25	class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity(), MainContract.View {
 26	
 27	 private lateinit var presenter: MainPresenter
 28	 private lateinit var songAdapter: SongAdapter
 29	
 30	 // UI Components
 31	 private lateinit var searchEditText: EditText
 32	 private lateinit var songsRecyclerView: RecyclerView
 33	 private lateinit var progressBar: ProgressBar
 34	 private lateinit var emptyStateLayout: LinearLayout
 35	 private lateinit var miniPlayer: View
 36	
 37	 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 38	 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 39	 setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)
 40	
 41	 initializeViews()
 42	 setupRecyclerView()
 43	 setupSearchView()
 44	 initializePresenter()
 45	
 46	 // Load songs when activity starts
 47	 presenter.loadSongs()
 48	 }
 49	
 50	 private fun initializeViews() {
 51	 // Setup toolbar
 52	 val toolbar = findViewById<androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar>(R.id.toolbar)
 53	 setSupportActionBar(toolbar)
 54	
 55	 searchEditText = findViewById(R.id.searchEditText)
 56	 songsRecyclerView = findViewById(R.id.songsRecyclerView)
 57	 progressBar = findViewById(R.id.progressBar)
 58	 emptyStateLayout = findViewById(R.id.emptyStateLayout)
 59	 miniPlayer = findViewById(R.id.miniPlayer)
 60	 }
 61	
 62	 private fun setupRecyclerView() {
 63	 songAdapter = SongAdapter(
 64	 onSongClick = { song, playlist ->
 65	 presenter.onSongClicked(song, playlist)
 66	 },
 67	 onMoreOptionsClick = { song ->
 68	 // Handle more options click (e.g., show popup menu)
 69	 showSongOptions(song)
 70	 }
 71	 )
 72	
 73	 songsRecyclerView.apply {
 74	 layoutManager = LinearLayoutManager(this@MainActivity)
 75	 adapter = songAdapter
 76	 }
 77	 }
 78	
 79	 private fun setupSearchView() {
 80	 searchEditText.addTextChangedListener(object : TextWatcher {
 81	 override fun beforeTextChanged(s: CharSequence?, start: Int, count: Int, after: Int) {}
 82	
 83	 override fun onTextChanged(s: CharSequence?, start: Int, before: Int, count: Int) {}
 84	
 85	 override fun afterTextChanged(s: Editable?) {
 86	 val query = s?.toString()?.trim() ?: ""
 87	 if (query.isEmpty()) {
 88	 presenter.clearSearch()
 89	 } else {
 90	 presenter.searchSongs(query)
 91	 }
 92	 }
 93	 })
 94	 }
 95	
 96	 private fun initializePresenter() {
 97	 presenter = MainPresenter()
 98	 presenter.attachView(this)
 99	 }

 102	 // For now, just show a toast
 103	 // In a real app, this would show a popup menu with options like "Add to playlist", "Share", etc.
 104	 Toast.makeText(this, "Options for ${song.title}", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
 105	 }
 106	
 107	 // MVP View Interface Implementation
 108	 override fun showLoading() {
 109	 progressBar.visibility = View.VISIBLE
 110	 songsRecyclerView.visibility = View.GONE
 111	 emptyStateLayout.visibility = View.GONE
 112	 }
 113	
 114	 override fun hideLoading() {
 115	 progressBar.visibility = View.GONE
 116	 }
 117	
 118	 override fun showSongs(songs: List<Song>) {
 119	 hideLoading()
 120	 songsRecyclerView.visibility = View.VISIBLE
 121	 emptyStateLayout.visibility = View.GONE
 122	 songAdapter.submitList(songs)
 123	 }
 124	
 125	 override fun showError(message: String) {
 126	 hideLoading()
 127	 Toast.makeText(this, message, Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show()
 128	 }
 129	
 130	 override fun showEmptyState() {
 131	 hideLoading()
 132	 songsRecyclerView.visibility = View.GONE
 133	 emptyStateLayout.visibility = View.VISIBLE
 134	 }
 135	
 136	 override fun navigateToPlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 137	 val intent = Intent(this, PlayerActivity::class.java).apply {
 138	 putExtra(PlayerActivity.EXTRA_SONG, song)
 139	 putParcelableArrayListExtra(PlayerActivity.EXTRA_PLAYLIST, ArrayList(playlist))
 140	 }
 141	 startActivity(intent)
 142	 }
 143	
 144	 override fun updateCurrentPlayingSong(song: Song?) {
 145	 songAdapter.updateCurrentPlayingSong(song)
 146	 // Show/hide mini player based on whether a song is playing
 147	 miniPlayer.visibility = if (song != null) View.VISIBLE else View.GONE
 148	 }
 149	
 150	 override fun showSearchResults(songs: List<Song>) {
 151	 showSongs(songs)
 152	 }
 153	
 154	 override fun clearSearchResults() {
 155	 // This will be handled by showing all songs again
 156	 }
 157	
 158	 override fun onDestroy() {
 159	 super.onDestroy()
 160	 presenter.detachView()
 161	 }
 162	}

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.api
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 4	import retrofit2.Response
 5	import retrofit2.http.GET
 6	import retrofit2.http.Path
 7	
 8	/**
 9	 * API interface for fetching music data from remote sources
 10	 */
 11	interface MusicApiService {
 12	 
 13	 /**
 14	 * Fetch all available songs
 15	 */
 16	 @GET("songs")
 17	 suspend fun getAllSongs(): Response<List<Song>>
 18	 
 19	 /**
 20	 * Fetch songs by genre
 21	 */
 22	 @GET("songs/genre/{genre}")
 23	 suspend fun getSongsByGenre(@Path("genre") genre: String): Response<List<Song>>
 24	 
 25	 /**
 26	 * Fetch song by ID
 27	 */
 28	 @GET("songs/{id}")
 29	 suspend fun getSongById(@Path("id") id: String): Response<Song>
 30	 
 31	 /**
 32	 * Search songs by query

 6	/**
 7	 * Data model representing a song with all necessary information for streaming
 8	 */
 9	@Parcelize
 10	data class Song(
 11	 val id: String,
 12	 val title: String,
 13	 val artist: String,
 14	 val album: String,
 15	 val duration: Long, // Duration in milliseconds
 16	 val artworkUrl: String,
 17	 val streamUrl: String,
 18	 val genre: String? = null,
 19	 val releaseYear: Int? = null,
 20	 val trackNumber: Int? = null
 21	) : Parcelable {
 22	 
 23	 /**
 24	 * Returns formatted duration string (mm:ss)
 25	 */
 26	 fun getFormattedDuration(): String {
 27	 val minutes = (duration / 1000) / 60
 28	 val seconds = (duration / 1000) % 60
 29	 return String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes, seconds)
 30	 }
 31	 
 32	 /**
 33	 * Returns display text for artist and album
 34	 */
 35	 fun getArtistAlbumText(): String {
 36	 return "$artist $album"
 37	 }
 38	}

 10	/**
 11	 * Repository class that handles data operations for music

 16	) {
 17	 
 18	 /**
 19	 * Fetch all songs from the data source
 20	 * For demo purposes, returns mock data with simulated network delay
 21	 */
 22	 suspend fun getAllSongs(): Result<List<Song>> {
 23	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 24	 try {
 25	 // Simulate network delay
 26	 delay(1000)
 27	 
 28	 // For demo purposes, return mock data
 29	 // In a real app, this would call apiService.getAllSongs()
 30	 val songs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 31	 Result.success(songs)
 32	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 33	 Result.failure(e)
 34	 }
 35	 }
 36	 }
 37	 
 38	 /**
 39	 * Search songs by query
 40	 */
 41	 suspend fun searchSongs(query: String): Result<List<Song>> {
 42	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 43	 try {
 44	 delay(500) // Simulate network delay
 45	 
 46	 val allSongs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 47	 val filteredSongs = allSongs.filter { song ->
 48	 song.title.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||
 49	 song.artist.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||
 50	 song.album.contains(query, ignoreCase = true)
 51	 }
 52	 
 53	 Result.success(filteredSongs)
 54	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 55	 Result.failure(e)
 56	 }
 57	 }
 58	 }
 59	 
 60	 /**
 61	 * Get song by ID
 62	 */

 64	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 65	 try {
 66	 delay(300) // Simulate network delay
 67	 
 68	 val song = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs().find { it.id == id }
 69	 Result.success(song)
 70	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 71	 Result.failure(e)
 72	 }
 73	 }
 74	 }
 75	 
 76	 /**
 77	 * Get songs by genre
 78	 */
 79	 suspend fun getSongsByGenre(genre: String): Result<List<Song>> {
 80	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 81	 try {
 82	 delay(500) // Simulate network delay
 83	 
 84	 val allSongs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 85	 val filteredSongs = allSongs.filter { song ->
 86	 song.genre?.equals(genre, ignoreCase = true) == true

 89	 Result.success(filteredSongs)
 90	 } catch (e: Exception) {

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.provider
 2	
 3	import android.content.Context
 4	import android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever
 5	import android.net.Uri
 6	import android.util.Log
 7	import com.nauh.musicplayer.R
 8	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 9	import java.lang.reflect.Field
 10	
 11	/**
 12	 * Provider class for loading music files from the app's raw resources directory
 13	 * Scans res/raw folder and creates Song objects for local music files
 14	 */
 15	class LocalMusicProvider(private val context: Context) {
 16	 
 17	 companion object {
 18	 private const val TAG = "LocalMusicProvider"
 19	 private const val DEFAULT_ARTWORK_URL = "android.resource://com.nauh.musicplayer/drawable/placeholder_album_art"
 20	 }
 21	 
 22	 /**
 23	 * Scans the res/raw directory and returns a list of Song objects for all music files
 24	 */
 25	 fun getLocalSongs(): List<Song> {
 26	 Log.d(TAG, "Scanning local music files from res/raw")
 27	 val songs = mutableListOf<Song>()
 28	 
 29	 try {
 30	 // Get all raw resource IDs using reflection
 31	 val rawResourceIds = getRawResourceIds()
 32	 Log.d(TAG, "Found ${rawResourceIds.size} raw resources")
 33	 
 34	 rawResourceIds.forEach { (resourceName, resourceId) ->
 35	 if (isMusicFile(resourceName)) {
 36	 Log.d(TAG, "Processing music file: $resourceName")
 37	 val song = createSongFromRawResource(resourceName, resourceId)
 38	 if (song != null) {
 39	 songs.add(song)
 40	 Log.d(TAG, "Added song: ${song.title}")
 41	 }
 42	 }
 43	 }
 44	 
 45	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 46	 Log.e(TAG, "Error scanning local music files", e)
 47	 }
 48	 
 49	 Log.d(TAG, "Successfully loaded ${songs.size} local songs")
 50	 return songs
 51	 }
 52	 
 53	 /**
 54	 * Gets all raw resource IDs using reflection
 55	 */
 56	 private fun getRawResourceIds(): Map<String, Int> {
 57	 val resourceMap = mutableMapOf<String, Int>()
 58	 
 59	 try {
 60	 val rawClass = R.raw::class.java
 61	 val fields: Array<Field> = rawClass.declaredFields
 62	 
 63	 for (field in fields) {
 64	 try {
 65	 val resourceName = field.name
 66	 val resourceId = field.getInt(null)
 67	 resourceMap[resourceName] = resourceId
 68	 Log.d(TAG, "Found raw resource: $resourceName -> $resourceId")
 69	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 70	 Log.w(TAG, "Could not access field: ${field.name}", e)
 71	 }
 72	 }
 73	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 74	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting raw resource IDs", e)
 75	 }
 76	 
 77	 return resourceMap
 78	 }

 118	 companion object {
 119	 private const val TAG = "MusicService"
 120	
 121	 /**
 122	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 123	 */
 124	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 125	 Log.d(TAG, "Creating MediaItem for song: ${song.title} with URL: ${song.streamUrl}")
 126	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 127	 .setTitle(song.title)
 128	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 129	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 130	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 131	 .build()
 132	
 133	 val mediaItem = MediaItem.Builder()
 134	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 135	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 136	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 137	 .build()
 138	
 139	 Log.d(TAG, "MediaItem created successfully for: ${song.title}")
 140	 return mediaItem
 141	 }

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.presenter
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.MainContract
 4	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 5	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.repository.MusicRepository
 6	import kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineScope
 7	import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
 8	import kotlinx.coroutines.Job
 9	import kotlinx.coroutines.launch
 10	import kotlinx.coroutines.withContext
 11	
 12	/**
 13	 * Presenter for the Main screen
 14	 * Handles business logic and communication between View and Model
 15	 */
 16	class MainPresenter(
 17	 private val repository: MusicRepository = MusicRepository.getInstance()
 18	) : MainContract.Presenter {
 19	 
 20	 private var view: MainContract.View? = null
 21	 private val presenterScope = CoroutineScope(Dispatchers.Main + Job())
 22	 private var currentSongs: List<Song> = emptyList()
 23	 private var searchJob: Job? = null
 24	 
 25	 override fun attachView(view: MainContract.View) {
 26	 this.view = view
 27	 }
 28	 
 29	 override fun detachView() {
 30	 this.view = null
 31	 searchJob?.cancel()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 override fun loadSongs() {
 35	 view?.showLoading()
 36	 
 37	 presenterScope.launch {
 38	 try {
 39	 val result = repository.getAllSongs()
 40	 
 41	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 42	 view?.hideLoading()
 43	 
 44	 result.fold(
 45	 onSuccess = { songs ->
 46	 currentSongs = songs
 47	 if (songs.isEmpty()) {
 48	 view?.showEmptyState()
 49	 } else {
 50	 view?.showSongs(songs)
 51	 }
 52	 },
 53	 onFailure = { exception ->
 54	 view?.showError(exception.message ?: "Failed to load songs")
 55	 }
 56	 )
 57	 }
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 60	 view?.hideLoading()
 61	 view?.showError(e.message ?: "An unexpected error occurred")
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 }
 65	 }
 66	 
 67	 override fun onSongClicked(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 68	 view?.navigateToPlayer(song, playlist)
 69	 }
 70	 
 71	 override fun searchSongs(query: String) {
 72	 if (query.isBlank()) {
 73	 clearSearch()
 74	 return
 75	 }
 76	 
 77	 // Cancel previous search
 78	 searchJob?.cancel()
 79	 
 80	 searchJob = presenterScope.launch {
 81	 try {
 82	 val result = repository.searchSongs(query)
 83	 
 84	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 85	 result.fold(
 86	 onSuccess = { songs ->
 87	 view?.showSearchResults(songs)
 88	 },
 89	 onFailure = { exception ->
 90	 view?.showError(exception.message ?: "Search failed")
 91	 }
 92	 )
 93	 }
 94	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 95	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 96	 view?.showError(e.message ?: "Search failed")
 97	 }
 98	 }
 99	 }
 100	 }
 101	 
 102	 override fun clearSearch() {
 103	 searchJob?.cancel()
 104	 view?.clearSearchResults()
 105	 view?.showSongs(currentSongs)
 106	 }
 107	 
 108	 override fun refreshSongs() {
 109	 loadSongs()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 override fun onCurrentSongChanged(song: Song?) {
 113	 view?.updateCurrentPlayingSong(song)
 114	 }
 115	}
 116

## **Phn Tch Vn **

Sau khi kim tra ton b codebase, ti pht hin mt s vn c th gy ra li khng pht c nhc:

### **Vn chnh:**

1. **Sample Data c t bi ht**: Ch c 3 bi ht trong MockMusicData
2. **URLs c th khng hot ng**: Mt s URL c th ht hn hoc khng accessible
3. **Thiu auto-play**: PlayerActivity khng t ng pht nhc khi m
4. **Thiu delay cho service connection**: Service cn thi gian kt ni

## **K Hoch Sa Li Chi Tit**

### **Bc 1: Cp nht Sample Data vi URLs ng tin cy hn**
- Thm nhiu bi ht hn vi URLs hot ng tt
- S dng cc ngun m thanh n nh

### **Bc 2: Ci thin PlayerPresenter**
- Thm auto-play khi khi to
- Thm delay m bo service connection
- Ci thin error handling

### **Bc 3: Ci thin MusicService**
- Thm logging chi tit debug
- Ci thin error handling cho network issues

### **Bc 4: Test v verify**
- Build v test trn device/emulator
- Kim tra logs debug

Bn c mun ti bt u thc hin cc sa li ny khng?

 74	 Log.d(TAG, "Initializing player with song: ${song.title}")
 75	 this.currentSong = song
 76	 this.playlist = playlist
 77	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 78	
 79	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 80	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 81	 updateNavigationButtons()
 82	
 83	 // Start playing the song automatically with a small delay to ensure connection
 84	 Log.d(TAG, "Auto-playing song: ${song.title}")
 85	 Handler(Looper.getMainLooper()).postDelayed({
 86	 Log.d(TAG, "Attempting to play playlist after delay")
 87	 musicServiceConnection?.playPlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 88	 }, 500) // 500ms delay
 89	 }
 90

 92	 Log.d(TAG, "Play/Pause button pressed")
 93	 musicServiceConnection?.playPause()
 94	 }

 173	 fun disconnect() {
 174	 Log.d(TAG, "Disconnecting from MusicService")
 175	 isConnected = false
 176	 pendingPlaylist = null
 177	
 178	 stopProgressUpdates()
 179	 progressUpdateHandler = null
 180	 progressUpdateRunnable = null
 181	
 182	 mediaController?.release()
 183	 mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)
 184	 mediaController = null
 185	 mediaControllerFuture = null
 186	 }
 187	 
 188	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 189	 if (!isConnected || mediaController == null) {
 190	 Log.d(TAG, "Not connected, storing playlist for later")
 191	 pendingPlaylist = Pair(songs, startIndex)
 192	 return
 193	 }
 194	
 195	 Log.d(TAG, "Playing playlist with ${songs.size} songs, starting at index $startIndex")
 196	
 197	 try {
 198	 val mediaItems = songs.map { song -> MusicService.createMediaItem(song) }
 199	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 200	 mediaController?.prepare()
 201	 mediaController?.play()
 202	 Log.d(TAG, "Playlist started successfully")
 203	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 204	 Log.e(TAG, "Error playing playlist", e)
 205	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackError("Failed to play playlist: ${e.message}")
 206	 }
 207	 }
 208	 
 209	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 210	 playPlaylist(listOf(song), 0)
 211	 }
 212	 
 213	 fun playPause() {
 214	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 215	 if (controller.isPlaying) {
 216	 controller.pause()
 217	 } else {
 218	 controller.play()
 219	 }
 220	 }

Franco & TP OK Jazz (World Music)\n2. **\"Again & Again\"** - Usatof (Electronic)\n3. **\"Ain't No Mountain High Enough\"** - Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell (Soul)\n4. **\"All I Have to Do Is Dream\"** - The Everly Brothers (Rock & Roll)\n5. **\"All Night\"** - Siddy Ranks (Reggae)\n6. **\"Escape (The Pi\u00f1a Colada Song)\"** - Rupert Holmes (Pop)\n7. **\"September\"** - Earth, Wind & Fire (Disco)\n\n## \ud83e\uddea C\u00e1ch Test\n\n### 1. **Build v\u00e0 Install APK**\n```bash\n./gradlew assembleDebug\n# APK s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ea1o t\u1ea1i: app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk\n```\n\n### 2. **Test Basic Playback**\n1. M\u1edf \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng\n2. B\u1ea1n s\u1ebd th\u1ea5y danh s\u00e1ch 7 b\u00e0i h\u00e1t\n3. **Tap v\u00e0o b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 b\u00e0i h\u00e1t n\u00e0o** \u2192 PlayerActivity s\u1ebd m\u1edf\n4. **Nh\u1ea1c s\u1ebd t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng ph\u00e1t** sau 500ms\n5. Test c\u00e1c controls: Play/Pause, Next/Previous\n\n### 3. **Ki\u1ec3m tra Logs \u0111\u1ec3 Debug**\n```bash\n# Xem t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 logs li\u00ean quan \u0111\u1ebfn music playback\nadb logcat | grep -E \"(PlayerPresenter|MusicServiceConnection|MusicService)\"\n\n# Ho\u1eb7c filter theo tag c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3\nadb logcat -s PlayerPresenter MusicServiceConnection MusicService\n\n# Xem logs c\u1ee7a ExoPlayer\nadb logcat | grep \"Player state changed\"\n```\n\n### 4. **Test Flow Chi Ti\u1ebft**\n1. **M\u1edf app** \u2192 Xem logs: \"Loading songs\"\n2. **Click b\u00e0i h\u00e1t** \u2192 Xem logs: \"Initializing player with song\"\n3. **Auto-play** \u2192 Xem logs: \"Auto-playing song\", \"Player state changed to: BUFFERING\", \"Player state changed to: READY\"\n4. **Test controls** \u2192 Xem logs cho m\u1ed7i action\n\n## \ud83d\udd0d Debug Checklist\n\n### **N\u1ebfu v\u1eabn kh\u00f4ng ph\u00e1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1ea1c:**\n\n1. **Ki\u1ec3m tra Internet Connection**\n - T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 b\u00e0i h\u00e1t \u0111\u1ec1u stream t\u1eeb URLs online\n - \u0110\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o device c\u00f3 k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i internet\n\n2. **Ki\u1ec3m tra Logs**\n ```bash\n # Xem c\u00f3 l\u1ed7i g\u00ec kh\u00f4ng\n adb logcat | grep -E \"(ERROR|WARN)\"\n \n # Xem player errors\n adb logcat | grep \"Player error\"\n ```\n\n3. **Ki\u1ec3m tra Audio Permissions**\n - App \u0111\u00e3 c\u00f3 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 permissions c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft trong AndroidManifest.xml\n - Ki\u1ec3m tra device settings n\u1ebfu c\u1ea7n\n\n4. **Ki\u1ec3m tra Volume**\n - \u0110\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o media volume kh\u00f4ng b\u1ecb t\u1eaft\n - Test v\u1edbi headphones n\u1ebfu c\u1ea7n\n\n## \ud83d\ude80 URLs \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng\n\nT\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 URLs \u0111\u1ec1u t\u1eeb c\u00e1c ngu\u1ed3n \u0111\u00e1ng tin c\u1eady:\n\n1. **Google Storage (CodeSkulptor)**: \n - `commondatastorage.googleapis.com/codeskulptor-demos/`\n - `commondatastorage.googleapis.com/codeskulptor-assets/`\n\n2. **Learning Container**: \n - `learningcontainer.com/wp-content/uploads/`\n\n3. **File Examples**: \n - `file-examples.com/storage/`\n\n## \ud83c\udfaf Expected Behavior\n\n### **Khi m\u1edf PlayerActivity:**\n1. Service connection \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp\n2. Song info hi\u1ec3n th\u1ecb (title, artist, album, artwork)\n3. Sau 500ms, nh\u1ea1c t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng ph\u00e1t\n4. Progress bar b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt\n5. Play button chuy\u1ec3n th\u00e0nh Pause button\n\n### **Khi nh\u1ea5n Play/Pause:**\n- Button state thay \u0111\u1ed5i ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c\n- Nh\u1ea1c play/pause theo button state\n\n### **Khi nh\u1ea5n Next/Previous:**\n- Chuy\u1ec3n sang b\u00e0i ti\u1ebfp theo/tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u00f3\n- Song info c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt\n- Nh\u1ea1c m\u1edbi b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u ph\u00e1t\n\n## \ud83d\udc1b Troubleshooting\n\n### **L\u1ed7i th\u01b0\u1eddng g\u1eb7p:**\n\n1. **\"Player error occurred\"** \u2192 Ki\u1ec3m tra internet connection\n2. **\"Not connected, storing playlist for later\"** \u2192 Service ch\u01b0a connect, \u0111\u1ee3i th\u00eam\n3. **\"Failed to play playlist\"** \u2192 URL c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 b\u1ecb l\u1ed7i, th\u1eed b\u00e0i kh\u00e1c\n\n### **Solutions:**\n\n1. **Restart app** n\u1ebfu service kh\u00f4ng connect\n2. **Check internet** n\u1ebfu buffering qu\u00e1 l\u00e2u\n3. **Try different songs** n\u1ebfu m\u1ed9t b\u00e0i c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 kh\u00f4ng ph\u00e1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c\n4. **Check logs** \u0111\u1ec3 xem l\u1ed7i c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3\n\n## \u2728 Improvements Made\n\n1. **Better URLs**: S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng URLs \u1ed5n \u0111\u1ecbnh h\u01a1n t\u1eeb Google Storage\n2. **More Songs**: 7 b\u00e0i thay v\u00ec 3 b\u00e0i \u0111\u1ec3 test \u0111a d\u1ea1ng h\u01a1n\n3. **Better Logging**: Chi ti\u1ebft h\u01a1n \u0111\u1ec3 debug d\u1ec5 d\u00e0ng\n4. **Error Handling**: X\u1eed l\u00fd l\u1ed7i t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n v\u1edbi logging\n5. **Auto-play**: T\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng ph\u00e1t nh\u1ea1c khi m\u1edf player\n\n---\n\n**\ud83c\udfb5 Enjoy your music! \ud83c\udfb5**"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Tuyt vi!  17	- Actual playback methods implemented:
 18	 - `playPause()` - Play/pause functionality
 19	 - `seekTo()` - Seek to specific position
 20	 - `skipToNext()` - Skip to next track
 21	 - `skipToPrevious()` - Skip to previous track
 22	- Real-time progress updates
 23	- Playback state management
 24	
 25	### 4. **PlayerActivity Integration**
 26	- Context passed to PlayerPresenter
 27	- All UI callbacks implemented
 28	- Proper lifecycle management
 29	
 30	## How Music Playback Works Now
 31	
 32	### When You Click a Song:
 33	1. **MainActivity** `onSongClicked()` **PlayerActivity**
 34	2. **PlayerActivity** `initializePlayer()` **PlayerPresenter**
 35	3. **PlayerPresenter** `playPlaylist()` **MusicServiceConnection**
 36	4. **MusicServiceConnection** **MusicService** **ExoPlayer**
 37	5. **ExoPlayer** starts streaming the song from URL
 38	
 39	### Real-time Updates:
 40	- Progress bar updates automatically
 41	- Play/pause button state changes
 42	- Song information displays
 43	- Navigation buttons work
 44	
 45	## How to Test
 46	
 47	### 1. **Build and Install**
 48	```bash
 49	./gradlew assembleDebug
 50	# Install APK on device/emulator
 51	```
 52	
 53	### 2. **Test Basic Playback**
 54	1. Open the app
 55	2. You'll see a list of songs with circular album art
 56	3. **Tap any song** PlayerActivity opens
 57	4. **Tap play button** Music should start playing
 58	5. **Tap pause button** Music should pause
 59	
 60	### 3. **Test Controls**
 61	- **Seek Bar**: Drag to seek to different positions
 62	- **Next/Previous**: Skip between tracks
 63	- **Shuffle/Repeat**: Toggle playback modes
 64	
 65	### 4. **Test Background Playback**
 66	1. Start playing a song
 67	2. Press home button or switch apps
 68	3. Music should continue playing in background
 69	4. Check notification panel for media controls
 70	
 71	## Sample Songs Available
 72	
 73	The app includes 7 sample songs:
 74	1. **"12600 lettres (Dbat)"** - Franco & TP OK Jazz
 75	2. **"Again & Again"** - Usatof
 76	3. **"Ain't No Mountain High Enough"** - Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell
 77	4. **"All I Have to Do Is Dream"** - The Everly Brothers
 78	5. **"All Night"** - Siddy Ranks
 79	6. **"Escape (The Pia Colada Song)"** - Rupert Holmes
 80	7. **"September"** - Earth, Wind & Fire
 81	
 82	All songs use SoundHelix demo tracks for testing.
 83	
 84	## Technical Details
 85	
 86	### Architecture:
 87	- **MVP Pattern**: Clean separation of concerns
 88	- **ExoPlayer**: Professional audio streaming
 89	- **MediaSession**: System integration for media controls
 90	- **Background Service**: Continues playback when app is minimized
 91	
 92	### Key Components:
 93	- `MusicService`: Background audio service
 94	- `MusicServiceConnection`: Service binding and communication
 95	- `PlayerPresenter`: Business logic for playback
 96	- `PlayerActivity`: Full-screen player UI
 97	
 98	## Troubleshooting
 99	
 100	### If Music Doesn't Play:
 101	1. **Check Internet Connection**: Songs stream from online URLs
 102	2. **Check Audio Permissions**: Ensure app has audio permissions
 103	3. **Check Device Volume**: Make sure media volume is up
 104	4. **Check Logs**: Look for ExoPlayer errors in logcat
 105	
 106	### Common Issues:
 107	- **Network Error**: Check if URLs are accessible
 108	- **Permission Denied**: Ensure all audio permissions granted
 109	- **Service Not Starting**: Check AndroidManifest service registration
 110

 10	 * Presenter for the Player screen

 12	 */
 13	class PlayerPresenter : PlayerContract.Presenter {
 14	
 15	 private var view: PlayerContract.View? = null
 16	 private var currentSong: Song? = null
 17	 private var playlist: List<Song> = emptyList()
 18	 private var currentIndex: Int = 0
 19	 private var isShuffled: Boolean = false
 20	 private var repeatMode: Int = PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 21	 private var musicServiceConnection: MusicServiceConnection? = null
 22	
 23	 companion object {
 24	 private const val TAG = "PlayerPresenter"
 25	 }
 26	 
 27	 override fun attachView(view: PlayerContract.View) {
 28	 this.view = view
 29	 }
 30	
 31	 override fun detachView() {
 32	 musicServiceConnection?.disconnect()
 33	 musicServiceConnection = null

 66	 })

 71	 override fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 72	 Log.d(TAG, "Initializing player with song: ${song.title}")
 73	 this.currentSong = song
 74	 this.playlist = playlist
 75	 this.currentIndex = playlist.indexOf(song).takeIf { it >= 0 } ?: 0
 76	
 77	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 78	 view?.updatePlaylist(playlist, currentIndex)
 79	 updateNavigationButtons()

 110	 
 111	 override fun toggleRepeat() {
 112	 repeatMode = when (repeatMode) {
 113	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL
 114	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE
 115	 PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ONE -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 116	 else -> PlayerContract.RepeatMode.OFF
 117	 }
 118	 view?.showRepeatState(repeatMode)
 119	 updateNavigationButtons()
 120	 }
 121	 
 122	 override fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long) {
 123	 view?.updateProgress(position, duration)
 124	 
 125	 // Update seek bar
 126	 val progress = if (duration > 0) {
 127	 ((position.toFloat() / duration.toFloat()) * 100).toInt()
 128	 } else 0
 129	 view?.updateSeekBar(progress, 100)
 130	 }
 131	 
 132	 override fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean) {
 133	 view?.updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying)
 134	 }
 135	 
 136	 override fun onSongChanged(song: Song) {
 137	 currentSong = song
 138	 view?.showSongInfo(song)
 139	 }
 140	 
 141	 override fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int) {
 142	 this.playlist = songs
 143	 this.currentIndex = currentIndex
 144	 view?.updatePlaylist(songs, currentIndex)
 145	 updateNavigationButtons()
 146	 }
 147	 
 148	 private fun updateNavigationButtons() {
 149	 val canGoPrevious = when {
 150	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 151	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 152	 else -> currentIndex > 0
 153	 }
 154	 
 155	 val canGoNext = when {
 156	 isShuffled -> playlist.size > 1
 157	 repeatMode == PlayerContract.RepeatMode.ALL -> playlist.size > 1
 158	 else -> currentIndex < playlist.size - 1
 159	 }
 160	 
 161	 view?.enablePreviousButton(canGoPrevious)
 162	 view?.enableNextButton(canGoNext)
 163	 }
 164	}

 5	/**
 6	 * Contract interface for Player screen MVP pattern
 7	 * Defines the communication between View, Presenter, and Model for music playback
 8	 */
 9	interface PlayerContract {
 10	 
 11	 /**
 12	 * View interface - defines what the Player View can do
 13	 */
 14	 interface View {
 15	 fun showSongInfo(song: Song)
 16	 fun updatePlayPauseButton(isPlaying: Boolean)
 17	 fun updateProgress(currentPosition: Long, duration: Long)
 18	 fun updateSeekBar(position: Int, max: Int)
 19	 fun showLoading()
 20	 fun hideLoading()
 21	 fun showError(message: String)
 22	 fun enablePreviousButton(enabled: Boolean)
 23	 fun enableNextButton(enabled: Boolean)
 24	 fun showShuffleState(isShuffled: Boolean)
 25	 fun showRepeatState(repeatMode: Int)
 26	 fun updatePlaylist(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int)
 27	 }
 28	 
 29	 /**
 30	 * Presenter interface - defines what the Player Presenter can do
 31	 */
 32	 interface Presenter {
 33	 fun attachView(view: View)
 34	 fun detachView()
 35	 fun initializePlayer(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>)
 36	 fun playPause()
 37	 fun seekTo(position: Long)
 38	 fun skipToNext()
 39	 fun skipToPrevious()
 40	 fun toggleShuffle()
 41	 fun toggleRepeat()
 42	 fun onProgressUpdate(position: Long, duration: Long)
 43	 fun onPlaybackStateChanged(isPlaying: Boolean)
 44	 fun onSongChanged(song: Song)
 45	 fun onPlaylistChanged(songs: List<Song>, currentIndex: Int)
 46	 }
 47	 
 48	 /**
 49	 * Repeat modes for the player
 50	 */
 51	 object RepeatMode {
 52	 const val OFF = 0
 53	 const val ONE = 1
 54	 const val ALL = 2

 20	 * Handles MediaController setup and provides playback control methods

 22	class MusicServiceConnection(private val context: Context) {
 23	
 24	 private var mediaControllerFuture: ListenableFuture<MediaController>? = null
 25	 private var mediaController: MediaController? = null
 26	 private var playbackStateListener: PlaybackStateListener? = null
 27	 private var isConnected = false
 28	 private var pendingPlaylist: Pair<List<Song>, Int>? = null
 29	 private var progressUpdateHandler: Handler? = null
 30	 private var progressUpdateRunnable: Runnable? = null

 48	 
 49	 @RequiresApi(Build.VERSION_CODES.P)
 50	 fun connect() {
 51	 Log.d(TAG, "Connecting to MusicService...")
 52	
 53	 // Start the service first to ensure it's running
 54	 val serviceIntent = Intent(context, MusicService::class.java)
 55	 try {
 56	 context.startService(serviceIntent)
 57	 Log.d(TAG, "Service started successfully")
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 Log.e(TAG, "Failed to start service", e)
 60	 playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError("Failed to start music service")
 61	 return
 62	 }
 63	
 64	 val sessionToken = SessionToken(context, ComponentName(context, MusicService::class.java))
 65	 mediaControllerFuture = MediaController.Builder(context, sessionToken).buildAsync()
 66	
 67	 mediaControllerFuture?.addListener({
 68	 try {
 69	 mediaController = mediaControllerFuture?.get()
 70	 if (mediaController != null) {
 71	 onMediaControllerConnected()
 72	 } else {
 73	 Log.e(TAG, "MediaController is null after connection")
 74	 playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError("Failed to connect to music service")
 75	 }
 76	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 77	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting MediaController", e)
 78	 playbackStateListener?.onConnectionError("Connection error: ${e.message}")
 79	 }
 80	 }, context.mainExecutor)
 81	 }
 82	 
 83	 private fun onMediaControllerConnected() {
 84	 Log.d(TAG, "MediaController connected successfully")
 85	 isConnected = true

 21	/**
 22	 * Player Activity implementing MVP pattern
 23	 * Provides full-screen music player interface with controls
 24	 */
 25	class PlayerActivity : AppCompatActivity(), PlayerContract.View {
 26	
 27	 companion object {
 28	 const val EXTRA_SONG = "extra_song"
 29	 const val EXTRA_PLAYLIST = "extra_playlist"
 30	 }
 31	
 32	 private lateinit var presenter: PlayerPresenter
 33	 
 34	 // UI Components
 35	 private lateinit var toolbar: Toolbar
 36	 private lateinit var albumArtwork: ImageView
 37	 private lateinit var songTitle: TextView
 38	 private lateinit var artistName: TextView
 39	 private lateinit var albumName: TextView
 40	 private lateinit var seekBar: SeekBar
 41	 private lateinit var currentTime: TextView
 42	 private lateinit var totalTime: TextView
 43	 private lateinit var playPauseButton: ImageButton
 44	 private lateinit var previousButton: ImageButton
 45	 private lateinit var nextButton: ImageButton
 46	 private lateinit var shuffleButton: ImageButton
 47	 private lateinit var repeatButton: ImageButton
 48	 private lateinit var progressBar: ProgressBar
 49	
 50	 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 51	 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 52	 setContentView(R.layout.activity_player)
 53	 
 54	 initializeViews()
 55	 setupToolbar()
 56	 setupSeekBar()
 57	 initializePresenter()
 58	 
 59	 // Get song and playlist from intent
 60	 val song = if (android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.TIRAMISU) {
 61	 intent.getParcelableExtra(EXTRA_SONG, Song::class.java)
 62	 } else {
 63	 @Suppress("DEPRECATION")
 64	 intent.getParcelableExtra<Song>(EXTRA_SONG)
 65	 }
 66	
 67	 val playlist = if (android.os.Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES.TIRAMISU) {
 68	 intent.getParcelableArrayListExtra(EXTRA_PLAYLIST, Song::class.java) ?: emptyList()
 69	 } else {
 70	 @Suppress("DEPRECATION")
 71	 intent.getParcelableArrayListExtra<Song>(EXTRA_PLAYLIST) ?: emptyList()
 72	 }
 73	 
 74	 if (song != null) {
 75	 presenter.initializePlayer(song, playlist)
 76	 } else {
 77	 finish() // Close activity if no song provided
 78	 }
 79	 }

 85	 artistName = findViewById(R.id.playerArtistName)
 86	 albumName = findViewById(R.id.playerAlbumName)
 87	 seekBar = findViewById(R.id.seekBar)
 88	 currentTime = findViewById(R.id.currentTime)
 89	 totalTime = findViewById(R.id.totalTime)
 90	 playPauseButton = findViewById(R.id.playPauseButton)
 91	 previousButton = findViewById(R.id.previousButton)
 92	 nextButton = findViewById(R.id.nextButton)
 93	 shuffleButton = findViewById(R.id.shuffleButton)
 94	 repeatButton = findViewById(R.id.repeatButton)
 95	 progressBar = findViewById(R.id.playerProgressBar)

 105	
 106	 private fun setupSeekBar() {
 107	 seekBar.setOnSeekBarChangeListener(object : SeekBar.OnSeekBarChangeListener {
 108	 override fun onProgressChanged(seekBar: SeekBar?, progress: Int, fromUser: Boolean) {
 109	 if (fromUser) {
 110	 // Calculate position based on progress and duration
 111	 // This will be implemented when we integrate with actual player
 112	 }
 113	 }
 114	 
 115	 override fun onStartTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {}
 116	 
 117	 override fun onStopTrackingTouch(seekBar: SeekBar?) {
 118	 seekBar?.let { bar ->
 119	 // Seek to the selected position
 120	 val progress = bar.progress
 121	 val duration = bar.max
 122	 if (duration > 0) {
 123	 val position = (progress.toFloat() / 100f * duration).toLong()
 124	 presenter.seekTo(position)
 125	 }
 126	 }
 127	 }
 128	 })
 129	 
 130	 // Setup control button listeners
 131	 playPauseButton.setOnClickListener {
 132	 presenter.playPause()
 133	 }
 134	 
 135	 previousButton.setOnClickListener {
 136	 presenter.skipToPrevious()
 137	 }
 138	 
 139	 nextButton.setOnClickListener {
 140	 presenter.skipToNext()
 141	 }
 142	 
 143	 shuffleButton.setOnClickListener {
 144	 presenter.toggleShuffle()
 145	 }
 146	 
 147	 repeatButton.setOnClickListener {
 148	 presenter.toggleRepeat()
 149	 }
 150	 }
 151

 153	 presenter = PlayerPresenter()
 154	 presenter.attachView(this)
 155	 presenter.initializeMusicService(this)
 156	 }

 160	 songTitle.text = song.title
 161	 artistName.text = song.artist
 162	 albumName.text = song.album

 168	 .placeholder(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)
 169	 .error(R.drawable.placeholder_album_art)
 170	 .transform(RoundedCorners(32))
 171	 .into(albumArtwork)

 81	 override fun beforeTextChanged(s: CharSequence?, start: Int, count: Int, after: Int) {}
 82

 139	 putParcelableArrayListExtra(PlayerActivity.EXTRA_PLAYLIST, ArrayList(playlist))

 141	 startActivity(intent)

 22	 
 23	 /**
 24	 * Returns formatted duration string (mm:ss)
 25	 */
 26	 fun getFormattedDuration(): String {

 28	 val seconds = (duration / 1000) % 60
 29	 return String.format("%02d:%02d", minutes, seconds)
 30	 }
 31

 34	 */

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.data.provider
 2	
 3	import android.content.Context
 4	import android.media.MediaMetadataRetriever
 5	import android.net.Uri
 6	import android.util.Log
 7	import com.nauh.musicplayer.R
 8	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 9	import java.lang.reflect.Field
 10	
 11	/**
 12	 * Provider class for loading music files from the app's raw resources directory
 13	 * Scans res/raw folder and creates Song objects for local music files
 14	 */
 15	class LocalMusicProvider(private val context: Context) {
 16	 
 17	 companion object {
 18	 private const val TAG = "LocalMusicProvider"
 19	 private const val DEFAULT_ARTWORK_URL = "android.resource://com.nauh.musicplayer/drawable/placeholder_album_art"
 20	 }
 21	 
 22	 /**
 23	 * Scans the res/raw directory and returns a list of Song objects for all music files
 24	 */
 25	 fun getLocalSongs(): List<Song> {
 26	 Log.d(TAG, "Scanning local music files from res/raw")
 27	 val songs = mutableListOf<Song>()
 28	 
 29	 try {
 30	 // Get all raw resource IDs using reflection
 31	 val rawResourceIds = getRawResourceIds()
 32	 Log.d(TAG, "Found ${rawResourceIds.size} raw resources")
 33	 
 34	 rawResourceIds.forEach { (resourceName, resourceId) ->
 35	 if (isMusicFile(resourceName)) {
 36	 Log.d(TAG, "Processing music file: $resourceName")
 37	 val song = createSongFromRawResource(resourceName, resourceId)
 38	 if (song != null) {
 39	 songs.add(song)
 40	 Log.d(TAG, "Added song: ${song.title}")
 41	 }
 42	 }
 43	 }
 44	 
 45	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 46	 Log.e(TAG, "Error scanning local music files", e)
 47	 }
 48	 
 49	 Log.d(TAG, "Successfully loaded ${songs.size} local songs")
 50	 return songs
 51	 }
 52	 
 53	 /**
 54	 * Gets all raw resource IDs using reflection
 55	 */
 56	 private fun getRawResourceIds(): Map<String, Int> {
 57	 val resourceMap = mutableMapOf<String, Int>()
 58	 
 59	 try {
 60	 val rawClass = R.raw::class.java
 61	 val fields: Array<Field> = rawClass.declaredFields
 62	 
 63	 for (field in fields) {
 64	 try {
 65	 val resourceName = field.name
 66	 val resourceId = field.getInt(null)
 67	 resourceMap[resourceName] = resourceId
 68	 Log.d(TAG, "Found raw resource: $resourceName -> $resourceId")
 69	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 70	 Log.w(TAG, "Could not access field: ${field.name}", e)
 71	 }
 72	 }
 73	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 74	 Log.e(TAG, "Error getting raw resource IDs", e)
 75	 }
 76	 
 77	 return resourceMap
 78	 }

 119	 private const val TAG = "MusicService"

 121	 /**
 122	 * Convert Song object to MediaItem for ExoPlayer
 123	 */
 124	 fun createMediaItem(song: Song): MediaItem {
 125	 Log.d(TAG, "Creating MediaItem for song: ${song.title} with URL: ${song.streamUrl}")
 126	 val metadata = MediaMetadata.Builder()
 127	 .setTitle(song.title)
 128	 .setArtist(song.artist)
 129	 .setAlbumTitle(song.album)
 130	 .setArtworkUri(android.net.Uri.parse(song.artworkUrl))
 131	 .build()
 132	
 133	 val mediaItem = MediaItem.Builder()
 134	 .setUri(song.streamUrl)
 135	 .setMediaId(song.id)
 136	 .setMediaMetadata(metadata)
 137	 .build()
 138	
 139	 Log.d(TAG, "MediaItem created successfully for: ${song.title}")
 140	 return mediaItem
 141	 }

 1	package com.nauh.musicplayer.presenter
 2	
 3	import com.nauh.musicplayer.contract.MainContract
 4	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.model.Song
 5	import com.nauh.musicplayer.data.repository.MusicRepository
 6	import kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineScope
 7	import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
 8	import kotlinx.coroutines.Job
 9	import kotlinx.coroutines.launch
 10	import kotlinx.coroutines.withContext
 11	
 12	/**
 13	 * Presenter for the Main screen
 14	 * Handles business logic and communication between View and Model
 15	 */
 16	class MainPresenter(
 17	 private val repository: MusicRepository = MusicRepository.getInstance()
 18	) : MainContract.Presenter {
 19	 
 20	 private var view: MainContract.View? = null
 21	 private val presenterScope = CoroutineScope(Dispatchers.Main + Job())
 22	 private var currentSongs: List<Song> = emptyList()
 23	 private var searchJob: Job? = null
 24	 
 25	 override fun attachView(view: MainContract.View) {
 26	 this.view = view
 27	 }
 28	 
 29	 override fun detachView() {
 30	 this.view = null
 31	 searchJob?.cancel()
 32	 }
 33	 
 34	 override fun loadSongs() {
 35	 view?.showLoading()
 36	 
 37	 presenterScope.launch {
 38	 try {
 39	 val result = repository.getAllSongs()
 40	 
 41	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 42	 view?.hideLoading()
 43	 
 44	 result.fold(
 45	 onSuccess = { songs ->
 46	 currentSongs = songs
 47	 if (songs.isEmpty()) {
 48	 view?.showEmptyState()
 49	 } else {
 50	 view?.showSongs(songs)
 51	 }
 52	 },
 53	 onFailure = { exception ->
 54	 view?.showError(exception.message ?: "Failed to load songs")
 55	 }
 56	 )
 57	 }
 58	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 59	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 60	 view?.hideLoading()
 61	 view?.showError(e.message ?: "An unexpected error occurred")
 62	 }
 63	 }
 64	 }
 65	 }
 66	 
 67	 override fun onSongClicked(song: Song, playlist: List<Song>) {
 68	 view?.navigateToPlayer(song, playlist)
 69	 }
 70	 
 71	 override fun searchSongs(query: String) {
 72	 if (query.isBlank()) {
 73	 clearSearch()
 74	 return
 75	 }
 76	 
 77	 // Cancel previous search
 78	 searchJob?.cancel()
 79	 
 80	 searchJob = presenterScope.launch {
 81	 try {
 82	 val result = repository.searchSongs(query)
 83	 
 84	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 85	 result.fold(
 86	 onSuccess = { songs ->
 87	 view?.showSearchResults(songs)
 88	 },
 89	 onFailure = { exception ->
 90	 view?.showError(exception.message ?: "Search failed")
 91	 }
 92	 )
 93	 }
 94	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 95	 withContext(Dispatchers.Main) {
 96	 view?.showError(e.message ?: "Search failed")
 97	 }
 98	 }
 99	 }
 100	 }
 101	 
 102	 override fun clearSearch() {
 103	 searchJob?.cancel()
 104	 view?.clearSearchResults()
 105	 view?.showSongs(currentSongs)
 106	 }
 107	 
 108	 override fun refreshSongs() {
 109	 loadSongs()
 110	 }
 111	 
 112	 override fun onCurrentSongChanged(song: Song?) {
 113	 view?.updateCurrentPlayingSong(song)
 114	 }
 115	}

 10	/**
 11	 * Repository class that handles data operations for music
 12	 * Implements the Repository pattern to abstract data sources
 13	 */
 14	class MusicRepository(
 15	 private val apiService: MusicApiService? = null
 16	) {
 17	 
 18	 /**
 19	 * Fetch all songs from the data source
 20	 * For demo purposes, returns mock data with simulated network delay
 21	 */
 22	 suspend fun getAllSongs(): Result<List<Song>> {
 23	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 24	 try {
 25	 // Simulate network delay
 26	 delay(1000)
 27	 
 28	 // For demo purposes, return mock data
 29	 // In a real app, this would call apiService.getAllSongs()
 30	 val songs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 31	 Result.success(songs)
 32	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 33	 Result.failure(e)
 34	 }
 35	 }
 36	 }
 37	 
 38	 /**
 39	 * Search songs by query
 40	 */
 41	 suspend fun searchSongs(query: String): Result<List<Song>> {
 42	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 43	 try {
 44	 delay(500) // Simulate network delay
 45	 
 46	 val allSongs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 47	 val filteredSongs = allSongs.filter { song ->
 48	 song.title.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||
 49	 song.artist.contains(query, ignoreCase = true) ||
 50	 song.album.contains(query, ignoreCase = true)
 51	 }
 52	 
 53	 Result.success(filteredSongs)
 54	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 55	 Result.failure(e)
 56	 }
 57	 }
 58	 }
 59	 
 60	 /**
 61	 * Get song by ID
 62	 */
 63	 suspend fun getSongById(id: String): Result<Song?> {
 64	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 65	 try {
 66	 delay(300) // Simulate network delay
 67	 
 68	 val song = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs().find { it.id == id }
 69	 Result.success(song)
 70	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 71	 Result.failure(e)
 72	 }
 73	 }
 74	 }
 75	 
 76	 /**
 77	 * Get songs by genre
 78	 */
 79	 suspend fun getSongsByGenre(genre: String): Result<List<Song>> {
 80	 return withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {
 81	 try {
 82	 delay(500) // Simulate network delay
 83	 
 84	 val allSongs = MockMusicData.getSampleSongs()
 85	 val filteredSongs = allSongs.filter { song ->
 86	 song.genre?.equals(genre, ignoreCase = true) == true
 87	 }
 88	 
 89	 Result.success(filteredSongs)
 90	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 91	 Result.failure(e)
 92	 }
 93	 }
 94	 }
 95

 100	 fun getInstance(apiService: MusicApiService? = null): MusicRepository {
 101	 return INSTANCE ?: synchronized(this) {
 102	 INSTANCE ?: MusicRepository(apiService).also { INSTANCE = it }
 103	 }
 104	 }
 105	 }

 173	 fun disconnect() {
 174	 Log.d(TAG, "Disconnecting from MusicService")
 175	 isConnected = false
 176	 pendingPlaylist = null
 177	
 178	 stopProgressUpdates()
 179	 progressUpdateHandler = null
 180	 progressUpdateRunnable = null
 181	
 182	 mediaController?.release()
 183	 mediaControllerFuture?.cancel(true)
 184	 mediaController = null
 185	 mediaControllerFuture = null
 186	 }

 188	 fun playPlaylist(songs: List<Song>, startIndex: Int = 0) {
 189	 if (!isConnected || mediaController == null) {
 190	 Log.d(TAG, "Not connected, storing playlist for later")
 191	 pendingPlaylist = Pair(songs, startIndex)
 192	 return
 193	 }
 194	
 195	 Log.d(TAG, "Playing playlist with ${songs.size} songs, starting at index $startIndex")
 196	
 197	 try {
 198	 val mediaItems = songs.map { song -> MusicService.createMediaItem(song) }
 199	 mediaController?.setMediaItems(mediaItems, startIndex, 0)
 200	 mediaController?.prepare()
 201	 mediaController?.play()
 202	 Log.d(TAG, "Playlist started successfully")
 203	 } catch (e: Exception) {
 204	 Log.e(TAG, "Error playing playlist", e)
 205	 playbackStateListener?.onPlaybackError("Failed to play playlist: ${e.message}")
 206	 }
 207	 }
 208	 
 209	 fun playSong(song: Song) {
 210	 playPlaylist(listOf(song), 0)
 211	 }
 212	 
 213	 fun playPause() {
 214	 mediaController?.let { controller ->
 215	 if (controller.isPlaying) {
 216	 controller.pause()
 217	 } else {
 218	 controller.play()
 219	 }
 220	 }
